She let out a dreamy sigh as she pictured herself as a 10,000 pound behemoth of a mare. Oh Celestia did she wish for that to happen! "If I'm going to get bigger, then I'm going to have find a much more extensive supply of food..." Twilight thought out loud to herself, idly rubbing her swollen belly. It was true, the stash she had just consumed was the last of any edible substance in the library. She had to make sure no food would go to waste of course! "Hmm... 11231.content:
It's been a long while since Twilight has become a Princess and an Alicorn. Things have gone pretty well with her and getting a hang of the her new power. To top it up, she has been getting tons of respect and princess perks. One day, Twilight and Spike were in Canterlot doing some small appearances and went to Donut Joe's.

"Hello Joe!" Twilight said.
"Ah! Princess Twilight!" Joe said bowing to her.
"No need for all the formalites, Joe." Twilight said.
"But you are a princess now." Joe said.
"She's still the same old Twilight." Spike said.
"Yeah." Twilight said.
"So, what can I get you?" Joe asked.
"Just a few donuts to go." Twilight said.

Joe went out to the back and got two boxes with a dozen donuts each.

"Ummm....that's more then I expected." Twilight asked.
"Just something special for you. On the house." Joe said.
"Sweet!" Spike said grabbing a few and eating some.
"Are you sure?" Twilight asked.
"It's no problem. Now go on." Joe said smiling.
"Okay then." Twilight said.

Twilight and Spike left Joe's and was on their way. Joe was not the only one giving Twilight free treats. Many of the other bakeries wanted to offer food to the new princess. When Twilight got back home to Ponyville, she had a ton of food boxes in front of her.

"Jeez! So much offerings." Twilight said.
"Being a princess has it's perk. Wouldn't you said." Spike said.
"But so much food. It's crazy." Twilight said.
"Crazy, but tasty." Spike said eating a cookie.

Twilight took a pastry and ate it. It was quite delectable.

"Wow! That's really good." Twilight said.
"Yeah! So if other ponies are gonna offer you food, just take it. You are a princess now."
"I guess you're right Spike."

With that said, Twilight decided to have another pastry. Then a few more. Not worry about how things will work for her. The few days later.......

What if during one of those times in Equestria Girls, a simple mistake renders her with a craving that follows her even back into Ponyville? Maybe the Princess of Friendship gets a taste for meat, and her choices are to either isolate herself in the human world or to give in and find out how ponies taste.
112332.title: Taste For Meat

choices: It was the Cutie Mark Crusaders!
1123321.content:
She should have never done it because now the poor purple alicorn was paying for it. Oh how desperately did Twilight want something meaty as she sat down in the grass and her head propped up on the small table. It was clear that she wasn't interested in the daily food served at this tiny restaurant for ponies. It just didn't compare to the deliciousness that was...meat.

Back when she had first traveled to the human world to stop Sunset, who had been reformed in the end, she had tried something new. Something she had never tasted before! And that was meat. Hamburgers, cheeseburgers, steak, pork chop....she had tried it all when given the chance and Twilight loved all of it. It was just so darn good!

But Equestria...didn't have any of that considering ponies didn't eat meat. But Twilight noticed something different about herself upon coming back home. She still had her human cravings for meat. She hadn't given into them yet, but it was so tempting. In fact she had eyed her friends more than once! Sizing them up and wanting a taste. Twilight shuddered at the memory. No, get a hold of yourself!

But her thoughts were interrupted by the sound of her stomach growling and demanding food. A pitiful whine came from Twilight as she knew what her belly wanted. She had endured this kind of pain for too long now and was just about to break. She didn't care what other ponies thought if they found out. She wanted something meaty right now. So, why not a pony or two? Her hungry gaze looked around the area before spotting the perfect meal.
1123321.title: Vore makes her gain weight

choices: She's going to eat Fluttershy of course!
She goes for someone or something else nearby
11233212.content:
“Oh, Twilight, is everything okay?” said the soft spoken Pegasus. The sight of her friend got her concerned the moment she laid eyes on her. Admittedly, it was not difficult to get Fluttershy to worry about something, but apart from Twilight’s well being, something else had the wimpy pony on edge. That something was the rather unsettling look in Twilight’s eyes, a look that was practically boring right into her. Thankfully, the Princess of Friendship then shook her head vigorously to bring about a more normal gaze. Once that was accomplished, she answered Fluttershy’s question, “Uh, not really….You see…”

At least she TRIED to answer her question. Unfortunately, Twilight’s normally genius level brain was too preoccupied with hunger to come up with a proper excuse. Literally, the first thought that popped into her head was to say, “I’m so hungry, I could eat a horse!” However, she knew that saying would go over as well as it did in the human world. Twilight then held her aching head and let out a tired groan. Why oh WHY did she have to think that?! Now horse meat in particular had practically become her one and only thought! Then, the ever observant Fluttershy asked another question, “Um, are you hungry?”

“YES!!!” Twilight practically screamed, causing Fluttershy let out a sharp squeak as she flinched. An awkward silence fell between them, but those few precious seconds allowed the wheels in Twilight’s head to turn. Soon, she had the perfect thing to get her out of that situation; a lie. Let out another groan, this one with much more hopelessness, she began to work her friend like a puppet, “But I can’t decide what I want! I’ve been craving SOMETHING all day, but I don’t know what! Everything that’s not it sounds terrible to me, but if I don’t find that special food soon, I’ll starve!”

“Oh no! That’s just awful!” Fluttershy responded honestly. She did not question anything Twilight had just said. Compared to her past freak outs, this was actually one of the tamest she had ever seen from her friend. This one didn’t even have its own Aria. Naturally, Fluttershy swooped over to her friend’s side, and helped her up, “Come with me. We are going to find just the thing for your tummy.” And with that, they left the restaurant.

As they walked, Twilight’s gears continued to spin. Her belly continued to rumble, but the ravenous she had been feeling was starting to be joined by some reluctance and logic. Every step of the way left egg head Alicorn sweating and biting her lower lip, all the while she tried to reason with herself, “What am I thinking?! I can’t EAT Fluttershy!! Let’s look at the facts; she’s a pony! She has thoughts and feeling and dreams and…rather nice, round, juicy looking flank that I bet would go great with barbeque sauce….STOP IT!...But I’m HUNGRY!!!!” It took every ounce of control she had to keep smiling on the outside, even if it did look rather forced. Fortunately, her train of thought was at least paused once they arrived to Fluttershy’s cottage. At least then, Fluttershy’s talking was a decent distraction.

“Now, whenever one of my animals is picky with their food, I just….” At least it was for a few seconds. Fluttershy’s voice was soon silenced by Twilight’s own thoughts as she tried not to eye her friend like a piece of meat, “You know….my transmutation spells have gotten a lot better…I bet I could turn her into a burger. She wouldn’t feel a th-WHAT AM I THINKING?!” Twilight nearly screamed again, her thoughts were so loud.

They were coming at her so fast; images of Fluttershy being turned into a plate of bacon or roasted over a flame with an apple in her mouth soon passed through her head, along with the rather bizarre image of Twilight’s mouth becoming rather snake-like as she swallowed her whole! She had to do something! Anything! At some point, Fluttershy was going to stop talking, and then what was Twilight going to do?
11233212.title: Pegasus For Lunch?

choices: Twilight wakes up later, having digested Fluttershy.
Another pony had been watching from the window! But who?
112332121.content:
Oh, Twilight couldn't take this hunger anymore. The second Fluttershy stopped moving, the alicorn princess would go in for the kill. She'd gobble up her friend and finally put this desire to rest. Clearly the mare wasn't in the best of mindset at the moment. Stopping at her cottage door, Fluttershy went to open the door for her friend. Turning to look at her, Fluttershy gasped as she saw Twilight actually pounced on her. They tumbled a bit before landing in Fluttershy's home, with Twilight on top of her and looking at the yellow mare hungrily. Needless to say this kinda freaked Fluttershy out a bit.

"T-Twilight? What a-are you doing?" The alicorn wasted no time however and opened her maw as wide as she could before thrusting Fluttershy's head in. A muffled scream came from the yellow pegasus as Twilight forced more of her into her mouth. A moan came from Twilight as she got a good taste of her friend, her tongue licking over Fluttershy's cheek. Carefully did Twilight roll onto her back so she could make it easier in gulping down the pegasus. Her hoofs made sure the other couldn't escape her grasp. Fluttershy wiggled and squirmed in an attempt to break free but it was a vain effort. The only chance she had was spreading out her wings to hopefully stop Twilight.

"T-Twilight! Stop! P-Please!" The poor pegasus was on the verge of crying already and she hadn't even reached the stomach yet. Twilight ignored her however, slowly but surely gulping her yellow friend down. The wings were a bit troubling but with some magic, she managed to fit them through her mouth. With most of her body in already, Twilight simply let gravity do the rest. There was a noticeable bulge in Twilight's purple belly as slowly Fluttershy entered her stomach.

All that was left of Fluttershy on the outside, was her bucking hooves and tail. In one big gulp, it all went down and Fluttershy finally entered Twilight's stomach. She was crying, too scared and confused to truthfully understand what was happening right now.

The princess belched contently as a yellow feather fell down onto the ground. A hoof went to rub her large gut, which hung over her legs. It was so large that she needed to lay on her side in order to rub it. It had been so long since she had something meaty and oh, Fluttershy tasted so good.

"Mmhh, Fluttershy. Thank you so much! You're such a good friend...and a tasty one at that." Another burp came and her stomach gurgled a bit. "So full...I think I'm going to take a nap." It took her a few tries but she managed to roll herself up and make her way to the couch, her large belly dragging itself against the floor.

Yawning, the princess of friendship got comfortable before dozing off.
112332121.title: She's going to eat Fluttershy of course!

choices: Twilight has become a full figured pony
She's so big now, you'd think Fluttershy was pure fat
1123321211.content:
Part of Twilight knew that this was wrong, that she was behaving not only unlike herself, but that she had committed a terrible crime. One of her friends was now dying inside of her. She had eaten her, without pause, and now all she wanted to do was to sleep. She was so full and content, despite knowing fully well that she had killed Fluttershy. By the time she woke up, her friend would have no doubt run out of air, and be worked over by stomach acids. It was horrible fate for her friend, except, Twilight no longer saw her as a friend. As sleep began to take her, Twilight’s last thoughts were on how she saw Fluttershy. The once cute and sweet and kind unicorn was now remembered as timid, annoying and useless waste of space. As Twilight let out a yawn that briefly became a belch, she smacked her lips as she muttered, “At least she was…tasty.” Smiling away, the genius pony was soon snoring like a dragon with a head cold. The only thing louder than that was the pathetic wails of the crying Pegasus in her gut.

Now, one great things about living in Equestria is that no one ever goes one night without dreaming. Whether they are simple or complex, the land of slumber always leaves pony’s and others with plenty to occupy their minds as their body’s rest. Twilight was no different, but instead of reading books in a library, she was in a restaurant, reading a menu.

“Hmm, let’s see.” She said, the waiter waiting patiently for her decision, “Mmm, there’s so much to choose….I guess I’ll have the Rarity Steak, medium rare please, a side of Dash Ribs, and some fried Scootaloo, please.” She had to wipe some drool off of her chin by the time she was finished, but as she handed off the menu, she managed to catch the waiter just before he left, “Oh! And actually, can I get my dessert first while I wait? I’ll have the Mincemeat Pinkie Pie.” The pony simply nodded and walked off. Then, Poof, the pie did indeed appear right before Twilight. Smiling as much as she was drooling, she grabbed the whole thing in her hands and chomped down.

With wild abandon, Twilight devoured that thing, chewing at it like a buzz saw going through wood. Bits of crust and spit sprayed past her head with each ravenous bite. It seemed like every second there was, Twilight was slurping and swallowing everything she took in down. It tasty so meaty, and yet so sweet at the same time, just like how she imagined Pinkie would be. By the time it was over, she was licking the tin, but that was soon tossed away. With a delighted sigh, Twilight leaned back in her chair, stroking her rounded belly. “BURP!” that was all she could say after such a great appetizer. Licking the bits of food on her cheeks, Twilight then heard something odd, “Psst! Twilight.”

“Huh?” now out of her daze, the intelligent pony noticed that someone was now sitting in front of her at her table. They were concealing themselves with a menu, but Twilight managed to see the top of their mane. It’s color reminded her a bit of bacon, “Mmm, bacon….wait, Sunset Sh-

“SSSHHH! Don’t say my name!” she scolded as loudly as she could in a whisper, soon elaborating with, “Luna might hear you.” At that point, Twilight found herself gasping. While she may be loving the taste of meat, what would someone like Princess Luna think of this dream?! A cold sweat soon befell Twilight, and her eyes nervously darted left and right. Fortunately, she was too scared to talk, which gave Sunset Shimmer her opening, “Look, we don’t have much time. I know that you are craving a lot of meat.” Now Twilight was focused again after hearing that, allowing her to whisper back, “How do you know that?!...In fact, how are you here in my dream?”

“I know because the same thing happened to me, but that’s all I can say right now.” Sunset said, and then warned, “I should have given you the heads up Twilight, because if you’ve eaten somepony, you need to get of there, now! Come back to the Human World and hide with me.” Once again, Twilight’s mind was all in a tizzy, her mind desperate for information, “Sunset, I don’t-

“I’ll explain later! JUST WAKE UP!!!!!!!”

“AAH!!! BEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCH!!!!” after that latest gassy outburst, Twilight was CERTAINLY awake by then. Her first thought was, “Goodness, pony’s sure make you gassy.” That however was soon pushed aside as her dream came back into focus in her mind. Quickly, Twilight looked outside. A sigh a relief came when she saw it was the dead of night. Not enough time had passed for anypony to notice Fluttershy missing, and now she could hopefully sneak to a certain magic mirror a little easier. “She’s right, I need to hide out somewhere other than here. At least for a while….Huh, I guess I should have thought of going back to the other world for meat in the first place…..eh, sorry Fluttershy.” Whether there was any truth to that apology or not, Twilight’s focus soon went to a sight that made her gasp. Fluttershy may be gone, but she had left quite the impression on Twilight Sparkle’s body.

1131.content:
"Hmm, oh my this is delicious..." said the humanized Twilight Sparkle, as she was eating a strange food she had never discovered before. The people here called it a cheeseburger, and from what she could tell, everyone seemed to enjoy this food a lot for some reason. "I wonder what it's made of..."

Twilight Sparkle had recently come to this world to hunt down her princess crown, which was actually one of the magical elements of harmony. A pony named Sunset Shimmer had attempted to steal it from her, but ended up dropping it into the mirror that led to this strange world. She knew she had to continue looking for it, but she was briefly hypnotized by the flavors that came over her as she ate her burger. It was so strange, and yet it was probably the most delicious thing she had ever eaten! She continued to eat it very messily, which weirded out the person sitting across from her, this world's Fluttershy who was eating a salad and an apple for lunch.

"Um, didn't you want to know something about the Fall Formal?" the shy yellow person asked. "I mean, when you're done. No rush..."

Twilight paid Fluttershy no attention, as she was too busy scarfing down her burger. Once she was finished, she squealed to herself, loving the taste like nothing she ever had before. She quickly got up and went to grab another burger, while Spike, now a dog, hung out in her backpack, looking worried as his friend continued to stuff her face.

"This is going to end badly, isn't it?" Spike said, shaking his head...

choices: She accepts and tastes the food with Pinkie
11313.content:
Eventually Twilight regained control and stopped eating to focus on the mission at hand: finding her crown before Sunset Shimmer got her hands on it. However when she returned to her senses Lunch was over, she had run out of food to devour, and the cafeteria deserted. All the students went to their classes, including Fluttershy. Spike was the only being who remained with Twilight and he was taking a nap in her backpack. The princess was a little embarrassed to have let herself lose control so easily and seeing her larger than normal gut didn't help. To make things worse she forgot to ask Fluttershy about the Fall Formal. Luckily for her, the animal lover had left her a note with details on where to find the Head of the Fall Formal Planning Committee.

Not bothering to wake up Spike, Twilight took her backpack and followed the instructions to the gym. There were streamers and balloons scattered around but no one seemed to be there. ...the hell? Sunset carefully walked up behind Twilight, who wasn't paying heed to her partner in crime as she patted her immense belly, smiling blissfully.

Sunset was right. Twilight was still sitting cross-legged on the ground, but before Sunset could distinctly remember that her head was only around level with her belly button. But now, she was tall enough that she could reach her shoulders.

"That hit the spot!" Twilight boasted, pushing down on her thighs and laboriously wobbling back onto her feet. Reflexively stepping back, Sunset was awestruck as her suspicions were confirmed that she was, indeed, almost two feet taller than when they'd started business.

Twilight herself wasn't slow to notice, surprised that the ceiling looked much closer, but she was surprised to look down and see that Sunset was now only tall enough that she reached her chest.

"What the...what's happening?!"

Sunset shook out of her stupor. The masterminding evil inside of her came back tenfold, infatuated at the dozens of advantages this discovery could give her. "The best damn thing, that's what!"

"Well, now that you mention it..." Twilight planted her hands along the sides of her belly, stroking them around its curvature. It jutted out with a very boisterous roundness, bowing down very low across her heaving thighs, hiding them from sight, save for the small glimpses of her ample rump peeking out from the front. With her looming height and monstrous weight joining hands, Twilight was the definition of gigantic. "...this is kinda cool!"

"And the snowball's only gonna get bigger, baby!" Sunset cheered, patting Twilight's belly. "With this under our belts, we're gonna be unstoppable!"

"Then can I get more people to eat?" Twilight asked eagerly.

"Not yet. Right now, we gotta lay low and plan ahead a bit."

"Aw..." Twilight moped disappointedly, sinking back down and hitting the floor with a wall-shaking THUD!!!

"Hey, trust me, we're just at the tip of the iceberg! There's gonna be a heck of a lot more!"

"I guess..." Twilight shrugged.

"Eh, don't fret. Here, I'll make us some grub!"

Sunset left the living room and ducked into the kitchen. In Twilight's ears, it took an unnecessarily long amount of time till she could actually hear pots and pans clattering, and with her belly was screaming to be sated, it was near unbearable to sit still and do nothing.

"Come on, I'm hungry..." She moaned.
1131311122112222211.title: Twilight's getting bigger! Not just fatter,...

choices: "Find a better place for you to stay at."
"Get rid of what remains of your friends here. A few are still out there."
11313111221122222112.content:
While Sunset had never been the best cook, she certainly wasn't horrible. Give her clear directions on how to fix something and she'll do a pretty good job of it. Scrambled eggs, bacon, and other delicious foods were being cooked to perfection as Sunset oversaw the process. Twilight's voice and annoyance was easily heard by Sunset, who walked back into the room to talk to the giant. "It's almost ready. I'm not a master chef, you know."

Twilight merely pouted but nonetheless complied. For a moment the large glutton pondered the idea of having Sunset for a quick snack. But Twilight decided against it. It would be much better to keep Sunset as she knew this world far better than she did. Sunset returned to the kitchen and placed the food on various plates. Most of them for Twilight while one for herself.

A heavenly aroma filled the air as Sunset walked in with the plates and set them down on the table for Twilight. "I've never smelled something so good before. What did you fix?" Twilight questioned as a hand reached for a few stripes of bacon to inspect them.

"Bacon, scrambled eggs, toast, and good bunch of biscuits." Taking a nibble, Twilight was delighted by the taste of bacon and continued to happily munch on them before moving onto the rest of her food. Sunset simply sat back and watched while eating her own.

"Like I said before, we're gonna have to lay low for a bit. Keep the whole eating people to a minimal for a while." After all, if she ate everyone then Sunset couldn't rule over anyone. "But I'll get you some from time to time. Just to keep you happy." Finishing off her first plate, Twilight set it aside as she looked down at Sunset and nods her head.

"So, what do we do now then?"
11313111221122222112.title: Nah. She's actually taking a liking to her...

choices: Sunset thinks that something about twilight is really hot...
By hanging out with Twilight, Sunset's putting on a few pounds, herself!
113131112211222221121.content:
"We're not gonna be able to stay here for long." Sunset observed, looking up at the ceiling shrinking on Twilight. "We're gonna have to move out somewhere with lots of space."

"Lots of space?" Twilight inquired, belching softly. "Where can we find that around town?"

"Hmm..." Sunset held her chin in thought, thinking over the town's map in her head. But her eyes suddenly sparked with realization, and she curiously walked back to the window, looking back at Rainbow's house.

Specifically, at Gilda's pickup truck still sitting in the driveway, with a large tarp bundled up in the cargo tray...

.....


"Alright, Twilight, we're gonna make this quick, alright?" Sunset ordered as she lead Twilight down the path leading to the mansion's front doorstep, with Twilight's back shrouded by the tarp. To Sunset's satisfaction, the lights were on inside, but only one car was inside the garage. The red front doors were even tall and wide enough for a super-sized girl to enter, even by Twilight's standards.

"I'll try to do it as fast as I can." Twilight stated, determined.

"Starting now!" Sunset rang the doorbell, leaning over the porch to gaze into the window. She could see a turquoise girl hoist herself off the couch and waddle to the door. Even though she wasn't nearly as big as Twilight, she was still an absolute whale.

Sunset cringed at her horrendous hairstyle, any qualms about following disappearing.

"Who is it?" The girl asked as she opened the door, but gaped for a few seconds at the titanic, super-sized girl standing in front of her before Sunset pinched at her neck, instantly making her fall limp. Twilight caught the unconscious girl and, on a feat of strength she'd never remembered having, lifted the girl up and proceeded to swallow her whole, head-first. It took a lot more effort, putting a great amount of strain on her mouth given how wide a meal she was eating, but nonetheless, Twilight managed to cram her huge body all the way through her mouth and down her neck, into her stomach to feed her growing body.

"Hurry, inside!" Sunset coaxed her into the house, shutting the door behind them and locking it up. "...and we're good."

Sunset turned around and looked up at the foyer, pleased with how much space was inside. It was over two stories tall, and was still wide even with the staircases spiraling along the walls and into the upper floor. Twilight made herself at home and sat dead center on the floor, sighing happily.

"Alright, time for a little housewarming!" Sunset quipped.

.....


"Damn. This chick was loaded!" Sunset observed as she carried a bag of chips as big as a pillow into the foyer. "You should see all the crap she has in the kitchen!"

The room's once clean floor was now covered with empty, crushed bags of chips, with long streaks ground into the floor from when they'd dragged the TV and couch in. The sofa didn't last long, as Twilight's rear end has blossomed enough that it poured over the edges, tearing the arms off before completely flattening its structure, but Twilight paid no heed. She was too busy chowing down the last of a bag of chips.

Now Twilight had grown so much that her eyes could be level with Sunset's as she sat on the ground, even maybe a few centimeters taller, but more so she was an absolute blimp. Her gut liberally poured out onto the ground, pushing her massive legs apart at an incredibly wide angle and curving away by a few feet, forcing her breasts up that her sight ahead was blocked by two large, obstructive hills.

...and yet Twilight looked as pleased as ever, a modest smile between her doughy cheeks as she stroked the sides of her overstuffed belly. "Thanks for everything, Sunset."

"Eh, no biggie. Just as much for you as it is for me!"

Truth be told, Sunset started off much more for herself than anything, but as she overlooked Twilight's gigantic body, it soon became apparant that something else was going on behind the scenes.
113131112211222221121.title: "Find a better place for you to stay at."

choices: "...Why don't you feed me for a bit?"
1131311122112222211212.content:
Whether or not she had realized it, Sunset herself was putting on some weight. No where near the degree that Twilight was but nonetheless Sunset was eating her fair share of the food. If one were to look at Sunset, you might very well assume she was pregnant! Or at the least had swallowed a soccer ball. Her belly hung out over her skirt, riding up her shirt. It was quite the protruding gut for Sunset. But it didn't even compare to the girth that was Twilight's.

And to make matters more interesting, Twilight had noticed. From Sunset's slim figure to the gut she currently had. A chubby finger went to poke at Sunset's stomach, causing her to squeak in surprise. "I can tell! Someone's got a little belly on them already. Looks good on you Sunset but..." The villainess looked down at herself, taking a hold of her belly and watching it wobble.
1131311122112222211212.title: By hanging out with Twilight, Sunset's putt...

choices: Follow Sunset and her new found inner turmoil.
Stay with Twilight as she starts to check out her body.
1131311122112222212.content:
There was just something about Twilight and her new desire to consume that got Sunset all...hot and bothered. Seeing her fat form jiggle as Twilight rubbed the sides of her large gut, content with her latest meal. Was she blushing? Oh dear Celestia, she was blushing! Sunset's cheeks turned a rosy pink as she forced herself to look away, despite how much she didn't want too. What was getting into her? Just the day before she planned on destroying Twilight because she dared to stand in her way. Then again she didn't expect for Twilight to go around and eat people. Now that Sunset thought about it, it was actually kind of...arousing to her.

Oh man this was more messed up than it should be. "S-So, were they good?" Sunset asked as her gaze continued to avert Twilight. The gluttonous princess licked her lips and gleefully nods. "So far Pinkie has tasted the best though. Oh, she tasted like every baked good wrapped up in one big cupcake. Mmhhh." Her hands rested against her belly.

"Hey, you okay?" Twilight asked as she looked at Sunset. The orange girl in question stiffened before forcing a grin.

"Of course! I uh...how about I find you some more to eat? Don't want my Twilight being hungry after all." And with that Sunset went off before Twilight could reply.
1131311122112222212.title: She was falling in love with Twilight!

choices: Was satisfied, and fell asleep to digest her latest binge meal.
Was no longer satisfied with normal food, and wanted something different to eat.
113131112211222222.content:
"I'm kinda hungry for some... Pancakes?" Twilight responded.
"Sure thing. Wouldn't want my big glutton getting too thin, right?" Sunset smiled, and headed into the kitchen.
Twilight wobbled her way to Flash's old couch, and forced her entire weight upon it. The couch collapsed, understandably, but Twilight just liked the wall keeping her upright.
"So, Twilight..." Sunset began to say, as she began making Twilight a big meal of Pancakes, "About you... Eating people. You do understand that's going to be only a luxury from now on, right?"
"I guess. I mean, I can't just eat everyone, or else there won't be anyone to rule over." Twilight responded, in a matter-of-factly manner.
"Yup. So that's why I'm only having you eat certain people, and once we have the town under our control, we can get them to feed you as much of whatever you want, when you want it." Sunset explained with a big grin.
Twilight was ecstatic at the thought of being in total control of a group of slaves, all willing to feed her and fatten her up to immense proportions. If there was one thing Twilight loved now, it was being as obese as possible.

Sunset, after about an hour of cooking, finished the Pancakes. She had multiple plates, each stacked high with buttery, cinnamon and chocolate-chip Pancakes. It looked very appetetizing, and Twilight was willing to eat it all. She began devouring the first pile while Sunset watched in awe.
"You can really eat..." Sunset mentioned, poking Twilight's fat folds.
Twilight was too busy eating to respond, but gave her a subtle nod and sound to indicate she heard her.
Sunset knew that even all of this would only satisfy Twilight by barely 10%, so she went to work on cooking up more food for the glutton. She wanted Twilight to be stuffed to the brim, to see how much she could truly take.

As well, she knew that if she ran out of food in this house, she could move over to another house and raid their kitchen for food.
Twilight just ate all the food Sunset was giving her, finishing them just as soon as Sunset was done with another batch of goodies.

When Sunset finished clearing the kitchen of two other homes, Twilight...
113131112211222222.title: "How about pancakes?"

choices: Sunset rests against Twilight, waiting for her to wake up.
Speaking of which, Sunset's a bit hungry herself.
1131311122112222221.content:
Twilight licked her lips as she finished off everything Sunset had fixed for her. Her hand rested against her ginormous gut as she sighed contently. With a confident smile across her face, Sunset walked over to the other and sat next to her. She needed to ensure Twilight felt comfortable working with her. What better way than to make her feel happy? An orange hand rested on her flab and started to rub it in a circular motion. Twilight was a bit surprised by this at first but it certainly wasn't unwelcome.

"Just think about, Twilight. Soon you'll have dozens of people doing whatever you say. They'll have delicious human food ready whenever you desire it. And if any get out of line? Well, you can help yourself to a human snack. Doesn't that sound lovely?" A smile graced across Twilight's pudgy face as she indeed thought about it. And it sounded wonderful.

"It does. I can't wait to take over." She gave a yawn and relaxed in her spot. Seems all that eating had tuckered her out once more. And so Twilight slowly closed her eyes and fell asleep, while Sunset continued to gently rub her belly. A devious smile was across her face. "I can't wait either, Twilight." Sunset's gaze shifted from Twilight's sleeping form to her gurgling belly. For some reason it made Sunset feel...odd. Like she wanted to feel and grope at it. Twilight's flab did look very soft and squishable though. Perhaps it reminded her briefly of the first time she entered this world.

Truth be told something similar had happened to Sunset as well. But certainly not to the degree that Twilight had gone too. Sunset had tried every fast food place in the city, even forced some folks to make her goodies. By the end of her first year there, Sunset had gotten a nice pot belly. Which only had gotten bigger by year two. She managed to get a hold of herself though and lose it all.

But with Twilight...she wasn't going to lose this anytime soon.
1131311122112222221.title: Was satisfied, and fell asleep to digest her la...

choices: An abandoned air base, one Sunset had taken over as her own unofficially.
A cave system, one Sunset had used before she found civilization long ago.
11313111221122222211.content:
Sunset laid her head against Twilight's belly, and rested there peacefully. It was like a giant, squishy beanbag chair. She loved every moment of it, and dreamed of making Twilight into a Goliath of flab.
She woke up several hours later, to much their surprise there was a group of people hovering over them, watching them sleep.
"H-hey! What do you four punks think your doing?" Sunset asked them, angry.
"We... We were seeing if Flash Sentry was here." On of the boys responded, fear in his words. They must've been Flash's friends.
"Oh, well, um... Flash isn't here, so you can go now." Sunset stated hastily.
"Really? He isn't picking up his phone at all, or answering my texts." One of the girls stated.
Sunset was panicking. It wouldn't be long before these idiots put the pieces together, she needed a plan. That's when it hit her.
She donned a devious smirk, and all four were more scared than ever. They all tried running for the door, but Sunset was much quicker. She locked the door, and grabbed a nearby Rod and whacked them all unconscious.

Twilight woke up shortly after, as Sunset left the Kitchen.
"Oh, Twilight! I have a surprise for you." Sunset greeted Twilight from her slumber.
"What is it, Sunset?" Twilight asked, as Sunset rolled in three knocked out humans in chairs.
"These people were trespassing, and I felt you could do the honors of getting rid of the evidence." Sunset winked as she said the last few words. Twilight nodded, it's been too long since she's tasted human. She wanted it now.
She started with the more bulky one, when he got halfway in her mouth she moaned pleasantly, and he just slid right in.
The second one woke up halfway through, but the gag kept her screams from being audible.
The third one was a tough pill to swallow, but Twiligjt managed to force him in. When all was said and done, twilight barely grew at all, regular humans were barely fattening at all, but the taste and experience was divine.
"As for the fourth one, I made her watch the whole thing." Sunset said, gesturing towards a girl tied up in the kitchen. "I'm gonna let her go free, and warn her that the same fate will fall upon her and everyone she loves if she tells anyone about this!" Sunset explained.
Twilight was actually liking how cruel and villainous Sunset was being. It was all so fresh to her, and made her love doing this even more.
"Speaking of, don't you think this area is a bit... Open? Not to mention cramped, shouldn't we find somewhere less easily accessible to the public?" Twilight asked.
"Great minds think alike, sister." Sunset tapped her head.

After releasing her hostage she went 'round the back and came back with a pickup truck.
"Perfect!" Twilight said, as Sunset used her entire body to roll Twilight into the trunk of the truck.
The two drove off the beaten path, heading to a place only Sunset knew about. When the reached their destination, it was revealed to be..
11313111221122222211.title: Sunset rests against Twilight, waiting for her ...

choices: Sunset wants to talk with her for a while.
Back in Equestria, Princess Celestia knows something is very wrong...
113131112211222222111.content:
It was an abandoned air base, just on the outskirts of the city. No one ever stopped by there anymore considering its condition. Although it only looked terrible on the outside. Sunset had devoted quite a lot of time making the inside look neat and far more homely. It severed as a nice place to hide out at or where she could work on future plans. Sunset stopped the truck and watched as Twilight got out.

"An air base?" Twilight questioned as she turned her attention to Sunset. "Yeah, it's been abandoned for many years. No one knew what to do with it so they just left it. Don't worry, it's much nicer on the inside. Come on, let's get you inside. I don't want you getting cold." Sunset smiled as they walked. Twilight chuckled, causing her rolls of flab to jiggle. "I'm pretty sure I don't have to worry about that. I've got enough meat on my bones to keep me plenty warm." And indeed Twilight was quite warm to touch. Sunset knew that because her body kept rubbing up against Twilight's.

Looking around inside, Sunset had been right. It was much nicer inside than on the outside. Almost...homely actually. "Make yourself comfortable, Twilight. We'll be staying here until we can figure out the best method of taking over this city." Twilight smiled and nods her head as she moved on over to the nearest wall and rested against it. She sighed happily, content for now.
113131112211222222111.title: An abandoned air base, one Sunset had taken ove...

choices: Follow Rainbow as she searches for Sunset.
Return to Twilight and Sunset, who were preparing for another feeding session.
1131311122112222221112.content:
Strange disappearances. No word from Twilight in over a week. Needless to say, someone was bound to notice eventually.
Or, Some PONY.

Princess Celestia has no way of keeping track of Twilight while in the Human World, but she can learn of the repercussions of her actions. While certain actions, events and at some points entire personalities may be different from Ponies and their Human Counterpart, one thing that stays the same is their status physically, even if it makes no sense. It's the magical bond the two figures share, so if one piece of the link dies, then the other dies. If one is, say, digested in the stomach of a supposed "Friend", then the other will melt away into nothing.
Celestia has seen this before, and knows what's going on. Either Sunset has returned to her plan of eating all the humans to control Equestria, or she's using someone else to get her way. But who could Sunset be manipulating? Who would agree to such a crazy act?

It didn't matter. Celestia knew this got far out of hoof, and had to send Twilight's only remaining friend to stop Sunset, Rainbow Dash.
"Do not be intimidated by whatever size either Sunset or her Puppet is, all you need to do is overpower her." Celestia stated, after explaining the situation to Rainbow.
"How? How would I be able to take on something as big as your describing?" Rainbow asked, a bit worried.
"Aren't scared, are you?" Celestia smirked, playing off Rainbow's superiority complex.
"N-no! I just... feel like I need a little bit of a boost to help me fight if it comes to that." Rainbow stated.
"Don't worry, I have just the thing." Celestia said, and handed Rainbow a green gem. "This Gem, when activated, will allow you to grow up to five times your own size. This will give you an upper hand, at least."
Rainbow nodded, took a breath, and went through the portal.

When she was through, she had the arduous task of actually finding where Sunset was.
1131311122112222221112.title: Back in Equestria, Princess Celestia knows some...

choices: Rainbow finds Sunset and Twilight. She's both horrified and enraged by this.
Someone pulls her aside, wanting to warn Rainbow Dash.
11313111221122222211121.content:
"Okay Rainbow, you can do this." She muttered to herself as she tried to get the hang of her new body. She needed to find Sunset Shimmer and put an end to all of this madness. More importantly, to make her pay for what she did to her friends. Fluttershy, Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie Pie....they were all gone now. And there was no word on Twilight either. For all Rainbow knew, Twilight could've suffered the same fate. Such a thought only made her heart ache even more.

Spotting a few homes nearby, Rainbow made her way into them. This didn't look normal. In fact it seemed like someone had broken into them. Rainbow was never the smartest of the gang but even she knew what this meant. Sunset Shimmer must have been here. Getting rid of these alternate versions that would then affect hers. What an absolute monster...

Clutching the gem in her pocket, Rainbow took notice of some tracks leaving the area. Well, she didn't have much else to go on. And so the human followed the truck tracks as she slowly made her way towards the abandoned air base.
11313111221122222211121.title: Follow Rainbow as she searches for Sunset.

choices: Later, when Twilight awakens, Rainbow has been fully digested.
Twilight has a very peculiar dream.
113131112211222222111211.content:
Rainbow walked for what felt like hours on the tracks, must've seemed much faster if she were on that truck. She was afraid of what she might see at the end of the tracks, but stayed brave, for she knew whatever lied beyond would be easily defeated. She had the gem, and she'd be able to overpower anything she needed to.
She reached the end of the tracks, and found the old Airbase. She was confused as to why Sunset would choose such a run-down old trash heap, but she'd most likely be able to ask questions when she found her.
Giggling could be heard coming from a nearby hangar, so she headed that direction. But what she found shocked her, and almost made her sick...

Twilight's easily-recognizable purple belly was jutting out from her new immense body. She was enjoying a five course meal when Rainbow came in.
"R-Rainbow!" Twilight stated, trying to move the food from her face, "What're you doing here? How'd you..."
"Twilight..." Rainbow Dash interrupted, "Please tell me this is some kind of sick joke."
"Joke? What're you... Oh, no, you're Equestria Rainbow Dash? You... Found out..." Twilight began to feel guilty for all she's done, seeing the look of utter betrayal on Rainbow's face.
"So this is all real? You ATE our friends?!" Rainbow roared out up to Twilight, "I can't believe you... We all trusted you, and you repay us like THIS?!??"
"Rainbow, I-I-I... I..." Twilight was at a loss for words. She didn't know what she could say to make things seem better. But that's when Sunset came in.
"Well, well. If it isn't the last remaining friend Twilight had." Sunset cackled.
"You... YOU! What have you turned my friend into, you sick, twisted... Demon??" Rainbow interrogated Sunset, pushing her back rudely.
"Nothing. She did this to herself, and she agreed to let me help her." Sunset explained, painfully truthfully.
Rainbow couldn't believe it. Not only was Twilight working for Sunset, but she was doing so WILLINGLY. Rainbow fell to her knees in disbelief. This was a nightmare, it was bad enough all her friends were dead, but now her only remaining friend is the REASON they're all gone!

Rainbow had no choice.
"Twilight..." Rainbow stated, her hair shadow covering her eyes.
"Y-yes?" Twilight responded.
"...I'm sorry."
Rainbow activated the Gem, and began to grow large. She became half the size of the hangar, her clothes ripped, revealing much more of herself than she would want.
Twilight was sad, realizing what Rainbow what about to do. Rainbow backed up for a running start, and began charging at Twilight. Rainbow lifted herself into the air, and flung herself downwards, fists-first. And then...

GULP!

Against all odds, Twilight's mouth managed to fit the speeding Rainbow into her mouth, and she devoured the immense, 30+-foot Teen in under a second.
Her belly grew three time's it's original size, Rainbow's outline of her body was still needing to digest before it reaches the rest of Twilight's body, namely her round belly. Which was now much more jagged than before.
"Wow... That was impressive." Sunset said simply.
"Well, at least we won't have to worry about her anymore." Twilight stated, "Still... I'm beginning to feel bad about what I did."
"Don't worry about it. They're gone, and now you only have you and me to worry about, Plumpycakes. Now, how about you rest off your meal? I can't wait to see you when you digested your 25-foot ex-friend!" Sunset smiled, patted Twilight on the belly, and headed off to her Kitchen/Bedroom.

Twilight sighed, and got some well deserved rest...
113131112211222222111211.title: Shocked and appalled

choices: Twilight complies and sleeps. What trick up Sunset's sleeve does she have?
Twilight disagrees. She wants to speak with Celestia when she arrives.
1131311122112222221112112.content:
A happy laugh erupted from the large gluttonous entity known as Twilight Sparkle as she rested on her own personal throne. At her beck and call were humans ready to serve and comfort her when she pleased. The city was now under her and Sunset's thumb. Hearing the doors open, she could see many bring in dozens of delicious goodies from all around the world. Oh, they all looked so good! Grabbing a fork and a knife, she planned on digging into the first batch of food. That is until...

"Twilight Sparkle!" An angry voice echoed through the halls before Princess Luna herself materialized inside Twilight's dream. And by her expression, she was not pleased with the pony-turned-human. A look of shock and horror came over Twilight as now she was suddenly alone with the pony princess of the night. Not to mention she had returned to her original pony form. Twilight let out a small shriek as she stared at her hooves. "P-Princess Luna? What..I don't..?"

"Silence!" She snorted angrily as she peered down at the fellow alicorn. "I can not believe you, Twilight. After all that you've been through, it merely took food to sway your mind to evil? You should be ashamed of yourself..." Twilight however was still attempting to wrap her mind over the fact that Luna was in her dreams at the moment. Of course, she knew Luna could do that but she was in the human world right now! Not back in Ponyville.

"I...but it was so good." Twilight attempted to argue before averting her gaze from Luna. "So good that you felt the need to devour your friends? Twilight, I've never seen such a horrid act of evil. I am here to give you a warning. My sister will be arriving to this world soon to put an end to you and Sunset. And she will have her magic to deal with you two. I'm...sorry it had to come down to this. Goodbye, Twilight." And with that, Luna vanished. Twilight called out however as she trotted over to the spot Luna had been.

Jolted awake from her dream, Twilight panted as a frightful look spread across her face. Her head perked up as she heard Sunset call out her name. "Is everything okay, Twilight?" Sunset walked over to her, resting her orange hands on Twilight's ginormous belly. Twi bit her lip as she pondered whether or not to tell her.

"I...Princess Luna visited me in my dream. Celestia's coming soon..." Sunset's eyes widened in shock as she stared up at Twilight. She could tell the obese girl was scared. After all, who wouldn't be?

"There, there Twilight." Sunset comforted the other as she slowly moved onto Twilight. Her tone was soothing and kind to help ease the other. "I'll handle Celestia." A gentle hand went to cup one of Twilight's pudgy cheeks.

"But..." An orange finger pressed against her plump purple lips to silence her. "Go back to sleep and don't worry about her. I'll take care of Celestia for you, okay?"
1131311122112222221112112.title: Twilight has a very peculiar dream.

choices: Twilight had completely digested Rainbow, and was hungry for more food.
Twilight was still asleep, so Sunset decided to join her in a quick nap.
11313111221122222211121121.content:
Twilight, against her better judgement, decided to trust Sunset and fell back asleep.
Sunset would not let Twilight's trust go to waste, and slid off of Twilight's massive belly. She grabbed a bag, that was propped up against a wall, and headed outside to wait for Celestia to arrive.

Sunset waited until high dawn for Celestia to arrive, she cocked a smirk when the blast of white light blinded the area. When the light faded, the Pony Celestia appeared.
"Sunset, I have little time in this world, but I shall make it brief. Surrender now, or I'll be forced to do something drastic." Celestia demanded.
"Funny, in my eyes, I think I have more reason to say that then you, Ms. Bossy." Sunset shot back sassily, "Because I have something you don't."
"Yeah, that's kinda why I came here." Celestia mentioned.

Cinch stared at the letter, her eyes constantly moving about to see if she was reading it right. To be fair, the several red ink stamps did obscure a few words, but the message was clear. She was skating on thin ice with the school board and it was all about to crack and leave her exposed to the icy waters.

Everything was going downhill ever since those accursed Friendship Games and the magical incident that followed. After that display, it was like some switch had been gradually flipped on all of her students. Thier drives against other schools were lowering despite her attempts, they were actually being friendly to Canterlot High and other schools, they barely listened to her let alone the replacement she got for Cadence after she gave her resignation. Even worse, students were beginning to blab about this that should have been kept secret, deals and bribes of all sorts now coming to light. Parents began to question, and investigations began happening right under her nose. And now this.

"Miss Auntie Tryhard, will you deal with a letter for me?" Cinch would never get used to calling her Auntie even if the woman was young enough to be a Luna to her Celestia. This was all Twilight's fault. That miserable, ungrateful brat. She ruined everything. Her reputation was in shambles because of that freak. Ever curious, Twilight walked forward to examine the table, or at least as much as she could see of it. She had been standing by the end, where a large, glittering throne was on display. And on the table, filling all of the space it could muster was an entire buffet of unbelievable proportions. Whole roast turkeys with mashed potatoes and gravy, fried shrimp, carrots and broccoli in a stew, donuts, blueberry pie, you could name whatever you wanted and if Twilight couldn't see it, it was somewhere on that table.

Twilight would have certainly been interested if she didn't remember just who had brought her here and how they did it. "What do you want Cinch?" Twilight called out blindly into the darkness, her knowledge of situations like this telling Cinch would probably hear.

"My dear Twilight. Is it wrong for a teacher to want to visit thier prized pupil and give them a feat?" Cinch's voice was soft, laden with honey. In her case, that meant something was indeed up.

"I'm not hearing it." Twilight turned away from the table, arms folded. "After everything you did to me, I am never listening to you again."

Two cold hands gripped Twilight's shoulders, tossing her towards the throne at the end of the table. Twilight landed in it with a hard hit to her sides, followed by cold steel wrapping around her arms and legs. The chair had her held in place, she was trapped. 1432.content:
Spike snickered to himself as he poured what was labeled "love potion" into Rarity's tea. The young dragon had swiped the vial from Twilight's library/lavatory back at the castle of friendship, the purple alicorn far too engrossed in her books to notice the act of thievery. Spike knew it was wrong but he had grown tired of hoping for Rarity to return or even notice his feelings for her. Thus, impatient and naive he had stolen from the person he viewed as a sister and was now setting about sabotaging his biggest crush.

Today he had come to help Rarity design some new gowns and dressing for an upcoming festival. As usual his heart beat faster whenever the alabaster-coated unicorn was present. He had already nearly twice spilt the beans and confessed his crime before even committing to it. Now though, after she had politely asked him to brew some tea for her to sip upon whilst designing some lace patterns, Spike dumped the whole vial into her teacup. It's not like there were any real instructions for the potion. In fact, the label was badly aged and tattered, the L and O of Love being the only letters properly visible, but the rest of the smudged ink clearly said "love potion" and Spike had enough faith in magic to know that this plan would work.

Carrying the tea out to Rarity who was happily working away Spike was woefully unaware of the potions true effects. the L and O that were on the label were actually part of a much longer word that had faded out over time.

Ignorant of his error Spike still had second thoughts as he approached Rarity. She was so kind and caring, not only towards him but to everyone else. If only he could make her see him as a guy instead of a little baby. Hopefully this potion would be the jumpstart he needed to win her over. But should he really go through with such a thing?
1432.title: No, Spike's secret plan.

Unaware of the true identity of the potion he had spiked her tea with, Spike happily strolled out of the kitchen and gave Rarity her tea cup from which she immediately took a delicate sip before returning to her work. Over the next several minutes Spike patiently waited for results while helping Rarity design and build her dresses.The luxurious unicorn occasionally drank from the teacup and by the time an hour had passed the cup was empty. However, Spike hadn't noticed anything out of the ordinary with his crush and started to wonder if he should have looked into the "love" potion more deeply. Perhaps it had a delayed effect?

Spike was snapped out of his worries though when Rarity set her tailoring tools down and spoke to him.

"Spike darling, could you be a dear and run into the kitchen and bring back some of those scones I had laid out. I'm feeling rather peckish all of a sudden." The mare rubbed a hoof along her midsection as a low growl emanated from within her.

"Actually, just bring them all. I could use the chance for a break after all."

He didn't even reach the table before Rarity's horn glowed with magic as she levitated a scone right over to her mouth, taking a rather big and un-ladylike bite out of the pastry. She barely chewed before swallowing down the large mouthful.

"Ulp....aaaah that hit the spot. Now for some more."

With that Rarity steadily chowed down on the scones. Eating them in record time and incredible ease. Spike just watched, forgetting to have one himself, as his crush consumed the calorie laden baked goods. She didn't even pause between the last few scones, swallowing the very last one in one big bite that left a small bulge travelling down her neck and into her torso.

For a moment Rarity's eyes went wide and it looked as if she had just realized the wanton display of gluttony she had performed. However her cheeks suddenly swelled as she had to swallow back down a belch that had tried to force its way out of her mouth. Licking her lips free of crumbs the mare turned to Spike as her stomach rumbled once again and asked...
14321.title: Yes, Spike gives her what is actually a "Gl...

143211.content:
"I am terribly sorry darling but I'll have to ask you to fetch some more snacks, perhaps something with more sustenance this time. It seems like my creative streak needs more fuel than I had thought."

As Spike once again headed off for the kitchen Rarity rubbed her chin with a hoof as she thought.

Now why am I so frightfully hungry? I just ate over ten scones! That's far from a healthy, let alone reasonable amount for a mare like me to eat in one sitting. But oooh my stomach still feels empty. Perhaps once I have a bit more then I'll dive back into work before I can be distracted again

Sadly Rarity's gut had a difference of opinion with her mind.When spike returned with a hayburger and fires she wolfed them down without even glancing at her designs. Rarity had never been a fast eater, proper manners prevented her from doing so, but for some reason she now abandoned all of her etiquette and protocol in order to stuff as many calories into her body as possible. She chewed quick and loudly, a light shower of crumbs scattered down her coat as she tore into the burger. Upon finishing it she then ate the fries, levitating several at a time into her mouth until it could barely hold them all before taking a HUGE swallow that sent the gravy soaked mass down into her stomach.

She "was" going to turn around on her stool and go right back to work but Rarity suddenly clapped both of her hooves over her mouth as a powerful amount of gas tried to escape from her in the form of a rather uncouth belch. She managed to stifle most of it but the sound still echoed in the otherwise quiet room.

"Uuuuurp!"

Spike stared at his crush, stunned and somewhat worried.

Rarity's face went bright red, "Oh I'm so sorry for that rude display Spike. Where have my manners gone? Never mind let's get back to work shall we?"

Rarity truly intended to do so but she now found herself thirsty and rather than once again send Spike off she decided to get a drink herself. Perhaps a small bowl of ice cream too. Just to tie her over and keep her from getting peckish again. After all, she had work to do and couldn't spend all day eating.

Getting up and off of her seat the Unicorn was aware of how the contents inside her stuffed belly moved about with each step she took. She was truly bloated and felt disgusted but also....discontent? As if she wanted more food despite every nerve in her brain trying to say otherwise. Her stomach growled though, like a restless bear and Rarity soon found herself sipping from a glass of water whilst levitating dish after dish out of her fridge and onto the kitchen table.

Without a word she began to dig in, her stomachs growls increasing as drool formed in her mouth. Like a pig at a trough Rarity bent her head down and went whole hog on all manner of food. She was dimly aware of Spike nervously watching her but the white coated mare was far more interested in guzzling, chewing, sucking, and slurping down as much food as she could. Surely she'd fill her stomach at some point right?

In actuality Rarity was fighting a losing battle. The Gluttony Potion Spike had unknowingly given her was overriding her own sense of judgement just as it was enabling her stomach to handle far more food than any mare should be able to. Already the stuff she had eaten early was being broken down into nutritious slurry and distributed across her body as soft fat. With each passing moment Rarity was putting on the pounds though she was too busy gorging herself to notice her midsection soften and swell, a slight curve forming to give her a noticeable gut by the time she had cleared the table.

Spike's jaw was now on the floor and his mind racing in an effort to think of what to do while he watched Rarity lick her lips and then lick all the plates clean. He felt like he should do something, but what? This wasn't normal! Was it some sort of spell, Was Discord loose and spreading chaos over the town. The fact that the very potion he had given her could be responsible hand't entered his young mind and Spike was soon distracted as Rarity got up and marched over to her fridge, midsection churning and groaning loudly as she opened the fridge door and stuck her head inside.

"Ommmph! Gulp! Ulp! Gobble! Scarf. Much..."

Spike began biting his claws. This was bad, at this rate Rarity would puff up like a marshmallow. Already her could see her middle expanding. Rarity had never been fat in all the time he had seen her and he wasn't sure how he felt about watching the object of his affection glutting herself to the point of putting on weight in real time.

Rarity on the other hand was having no second thoughts. Directly eating out of the fridge was a much faster way to eat and as her cheeks bulged and throat pulsed she began to wonder why she had never binged before? Sure she was hardly tasting what travelled down her gullet but Rarity didn't care.her tummy felt taut and full but with each bite she took it managed to accommodate more food. The feeling of being stuffed to the limit, becoming heavy and slow, it was a new and euphoric experience for the unicorn and she couldn't stop herself from wanting more..... Her belly rumbled like thunder, demanding more food and the loud noise made Spike and Rarity snap out of their thoughts and ponder what to do now?

1452331.content:
Rarity sat in her home thinking about how perfect she was. These self-absorbed thoughts came with increasing frequency the past few days. Of course they were there before, but never like this. She had been able to suppress that part of herself so her friends rarely saw it. The normal Rarity had been changing too. Being around her friends had made that part of her smaller and smaller. But now it was coming back with a vengeance.

Rarity smiled to herself as the latest thought came into her head about how perfect her body was and how everyone should love it. “Oh yes, everypony should worship me! I need all of their attention at all times. I can’t BEAR to go a day without being worshipped! What is a goddess like me going to do??” Rarity paced around her room and wondered how she would make everypony see how irresistible she was. She was lost in thought when she tripped on an old spellbook. “What is this? Oh...I remember now. Twilight gave it to me.” She said aloud. She liked talking to herself more lately because she loved how her voice sounded. Yes, she was becoming extremely self-obsessed. “Let’s see what’s in it,” she said and opened the book. She recognized a few spells in the book. Some that she had used but mostly what Twilight had used. Rarity wasn’t much of a spellcaster. She could do it of course, but her passion had always been fashion. She believed that magic was something not worth her time—unless she could use it to help her make dresses. She still had this opinion now until she saw one particular spell- Want It, Need It. She had a flashback to when Twilight used it on her stuffed animal and made everyone go crazy for it. People really seemed to be...obsessed with it. A dark smile spread across Rarity’s face. “That’s it! I will cast it on myself and everypony in Ponyville will be completely obsessed with me!” Rarity giggled. She was giddy with joy now. She put the book on the ground and did the incantion. It was surprisingly easy. She felt her whole body tingle as the spell did its work. After a few seconds, Rarity felt it stop. “I don’t feel any different,” she said. Looking at herself in the mirror, Rarity did notice a few changes. Her ass seemed bigger. Way bigger. She was definitely bottom-heavy now. Her face also looked a bit cuter, with bigger eyes and longer eyelashes. She batted them playfully and giggled at how perfect it looked. Rarity, being so completely obsessed with herself already, wasn’t affected by the spell, which meant that she didn’t realize the potency of what she had done to herself. She didn’t understand what lengths other ponies would go to to have her. But Rarity, of course, wasn’t thinking logically. She was just thinking with her immense ego.

On one hand, this was exactly the kind of look that her insane egotistical personality wanted from other ponies, but on the other hand this was her sister. Rarity finally spoke. “S-Sweetie Belle, darling, I need to go upstairs for a minute, ok?” Sweetie Belle didn’t respond. She seemed to be completely focused on staring at Rarity. She moved even closer until she was a hoof away from her. Rarity saw love hearts form in her sister’s eyes and her body shuddered. “Rarity...I love you. Please, I love you so much...” Rarity felt conflicted now. Her sister was backing her against the wall. As much as her logical side told her this was crazy, she was still the insane self-obsessed Rarity. Every compliment from her sister weakened her resistance. Finally, she couldn’t take it anymore. “Sweetie Belle, tell me how much you love my utterly perfect body.” Sweetie Belle’s eyes widened and said a never-ending stream of compliments. Rarity shuddered, feeling extremely aroused from all of this attention. Sweetie Belle started stroking her hoof on Rarity’s body, feeling every inch of her. Then she started pressing her against the wall and kissing her. She wouldn’t let her go. Rarity returned the kisses, loving all of this attention on her perfect form. She wasn’t looking at Sweetie Belle, though. She was always gazing at her own body. Her legs, her chest, anything that was in her vision. She was just as obsessed with herself as Sweetie Belle was with her, after all.
14523313.title: The first victim

15111.title: She's let herself go with all the sweets...

151112.content:
"Oh, pinkie, this is delicious... Can I have some more?" Fluttershy begged, to which Pinkie responded, "Of course! Anything for a friend...."
Pinkie grabbed a pile of Cupcakes on a plate for Fluttershy, and she ate another cupcake... Then another... Then another...

Fluttershy soon finished them all, and gained a significant amount of weight from it. Her belly was poking up from her chest, and she was working on a second chin. "Ooohh..." Fluttershy groaned.

Fluttershy thought for a moment about all this, but her belly roared louder than her mind, and she began to eat the many cakes, one by one.

BUUUUUUURP!

Pinkie lifted Fluttershy's huge body and took her to a scale, "700 pounds!" Pinkie recited from the scale. "It's good, but I'm sure she could be larger..." Pinkie thought.

Fluttershy's belly was growing larger than 2 ponies, and was still growing.
"1,300 pounds... I want you fatter!" Pinkie complained, and she upped the power on the machine.

As Pinkie turned the machine up more, Fluttershy's belly started to expand more and more. The scale started to go up and up with each pound added. Fluttershy was still asleep as she was getting filled with cream from the hose. Her belly continued to grow bigger and bigger and rounder. The scale peaked at 2200 when the machine stopped.

Fluttershy was now pretty large. Starting to get too big for the basement. But Pinkie wasn't ready to end things just yet.

"Let's get you outside so you have more room to grow." Pinkie said.

With some heavy rolling and lifting, Pinkie rolled Fluttershy outside and....
151112112.title: Bigger and bigger

Fluttershy was now bigger than the block.
1511121121.content:
It was heavy work for Pinkie to move Fluttershy outside of Sugarcube Corner and laid her her her big belly. It was nighttime.

"There." Pinkie said wiping the sweat off her forehand. "Now time to really get to work."

Pinkie brought the machine again. So also to the time to make more pudding and add even more of that weight gain/hunger powder. Also some sleepy powder to keep Fluttershy asleep. So it was clear that Fluttershy was gonna end up even bigger than before. Pinkie grabbed the hose and put it into Fluttershy's mouth. She was still asleep, which Pinkie was okay with. Pinkie then turned on the machine and the pudding was released.

As Fluttershy was fed the pudding, it didn't take long for her start expanding. Fluttershy's belly started growing wider and wider with every passing second. Pinkie pressed her hooves into her blobby belly.

"Hehehe! You're belly is like a squishy waterbed." Pinkie said happily. "Let's make it squishier."

Pinkie then turned the machine up to the max. Fluttershy began to grow farther. Her belly was now bigger than the first floor of Sugarcube Corner. Fluttershy's leg were thicker, her flank was the size of a carousel, her neck had three really thick chins, and really round cheeks the size of beach balls. She would only get bigger with time. After an hour.....
1511121121.title: Layed her on her belly.

choices: See if Twilight has a useful spell.
Do some research, maybe see if anything in the Everfree forest can help...
15112.content:
Fluttershy gave a despondent sigh as she looked at herself in the mirror, face to face with probably the least intimidating creature in the history of Equestria.

Just today a local vendor had cheated her out of her money, and even went so far as to directly mock her about it. It was at that moment she'd realized just how soft she was, and how easily she'd let other ponies pass her by. Rarity and Pinkie told her she needed to be more assertive, but it'd be pretty hard with such a cuddly appearance.

"Oh, Angel Bunny…How can I possibly be more assertive when I look like this?" She'd always been a bit on the short side, with slender legs that didn't bear that much muscle or bounce. "If only I was a little bit bigger…"

Running a hoof across her leg, she felt how lean and scrawny it was. Realizing how little substance she bore, she grew a determined look.

"From this point on, I'm going to do everything I can to get bigger!"

But the pride faded as she looked at herself, dreading how long that'd take.

"But how can I do that so soon?"
15112.title: She intentionally bulks up to become assertive ...

151122.content:
Fluttershy walked over to Twilights house, in hopes that she might find some useful spell to aid her.

"Oh, hi, Fluttershy!" Twilight answered when Fluttershy knocked on her door, "How's it going?"
"Fine, say, are there any... weight alteration spells you could try on me?" Fluttershy asked nervously.
Twilight seemed a bit curious, "Huh? Fluttershy, what would you need of one of those kinds of spells?"
"W-well, you see... I've always been so thin and scrawny because I spend so much time with my animals. I want to eat a lot, and get fat, but I could never find the time, what with my animals needing my constant attention." Fluttershy explained.
"Fluttershy, I'm sorry, but I couldn't just-" Twilight was cut off,
"Please, Twilight? I'm only asking to be a few pounds overweight, not much! Do this for me?" Fluttershy begged.

"Uhh..." Twilight began.
151122.title: See if Twilight has a useful spell.

choices: ...was only 5 pounds overweight, just as Twilight said.
