"Alright, but only a few pounds?" Twilight confirms.
"Yes, I'm not looking to be too obese here." Fluttershy nods.

They enter the basement of Twilight's home, for utmost privacy.
"Alright, Fluttershy. This spell with cause you to put on only 5 pounds overweight. You ready?" Twilight explains.
Fluttershy takes a deep breath, "Ready..."
Twilight blasts a beam of purple energy towards Fluttershy, and in a brilliant light, Fluttershy...
1511221.title: Twilight agrees, and uses one of her spells on ...

15112211.content:
Fluttershy glanced down at her features, hoping Twilight's spell worked. She could tell that a new layer of fat was there since it made certain parts of her body more prominent than before. While it was only 5 pounds overweight, Fluttershy had always been on the skinnier side. So suddenly going from thin to thick was definetly a change ponies would notice pretty quickly.
She couldn't get too good of a view of herself from her position (Fluttershy noted the slight difficulty turning her neck), so Fluttershy decided the bathroom mirror would help. But upon lifting a pudgier leg, the pegasus realized something. Her sense of balance wasn't used to her being fat, so her three supporting legs trembled. They lacked the muscle to carry such a heavy pony. Fluttershy placed her lifted hoof back down, trying to gain some balance.
After a silent minute of her attempting to find her center of balance, she repeated her previous motion, this time expecting the trouble. Of course, she almost tipped over once again, but took a step forward this time. Fluttershy exhaled a breath she didn't realize she took, and prepared another hoof. If walking was going to be this tough, maybe she could just ask to become skinny again.
It seemed like forever until Fluttershy reached Twilight's bathroom. By then, she didn't want to walk anywhere ever again. She plopped herself down on the bathroom floor, noticing another change from the spell. A slight jiggle rippled throughout her body. The sensation felt strange and alien, and the pegasus didn't know how to react. So for the time being, Fluttershy ignored the ripple, and set her eyes upon her reflection in the bathroom mirror.
She didn't know what she was expecting, probably to look less small and weak, but what she saw surprised her either way. The fat not only made her larger, but it gave her a cuter look. Puffy cheeks hung off Fluttershy's face, giving her the face of chipmunk almost. A slightly lower hanging belly did nothing for the assertive idea she hoped for, and might even make her a target for insults. Finally, the rump on her back end spread across the floor, and reached out wider than her body itself. Standing up, Fluttershy panted in fatigue from the previously simple move. She lifted a sweaty hoof, pressing it into her hefty gut. It sunk in deep, and reminded Fluttershy of the hibernating animals she often cared for, like a big ball of squishy dough just waiting to be molded.
Fluttershy tore her eyes away from the sight she was, and turned towards the bathroom door. Twilight stood innocently next to her. She had a gentle smile upon her face. Was she waiting for Fluttershy's opinion?
15112211.title: 5 pounds overweight.

choices: Gain some weight on her own, maybe binge a little?
Tell somepony, maybe Pinkie Pie. She could keep a secret.
151122111.content:
Fluttershy smiled widely, wishing for Twilight to believe her lie. She could insult Twilight's work, even if it didn't turn out quite right. The princess tried, and could not be burdened in any way.

"I'm glad to be of help," Twilight responded to her lie, "If you need anything more, then just ask."

"Thank you," Fluttershy spoke once again. With a quick goodbye, the pegasus left Twilight's dwelling, and made her way to her own. The journey there seemed much harder than before, with Fluttershy having to take frequent breaks to catch her breath. The ponies around her stopped and stared at the new Fluttershy, wondering what happened to the small pony they were accustomed to. She tried ignoring their gazes, and traversed Ponyville's roads in silence.

It took twice as long as it normally would to reach her destination, maybe even thrice. But when she made it, Fluttershy collapsed onto her couch in exhaustion. Her lungs gasped for air, but couldn't keep any in it seemed. Fluttershy found no motive to stand up, and laid on her comfy couch for a while. Somehow, the couch had become even more soft and comfortable since Fluttershy last sat on it.

Eventually, the pegasus drifted off to sleep, no longer tired as long as she slept. At first, Fluttershy dreamed of an average day in her life, taking care of her animals and spending quality time with her best friends. But that all changed when she returned home in the evening.

Angel stood on the couch, bouncing in place on top of the cushion. Fluttershy had told the bunny many times not to jump on the couch, and moved closer to his spot in preparation of a life lesson. She opened her mouth to say something, but a push on her back sent her toppling forwards. Angel leapt out of the way, and the pegasus sat on her couch. She attempted to stand, but found it was impossible. Ropes had appeared around her, locking her in place. The animals that occupied her home alongside her all seemed to disappear, but something else appeared in their place.

Stacks upon stacks of pastries, chocolate, apples, fast food, and anything else you can think up filled up her home. A peach colored platform with five tentacles sticking out levitated over to the closest pile of food, the cakes. Fluttershy thought of a word to describe the object, but only one, strange word came to mind. Hand.

The hand grasped a small cake, outlined in chocolate icing, chocolate sprinkles, and just chunks of chocolate bars stuck out of it. Fluttershy licked her lips. She always was a fool when it came to chocolate. She loved the way it melted across the tongue, the different flavors it came in, the many foods you could dip in a chocolate fondue, and the ways chocolate was used within a variety of recipes. She no longer struggled with the ropes that binded her, but opened her mouth and smelled the sent of chocolate that filled her nose.

A slice of the cake entered her mouth, and she chewed. The taste was something to be savored, so she did. Icing coated her tastebuds, and so did a piece of chocolate. It liquified almost instantly, spreading across her mouth so the only thing she could taste was the chocolate. It seemed to be almost like a mix of the creamy milk chocolate, and the delightful dark chocolate. She swallowed, then another piece of cake was placed in her mouth.

She could not get enough of the delicious cake she was being fed, and she groaned in hunger. She was in heaven, no longer denying it. The ropes were gone, but she didn't run. She chomped down more and more, until a second cake was brought to her. She had her eyes closed, so when a new flavor entered her mouth, it confused her. But this flavor completely trampled over the doubt she had about the new flavor. Strawberry juice dripped down the sides of the cake, but never seemed to fall off. Sliced strawberry was covering the top, with a vanilla cake that absorbed the flavor of the berry.

Fluttershy ate her way through this cake too, and a third. And it never came to mind where this was all going. She opened her eyes after finishing the third cake, an astonishing apple cake, with her eyes meeting a big ball of yellow that she didn't even notice was there. She poked it with a curious hoof, and it bounced slightly as the hoof sunk in. She took her other front hoof, and used both to rub the fat she accumulated. She hugged the mass, opening her mouth for even more food. She wanted to become bigger, and bigger.

Her belly, now the size of a yoga ball, was her main focus. All Fluttershy wanted now was to cuddle the pile of fat, to feel it wrap itself around her in a warm embrace. She rested her chin on top of it, and felt a new food push itself between her lips. Cupcakes.

A couple dozen cupcakes later, and Fluttershy was massive. She could no longer twist her head, or wiggle a pudgy limb, but continued to be fed. She could only imagine what she looked like, a complete ball of yellow. But another feeling, besides the warmth, softness, or pure happiness, appeared. A tugging at the back of her mind, like something was pulling her out of this world. Fluttershy opened her eyes wide. She didn't want to leave! Here, she was happy, and content. All she every wanted was here!

But the pulling continued, becoming even stronger. Fluttershy's vision went fuzzy, but before it disappeared completely, she could of sworn she saw the figure of a tall, black pony overlooking her.

The pegasus gasped, waking up from her dream. Sweat covered her body, and so did the fat she received from her visit to Twilights. Her oriented herself with her surroundings, and sat upwards. Looking down, the pudgy stomach she had in no way compared to what she had in the dream. In comparison, she might as well be even skinnier than before! But something nagged at her mind, like a bird pecking. Did she actually enjoy being like that? A blob that couldn't move on it's own?

Fluttershy thought through it, and came to an answer. She was a feedee. She heard of feedees from accidently eavesdropping in on other pony's conversation, and knew what they were about. But all this time, she never actually thought that she, a timid, scrawny pegasus, could of developed such a fetish. How should she approach her feelings, she thought. What to do?
151122111.title: "Thank you! This is perfect!"

1511221111.content:
One thing the pegasus knew for certain was she could not tell the others. How would they think of her afterwards? Rarity would be disgusted, plus will be forced to find a new model. Pinkie Pie has a habit of pressing on awkward topics, so she might let something this personal slip. Rainbow Dash is all about fitness and staying in shape. Twilight is a princess, a symbol of royalty. Finally, Applejack can't keep a secret for the life of her, and might tell somepony. Fluttershy sighed, thinking about how to go about things.

If she was going to do this alone, then a slight change in habit definetly could work. A slow gain assures that ponies wouldn't notice until she has developed a habit, and by then she has an excuse for not wanting to stop.

But even with her natural patience, slowly gaining wouldn't give her the results she desired, Fluttershy knew. Binging daily guarantees a larger weight gain, but her friends might get curious. She eventually would have to spill the beans, which might present e previously mentioned problems. Oh what to do?
1511221111.title: Gain some weight on her own, maybe binge a little?

choices: Fluttershy buys the cake, thanking Princess Luna silently
Fluttershy gets another cake, too suspicious of the chocolate one.
15112211111.content:
Weighing her options, the timid pegasus knew one thing. It would be better long term if she controlled herself for now. Once she 'developed a habit' and had an excuse, she could binge with more food and not be questioned. Fluttershy figured, her friends, being the caring ponies they were, most likely will put her on a diet and try to 'help' her. She sighed, wishing quietly that day would never come.

Once she made her decision, Fluttershy lifted her hooves and plopped them down on the floor. Her sleepy limbs had difficulty adjusting to the sudden added heft. Balance was hard to obtain, but eventually she found it. The pegasus made her way to the kitchen, feeling the effects of being overweight and skipping lunch and dinner. Actually, Fluttershy realized, she might of missed breakfast too. The sun was already peeking through the closed curtains, but how far in the sky it was was unknown. Then something dawned on her.

"Oh no," the pegasus spoke aloud, "I didn't feed the animals!"

-

The morning, maybe noon, was a hassle for Fluttershy. Animals tend to get frustrated when not fed for over 12 hours, plus her stomach just could not stop aching for some food the entire time. By the feeling of hunger she was not accustomed too, she figured her body used up those five access pounds she had asked for. It was past noon by the time she finished the chores she forgot about the prior day. And boy, was she hungry!

Fluttershy walked through Ponyville, searching for someplace to eat. Her stomach sounded like the Ursa Minor that once terrorized the town, which gathered the attention of others. Similar to yesterday, ponies gapped at the suddenly overweight Fluttershy. And one of them happened to be one of the ponies she wished to not bumped into just yet.

"Fluttershy?"

She turned around to meet the pony calling for her. A familiar white pony with an elegant, purple mane trotted up besides her. Rarity looked up and down Fluttershy's body, soaking up the new her.

"Darling, what happened to you?" Rarity exclaimed. The pegasus turned pink, tearing her eyes away from Rarity.

"I-I wanted to look more assertive," whispered the pudgy pony, "It didn't work out too well,"

Rarity dramatically flipped her hair, "Well, darling. Being assertive really doesn't suit you. Remember your last attempt at being assertive?"

"I want to look assertive, not be it. I still feel horrible for what I did,"

"Now, now. What Iron Fist did to you can't be blamed on you. Also, where are we going?" Questioned the unicorn, seeing that she was walking without a destination.

"I'm already here," Fluttershy notion end towards the building the duo stood outside of. Sugarcube Corner.

Rarity chuckled nervously, but why the pegasus did not know, "Okay, I'm just going to head back to the Boutique. Sweetie might be messing around with her friends there, and I don't want anything broken," With those final words, the white pony split from the group. What was with the awkwardness, Fluttershy wondered.

The front entrance of the bakery rang as she pushed her way inside past a wide, green pegasus that wasn't much fatter than her. For just a moment, the two bumped into each other, and Fluttershy felt herself press into the plushness of the larger mare. A wild blush covered her face, but she dared not turn. Something about that moment seemed too perfect for a pony like her. Hoping she wasn't to obvious, Fluttershy trotted up to the front counter where there was no line at all.

Pinkie Pie was probably in the kitchen, cooking up some pastries for some reason. So Fluttershy glanced around to see how many strangers were looking at her. Luckily, Sugarcube Corner was not too busy today, and only three other ponies occupied the bakery. An earth pony couple sat together at the table, chatting while they munched on a plate of vanilla cupcakes topped with a single cherry. The third pony was a male unicorn who held a plate of cake in his magic as he sliced off chunks to consume. No pony was looking at her finally, so Fluttershy felt some privacy from the constant stares she received when outside.

The feeling was short lived, since Pinkie exited the back room to greet any new customers. When she spotted her old friend, she bounced high into the air.

"Oh Fluttershy!" She giggled, "You look different. Did you get a haircut?" The duo chuckled together, Fluttershy having to force hers.

"Yeah, something like that. Do you gave any cake available?" Fluttershy hinted towards her hunger as politely as possible, an idea Pinkie quickly caught onto.

"I just finished baking some. Come back, and pick one you like. Or two if you want."

Fluttershy smiled, following the pink party pony back into the kitchen. Inside the kitchen was a counter that four tall cakes sat on, and the baker began explaining to Fluttershy what each one was.

"This first cake here," -Pinkie pointed her hoof at the closest cake, a completely white cake absolutely covered in sprinkles- "Is a rainbow cake. Each layer is a different flavor, from strawberry to grapes to apples! I can guarantee that you will enjoy this one! The next one..."

The words spoke seemed to fly high over her head when her eyes rested on the final cake out for display. She could not believe her pony eyes. The 3 layer high chocolate cake was smothered in chocolate icing and chocolate sprinkles. Pieces of dark, milk, and white chocolate stuck out from their spots on the cake, and melted chocolate was drizzled all over it.

It was also the exact same cake she saw in her dream, the first cake fed to her. If it tasted just like it did in her dream, then she would freak out then and there. But how was it here?

"Hey Pinkie Pie," interrupted Fluttershy, "What about this one?"

Pinkie saw the cake her friend was looking at, "That one? I originally wasn't going to make it, but somepony came and ordered it, even payed for it, then left before it was finished. They wore a large coat, so I have no idea who wanted it. You can have it, if you want. No charge since it was prepaid for.

Fluttershy felt a single line of drool hang from her lip. It was too perfect. The dark figure in her dream, did they actually exist? Was it Luna? Maybe she was imagining this all, and making a fuss out of nothing. Why would a princess order her dream cake, and give her it for free? It seemed unreal, and her mind was in jumbles.
15112211111.title: Slow and steady

choices: Eat the rest of the cake
Take home the leftovers, and hope they don't get ruined
151122111111.content:
"Thank you," Fluttershy spoke in her normal, gentle voice, and directed her thanks to two different targets at once.

Pinkie Pie smiled, "You're welcome! If you need anything, just ask!" She lept into the air, bouncing on her fictional trampoline out of the kitchen. Fluttershy just had one question.

"Pinkie," whispered the pegasus, "do you mind if I eat here? In the kitchen?"

The baker laughed out loud, as if the answer was obvious, "Well duh! I can tell you need some privacy," Fluttershy paused, catching her drift. Did Pinkie Pie know? How!?

"I can read, Fluttershy!" With that, she exited the kitchen, leaving Fluttershy to her thoughts. What does reading... Oh forget it!

Fluttershy returned her gaze back to the chocolate tower before her, licking her lips greedily. Now to see if it tasted the same as her dream cake. She waddled closer towards the sugary delight, opening her jaws wide. Her white teeth scratched the smooth, brown surface of the cake, and chomped down. Oh Celestia, it did taste just like her dream! How was that possible without another's involvement? Princess Luna was the prime suspect, and Pinkie Pie a close second, with her almost paranormal powers.

For now, the pegasus swallowed the chunk she held in her mouth, prepping for a second bite. Soon after a third bite, then a fourth. Cake covered her chubby cheeks and stained lips, making every breath taste oh so sweet. But the cake was nowhere near done, not yet at least.

An idea flashed into her mind, and it seemed so good in the moment she just had to try it. The pegasus flapped her wings with all her might, heaving the fat pegasus into the air just inches off the ground. But it was enough since her head lined up with the topmost layer of the chocolate cake. She held her hooves parallel to the sides of the cake, holding it firmly. Her back hooves tapped the kitchen countertop, then her wings gave out in exhaustion. She wobbled, but kept her balance on the table.

Fluttershy now had a new angle on the cake, literally shoving her face into it. It reminded her of when she accidently landed face first into Angel's Birthday Carrot Cake two years ago. The poor bunny was so frustrated with her, and she just had to go out and buy another. And this time was different, instead it was her who would eat the cake.

Half an hour later, and half a cake later (this was astonishing for a first time binger like her), a tightness interrupted the feast, forcing Fluttershy to pause mid bite. She removed her face form the cake, resting her messy hooves on the bowling ball sized orb that was her stomach. Not to mention the already digested calories that gave her plot even more jiggle and added to her width. Fluttershy tried ignoring her body's cries for her to stop, taking a few more bites from the chocolate cake. Though the ripple of pain shot through her gut a second time.

She jumped off the counter, bowing slightly in an uncomfortable position just to remove anymore stress on her belly. The remnants of the cake formed a pile of chocolate that sat upon the counter. With how she ate it, there was no way to transport it home without dropping a load. Maybe if she forced herself to finish the second half of the cake, then she would not have to worry about leftovers.
151122111111.title: A Chocolate Dream Come True

choices: She gets gigantic off of one bite!
She gets only chubby, but incredibly addicted!
151123.content:
Fluttershy browsed through her bookshelf, gently setting aside anything concerning animal care. Aside from her veterinary knowledge, She'd also spent some time reading about nature, particularly the Everfree forest just outside her backyard.

She spent a few hours silently browsing, unable to find anything with much weight. There were occasional herbal compounds to boost strength, but nothing that lasted over a few minutes. She was starting to lose hope the longer she went on, but the last book she found caught her attention.

It was an old, dusty book, clearly written decades ago. Much of the text had faded and yellowed over time, but she found a page legible enough for her hunt.

THE TITAN BERRY

A mysterious fruit of unknown species, common in the deeper sections of the forest against Everfree Mountain. Ponies who have eaten this fruit have been known to increase in weight and height, and have been known to boast enhanced strength, even retaining mobility at what would be immobilizing weight.

The fruit in the deteriorating photograph was a yellow, lumpy fruit with black stripes, bulging in a way that made it look like it was about to burst with juice.

Fluttershy gulped. She didn't want to become monstrously huge, but it seemed to be promising.

"Maybe I'll just eat a little bit of one…" She thought aloud.

With her goal set, she packed up for her hike and headed out the door.

"Take care of the cottage, Angel!"

……

Ever since her adventures with her friends, she'd found entering the Everfree forest to be much easier. On top of that, she found it surprisingly interesting to explore regions of the area she'd never yet seen.

This was the deepest she'd gone into the forest, the trees clearing up as she got closer to the mountain. Her eyes were constantly scanning the dozens of trees around her, on hunt for any yellow spot she could see. Fluttershy was starting to hope this wasn't an extinct species she was looking for.

Celestia's sun grew more orange as it grew closer to the horizon, signifying a deadline for her adventure.

"Oh, dear, It'll be dark soon…" With a disappointed sigh, Fluttershy flew over the trees and looked over the landscape, searching for a path home.

"So, I'll have to walk along the river, and…" But she gasped as she noticed a patch of trees in the distance, peppered with bright yellow spots. Soaring towards that spot, she smiled excitedly at the dozens of berries on the trees, each with black stripes.

"Oh, this is wonderful! I'll be bigger in no time!"

Up close, she was surprised at how large they were; one was as big as her head. It showed resistance as she pulled down on the fruit, but the stem sure broke free, causing Fluttershy to fly downwards.

With the fruit in hoof, she eyed it nervously.

"Just a little bit…" She told herself as she leaned in for a bite.
151123.title: Do some research, maybe see if anything in the ...

choices: "...this is perfect!" She said, as she continued devouring the fruit.
"...This is too much!" She said, as she ran home.
1511231.content:
She took one bite, and felt Fluttershy felt her belly rumble loudly.
Her belly grew immensely, nearly 100 pounds from just the one bite!

"Oh, my..." Fluttershy spoke...
1511231.title: She gets gigantic off of one bite!

1511232.content:
The instant she bit in, she was surprised with a burst of incredibly sweet, tangy juice that stained her cheeks as she chewed. She was amazed by the sheer flavor of the fruit, which bore this incredible sensation the likes of which she'd never seen.

She took her time chewing, giggling as she savored the flavor. Once she was satisfied, she swallowed it with a contented sigh.

However, the fruit took effect the instant it hit her stomach, which puffed out about a few inches further. Her entire body also gained a faint bit of paunch. It wasn't an eye-turning change, but enough so that it was a discerning feature.

Her physical change was only a testament to the fruit's true power, however. As she looked down at the fruit, she yearned so much more for its spectacular flavor.

"I…I guess I can have one fruit."

The chubby pegasus gladly lifted the fruit to her muzzle and took a generous bite, smiling at its taste. Once that bite was finished, her body fattened up even more. She'd passed the definition of "chubby" by that point, but paid no heed as she took another bite.

That bite, of course, sought to bloat her even more, as the next one had.

…and the next one.

…and the next one.

…and the next one.

Within minutes she had finished the entire fruit, leaving her portly face stained with juice. Once her meal was finished, her stomach was fat enough that it touched the ground. Her legs had gotten much more flabby, bearing a flank that puffed out quite far. She even sported a few more inches in height.

It was safe to say that the image of the meek pegasus she once was had dwindled.

As large as she had gotten, though, she was disappointed by the flavor's absence. She cast a tempted look at the tree, eyeing the dozens of ripe fruit at her reach.

"…maybe one more wouldn't hurt…" She said to herself as she began flapping her wings, carrying her bulk like a bumblebee up to the fruit. The berry was plucked easily thanks to her weight.

Once grounded, she gave a smile as she greedily chomped into the fruit, growing even larger with the bite she took…

……

The sun had set deeper into the sky as Fluttershy continued her feast, casting half of the land in shadow. Fluttershy paid no heed, entranced by the titan berry's flavor.

The last bit of the tenth fruit she'd had that day slid down her throat, landing within the pit of her massive body.

"Oh, my…that was amazing!" She blissfully sighed, contented with her bounty. "Oh, maybe a few more wouldn't hurt."

She was about to take flight to grab more from the tree, but was surprised as she realized that her wings weren't taking her anywhere.

"That's funny…why ca-EEP!" Fluttershy yelped in horror as she looked back at her own body, and was met with the sight of her wide, blobby back, a long with the outline of her two gigantic buttcheeks.

As the realization finally dawned on her, she looked to a nearby creek and heaved her gargantuan body forward, her legs long enough to touch the ground past her monstrous belly. Once she'd reached the pond, she gasped in astonishment at her reflection.

She was just under seven feet at eye level, but above all had fattened herself to such astronomically huge proportions that it didn't seem real. Her stomach was huge enough that it stuck out over four feet from each side, and each of her legs were like fat golf bags. Her rear end was so enormous that her cutie mark was the size of an average pony.

Her shrunken pupils stared down at her engorged face, looking over her blobby cheeks.

"Oh…my…goodness…"
1511232.title: She gets only chubby, but incredibly addicted!

15112322.content:
"I love this!" Fluttershy exclaimed. "I just want to get larger and larger.... where's that fruit?"
Fluttershy heaved her humungous belly through the forest and tried to find more of the fruit, her belly rumbling for more.

After a while of searching, she comes across...
15112322.title: "I…I like being this big!"

choices: Fluttershy comes to her senses, and tries to lose the new weight
Fluttershy is found by one of her friends.
151123221.content:
She ran towards a large portion of the woods, where there were Titan Berries spread all across the ground, it seemed they were falling from the massive tree's.
"Soon I shall be large enough to crush these trees!" Fluttershy stated, as she consumed many berries at once, her belly growing with each one.

She ate and ate, her belly expanding larger, soon she fell on her rear and simply held her mouth open to catch falling berries that fell from the sky. "I'm in heaven..." Fluttershy thought as she continued to grow fatter and fatter.

She grows as half as high as the mighty trees when she finally finishes all the berries in the area, and she goes in search for more, her massive body causing tremors in the earth as she does.
"I must weigh 10 tons by now!" Fluttershy exclaimed. "But... I'm still not satisfied until I cover all of Everfree!"
151123221.title: The same fruit from before

choices: All the other trees around her start growing titan berries!
She turns her taste towards something else...
1511232211.content:
"W-Where are they?" Fluttershy asked worriedly as she stomped through the forest, desperate to find more titan berries. At over twenty feet high, the trees bended easily around her colossal weight, the ground shaking and rivers rippling with each heavy step she left.

Her search went on till night started to fall, with no result.

"I-I need more!" She desperately cried out. "I NEED MORE!!!"

But it was then that a familiar scent teased her nostrils, prompting her to lick her lips as her mouth watered. Turning her blobby neck as far as it's go, she smiled excitedly at the sight of a titan berry on a nearby pine tree. It wasn't alone, though, as dozens of others began to magically sprout from its branches.

She panted like a dog as she lumbered towards the tree, excited to reunite with its advertised flavor. Rather than pluck the berries off, Fluttershy chomped directly into the tree's branches, her mouth large enough to contain the entire bough. Her mouth exploded with the sweet flavor, which overshadowed the taste of the wood and leaves mixed within.

Of course, with a loud gulp, her belly blew up even more as the berries hit her stomach, smothering more of the ground beneath her and pushing away at trees nearby. Even as her legs blew up to unfathomably huge, balloon-like proportions, her muscles still managed the strength to move her god-tier weight, growing to give her five more feet in height.

However, another change partook in her body along with her growth. As she took a more generous bite from the tree, her snout turned dark black, intricate black stripes stretching across her once smooth yellow coat (similar to the titan berry's own coat).

Each bite visibly bloated her up even more, growing taller and fatter as she chomped away more of the tree. By the time it was seemingly obliterated, Fluttershy had grown to fifty feet in height, her belly a vast, monstrous expanse that bulged out incredibly far and enveloped the forest beneath her.

Despite her size, however, Fluttershy planted her gigantic legs on the ground and pushed her gargantuan bulk forward, the trees flattening beneath her stomach as she yearned for more.

"Food…" Fluttershy groaned with an unfamiliarly greedy tone. "I WANT MORE FOOD!"
1511232211.title: Fluttershy continued her search

choices: Fluttershy find another pure Weight Gain Berry.
15112322111.content:
Fluttershy continued to grow and grow, eating more and more Titan Berries. However, Fluttershy began to feel a side effect to the Berries.

After 1 hour of consumption, the muscle gained from the Berries will revert to Fat, leaving you twice as big, yet immobile. Fluttershy was growing larger and larger, her hooves shrinking to the point of nonexistence
"Huh? What the..?" Fluttershy wondered, as her head sink into her new 1,000,000,000 pound body of pure fat.
"Help... Me..." Fluttershy pleaded with herself.
15112322111.title: All the other trees around her start growing ti...

151123221111.content:
"HEY, FLUTTERSHY YOU HERE?" A brash voice called out, echoing above the trees. Rainbow Dash's eyes scanned the dozens of foliage as she flew above, searching for her pastel yellow friend.

"Man, hope she's not hurt, or anything." She whispered to herself, a worried expression on her face. "FLUTTERSHY? WHERE ARE YOU?"

Her search spanned many acres of forest, the morning sun bringing a crisp clarity for her search. She flew for about an hour trying to find her friend, constantly calling out for her in the hopes that she would appear.

She was just reaching the outer edges of the forest, ready to give up her search when she came across an unusual sight.

"Woah…what's that!?" As she passed over the mountain, her eyes caught sight of a gigantic yellow mass, bulging with layers of fat. She flew closer to get a closer look, curious as to what it could be, but gave a startled gasp upon notice of three pink butterflies adjourning its bulk.

"No…i-it can't be…"

But sure enough, her fears were validated as she zipped to the mass' front and was met with the sight of Fluttershy's head, which had to be the size of a house. Her swollen cheeks rested on an army of hill-sized chins, which quivered as she snored.

"F-F-F-FLUTTERSHY!??!"

Fluttershy's eyes lazily parted as she awoke with a monstrous groan.

"ugh…nng...Rainbow?" She asked tiredly.

"F-F-Fluttershy? What happened to you?" Rainbow asked, utterly flabbergasted.

"Y-You…have to help me…"

"What'ya mean? What's going on?"
151123221111.title: Someone finds Fluttershy

15112322112.content:
By that point, the thousands of berries she'd consumed had severely clouded her judgement. She didn't even care about getting big any more; she just wanted to eat. Eat anything at any cost.

Licking her lips, Fluttershy looked about for more of the wonderful berries, leaving an incredibly wide path of flattened trees and torn up dirt in her wake as her belly dragged along the ground. Each stomp from her hundred-ton girth quaked the ground beneath her, leaving huge craters in the ground from her giant hooves.

Her search didn't garner any of the fruit, but she was becoming negotiable as her belly let out a tremor-inducing rumble.

"Food…" Fluttershy glanced about for anything edible within reach, but found nothing aside from the trees. But with a shrug, Fluttershy rolled forward and began chomping into the trees around her. Her feasting had rearranged her tastebuds, and anything she ate delivered the same taste as the titan berries. She greedily scarfed down more and more of the forest, her bites becoming more ravenous as she lost herself within the feast.

Her stomach grew round and tough as she stuffed it with no remorse, a faint red tint forming on her yellow and black hide as its straining point was met.

It was but an hour later that a massive area of the forest had been sucked dry of its foliage, leaving only a patch of upturned earth and dirt. Fluttershy stood in the center, over 100 feet tall and with a belly large enough to cover an entire football field.

"*UUUUURRRRAAAAAAARRRRPPPPPP…..* Oh my, I'm so huge…" She gurgled almost drunkedly. Her head was over the size of a house, her cheeks fattened incredibly large and resting on an array of chins. Turning her neck as far as its fatness would allow, she looked down her vast, blobby back, her butt cheeks forming her horizon.

"Now, no pony'll ever push me around again…" She giggled with a somewhat imposing smirk.

She was tall enough that she could see far beyond the forest, particularly the lights from Ponyville in the distance. The forest shook even more as Fluttershy stomped through, tearing apart the earth below as she stormed through unhindered...
15112322112.title: She turns her taste towards something else...

choices: She is! Time to clear this man's stock!
Nope, something else is brewing down there...
151123221121.content:
Just outside a flower shop, three ponies were just sitting around talking about nothing in particular. Suddenly, the ground began to rumble beneath them, spooking them out of their conversation.

"W-w-w-what is going o-o-o-o-on!?" A green-haired pony with a daisy for a cutie mark said.

"L-l-l-look over there!" Another pony with a rose cutie mark said.

The three saw what appeared to be a gigantic yellow blob just over a hill. To make matters worse, it seemed to make the ground quake as it looked like it was getting closer!

"The horror! The horror!" A pony with a lily in her yellow mane said.

At this pony's declaration, everyone outside seemed to be running into their homes, afraid of the gigantic yellow whatever-it-was coming their way. If only they knew it was the meek, formerly small Fluttershy!

"Why is everypony hiding?" Fluttershy said. "I'm not scary..."

Fluttershy pondered this to herself, but then came across the marketplace where she had been tricked and abused before. While everypony else was hiding in their homes, the shopkeepers kept their stands open. Surely something this big would get hungry, and that would mean big business!

Fluttershy went up to the cherry stand owner, bending her gigantic face down to meet him.

"Who's the doormat now?" Fluttershy said, a smug look on her house-sized face.

"Um, I'm, I'm sorry!" the stand owner said, recognizing this giant blob as the pegasus he tried to rip off earlier. "I'll never raise the prices again!! Tell you what, you can have all my stock at normal price!"

Fluttershy looked annoyed, angry that this man was still trying to take her money. Suddenly she felt her stomach rumble, which made her confused. Was she hungry again so soon after eating an entire chunk of the forest away?...
151123221121.title: At Ponyville...

1511232211211.content:
Sure enough, she was hungry; so hungry that she had no time to negotiate with the greedy vendor. Tilting her head forward, she opened her mouth and chomped down on the entire stand, along with some of the ground it stood on. The vendor had to leap back to avoid being caught in her maw, and looked at the crater of where his stand once stood in utter shock.

Fluttershy chewed the stand as though it were a gum ball, which she swallowed easily with a contented sigh.

"H-HEY! YOU CAN'T DO THAT!!!" The vendor bravely (albeit foolishly) proclaimed. "YOU'LL OWE ME FOR PROPERTY DAMAGE, AND-"

But Fluttershy merely glared down at him with a raised eyebrow, as though silently asking him what he was going to do about it. The vendor finally realized which pony out of the two of them was the tiny one and gulped, his eyes widened and sweat forming on his brow.

"I mean…well…never mind, go ahead."

Fluttershy's glare vanished in place of a proud smile, and she walked away from the horrified (former) cherry vendor with her nose pointed high.

His reaction was perfect! The cherry stand did little to sate her hunger, but asserting herself as though his demands were absolutely nothing felt amazing. It was an alien feeling, but one she was starting to welcome.

But more so, she was still hungry, so she decided to...
1511232211211.title: She is! Time to clear this man's stock!

15112322112111.content:
Fluttershy noticed a stand nearby filled with peaches, her favorite fruit. Wanting to further test out her gargantuan appearance, Fluttershy rolled forward to get a closer look at the stand, the vendor of which cowered in fear at the monstrous pegasus.

"Excuse me, mister…" She asked innocently. "…but would you mind if I took a few free samples? The cherry vendor was so nice as to!"

"Uh…sure!" The vendor stammered. "Take all the peaches you want!"

"Why, thank you!" Like with the cherry stand, Fluttershy leaned forward and chomped the peach stand out of existence, along with a larger chunk of the ground beneath. Fluttershy proudly lumbered away, leaving behind a mortified shop vendor.

Once the peach stand had started nourishing her, she turned her sights on a potato vendor, who gulped in fear as she found herself in Fluttershy's sights. Again, Fluttershy leaned forward to look at the pony running the stand.

"Excuse me, but would you mind if I had a few potatoes on the house?"

Sure enough, the vendor only stood back and watched Fluttershy down her entire profit in but a second. Pleased, albeit unsatisfied, Fluttershy turned to another vendor and "politely" asked for his profit, which she scarfed down even quicker.

The same happened for the next one.

…and the next one.

…and the next one.

…and the next fifty.

It eventually reached a point where many vendors hightailed it and left their products behind for Fluttershy to eat without remorse. Hundreds upon thousands of produce were sucked down into her greedy belly, which grew bigger and tighter with each voracious bite.

Finally, as though for desert, Fluttershy gulped down a pie stand and left the ex-marketplace licking her lips, leaving behind a wasteland of upturned dirt and remnants of the shattered Equestrian dream.

It was fun, fun that made her stomach much rounder and more taut. But she still had room, the earth shaking as she stomped en route for...
15112322112111.title: "Ask" for more food.

choices: Fluttershy asks politely to continue eating
151123221121112.content:
Fluttershy stomped her way just outside Ponyville, having an idea on some more food for her to eat. After a short walk, which shook the entire town, she made it to Sweet Apple Acres, the sight of all those apple trees making her belly growl and her mouth drool.

"Foooooood..." Fluttershy said, her mind clouded with her sudden hunger.

Suddenly, she began to bite through the apple trees, eating them as if they were candy! As she ate, her gigantic stomach grew larger and rounder, covering more and more of the ground beneath her. As she ate, a certain orange pony wearing a stetson hat came up to the giant yellow blob, both confused and worried.

"F-F-Fluttershy!?" Applejack said, not knowing what question to ask first. "What are you, how did you, why are you..."

Fluttershy was momentarily distracted from her eating to look down at Applejack...
151123221121112.title: Sweet Apple Acres.

choices: She'd horrified by what she's done!
1511232211211122.content:
After watching Applejack babble incoherently for a few more moments, Fluttershy turned back to the trees and continued eating.

"H-HEY, STOP THAT!!!" Applejack yelled, snapping out of her shock. "YER EATIN, MAH FARM!!!"

Applejack's commands did nothing to faze Fluttershy out of her feast, who ignored the earth pony's anger as she continued to devour the trees. However, Fluttershy grew somewhat annoyed by the constant yelling from her now tiny friend.

"FLUTTERSHY, STOP!!!" Applejack commanded, stepping between Fluttershy and a tree she was yet to eat. "STOP!!!"

That was somewhat a last straw for Fluttershy, who looked down at Applejack with an unamused look. Without saying anything, she grabbed Applejack with her giant hoof and tossed the bite-sized Earth pony into her mouth.

"FLUTTERSHY, WHAT'RE YOU-" But that was all the horrified earth pony could say before Fluttershy easily swallowed her. Once Applejack was in her whale-sized belly, Fluttershy licked her lips with a satisfied grin.

"Mmm…not bad!" She quipped. "Sorry, Applejack, but…"

But Fluttershy turned silent as what she had just done fully registered. She'd taken another pony and swallowed her as if she was a jelly bean, and was about to joke about it as well.

She just ate Applejack.
1511232211211122.title: Fluttershy eats Applejack!

choices: Fluttershy samples the rest of town!
15112322112111222.content:
...I just ate Applejack.

As those words echoed in her mind she was met with a feeling she'd never met before. Certainly not horror, guilt, despair, or anything one'd expect from the formerly puny pony.

It felt like power.

She'd just taken an earth pony strong enough to buck the apples right off an apple tree and swallowed her as if she was a jelly bean. Along with that she looked back at all the times she'd been wrapped around the hooves of bullies, random ponies, street vendors, her own friends, even her own pets, and every time she'd be too weak or scared to speak up for herself.

But now? Everypony was the size of a flea to her, and not even the strongest weapons in Equestria could do anything of use to her. After years of being so scared, alone, and weak, she was finally drinking from the chalice of power, and it tasted wonderful.

"Hmm..."

With a sly smile she dragged herself as slowly as she could to the side of the house, plucking off a branch from a tree in the front yard. She delicately tapped the front door with it, but even as gently she tried to be she still almost knocked it down.

After a moment's wait it was Big Mac and Apple Bloom who came out, wondering what the commotion was. Their answer was pretty abrupt as Fluttershy snatched the two off the ground and brought them to her face, observing their shocked reaction till she gave a soft chuckle and tossed the two in her mouth and gulped them down to join their sister. They tasted like apples, fittingly.

"Oh, yes....." Fluttershy moaned over their taste and the feeling. It was wonderful. So, so wonderful.

Slowly she moved herself to look down at the house, looming over it with a wicked grin. Opening her maw as wide as she could, she leaned down as far as she could and took as big a bite out of the top of the house as she could, chomping clean through it as though it was a waffle. As she kept taking enormous bites out of the house she could taste a faint spot of apple somewhere, probably Granny Smith. The top floor was quickly demolished with the first floor slowly ebbing away to Fluttershy's stomach, and with a loud CRUNCH the floorboards collapsed into the ground and Fluttershy was left licking up anything in the basement she could reach, her head too large to fit in the hole where the house once stood.

Once she was satisfied that the basement was empty she turned her sight to what remained of the apple orchard behind her, adopting an even more menacing look as she trudged towards the trees.

This time around she didn't waste any time. She just ripped massive chunks out of the earth and stuffed everything; trees, dirt, living critters, anything unfortunate (or fortunate, depending on certain folks) enough to be in her way into her maw as much as her bulging cheeks would allow, gulping them down with nary a choke. As the remains of her former friend receded Fluttershy, of course, continued to grow, towering higher and higher with her body swelling outward even faster.

By the time she was done with the orchard Fluttershy was 500 feet tall, with a belly that formed a vast, yellow mass tat was 750 wide on top of the dissected farmland. Her limbs were like enormous balloons tapering off of her body, her flanks large enough that she could destroy several many houses should she need a place to sit. The black streaks on her fur became more intricate, forming elaborate patterns and symbols around her blimp-sized figure.

After she'd leveled the barn the last matter of business was the farm animals. Her cheeks were stretched tight as she stuffed every last one of the critters into her maw, but with a little effort managed to send them don in a huge gulp. But as the creatures entered her stomach she moaned as her limbs began to swell, the muscles buried beneath the gargantuan amounts of fat expanding, which only served to fuel her energy boost.

But, as one'd expect at this point, she was far from satisfied, but fueled as much by the rush. She slowly looked up at the town to see that all of the residents were running about in chaos, too blinded by their own panic to take a chance to escape.

The fools.
15112322112111222.title: She actually liked it...

choices: Princess Celestia flies in, ready to fight!
Twilight and her friends line up along the street!
151123221121112221.content:
"Foood..." Fluttershy slurred with a deep, robotic voice. Her tongue snaked from her mouth to lick her lips, stretching several times longer and hued by a deep, sharp purple with juice-like saliva dripping along her multitude of chins.

In the townfolk's pandemonium, Fluttershy managed to swipe herself a few easy catches from panicked ponies running or flying too close to the formerly meek monster, only to end up stuffed between her cheeks and scarfed down by the mouthful. From each little magic-enfused morsel, she could feel their body's natural energies swimming through her body from inside her stomach, charging her ever-expanding might. Foot by foot she grew taller, and by hundreds of tons more yellow rolls of fat oozed from under her body's features, covering more of the ground by her ballooning belly.

It was after several handfuls of ponies were obliterated that the other citizens regained hold of logic, and lead into a stampede out of town. Even with the invigorated muscles beneath her hills of fat, Fluttershy still reached the implications of her mountain-like physique and drastically weighed her pace down to but a crawl. She snarled at the wonderful, delicious ponies racing away from the depths of her belly, and in a hungry reflex she opened her maw wide in the air.

Her body swelled even more as she took in a long, steady breath, sucking in anything loose enough that could be snatched away by tornado-strength winds. Even as far as the ponies could have ran, many of the frantic mob were nonetheless lifted from the ground and sailed with the current into Fluttershy's mouth, who could now gulp them down in a speed tenfold. In but seconds dozens of homes were flattened beneath her perpetually growing stomach, and her back arched higher and higher above the landscape, giving her a complete view of the entire town, along with the swarming residents scrambling for an escape.

Fluttershy couldn't think of anything else. There was no compassion, no rush of power, not even the self-help journey that'd jumpstarted her rampage in the first place. Only food. That single word ruthlessly screaming in her head without relent, demanding sustenance with a blinding fury.

"FOOD!!!" Fluttershy bellowed to the heavens. "I WANT FOOD!!!"
151123221121112221.title: Fluttershy samples the rest of town!

choices: She decides to play with herself.
15112322112112.content:
Find her own food.
As she walked down the streets, she was on the hunt for more food to please her hungry belly. But as she was looking, she couldn't find any stands with food in them, nor could she find a way into the Cake Shop.

Fluttershy was slowly getting frustrated by this, she needed to eat and she wanted it now.

But before she could think about what to do, she heard a word in her head. A word that would be repeated over and over again like a broken record.
"Monster!"
"Monster"
"Monster..."

These words that described the tall and obese Fluttershy began to sink in. She had become the monster that she feared. Even if she turned back to normal, she would never be the same happy and shy pony that Ponyville cared for.

As Fluttershy looked down, one of the cloud Pegasi blasts her with a bolt of lightning. Thankfully, she is not harmed due to her fat but after feeling the effects of the lightning, her look of sadness turns into a look of gluttony as her frown turns into a sick and twisted smile.

She catches the pony in her hooves and throws him into her mouth. But before he went down her throat, Fluttershy decided to have some fun with her meal first by chewing him first.

As the Pegasi screamed in pain as he was being chewed apart, the other Pegasi fled in fear, while Fluttershy had a wide and sadistic smile on her face all the while.

Eventually the screaming stopped and the mangled pony went down her throat as she let out a very gassy burp, cracking several windows.

"Mmm. Tasty."
15112322112112.title: Find her own food.

choices: She literally farts up a storm that covers Ponyville in a fog of gas
Fluttershy threatens to take a dump unless everypony feeds her
Fluttershy craps and floods the market
1511232211212.content:
PPPPPPPPFFFFFFEEEEEERRRRRRRRRRRRRBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBTTTTTTTTTTT!

Fluttershy grunted and moaned as she blasted out a fart of epic proportions. Her tongue lolled out as she unleashed a typhoon from her tush. Many of the ponies unfortunate to be behind her were sent flying and several stands were knocked over. Those that were still standing immediately gagged on the smell she created with several fainting as a result.

Fluttershy didn't realize she'd be holding in so much gas since she entered the forest. Normally her gas is as silent as herself, but those berries must have messed with her system. She didn't give a damn since the shopkeeper had passed out from the smell and wouldn't be able to put up a fight. She took advantage of the situation and opened wide to swallow the entire stand whole. She raised her head and chewed up all the cherries and boards. They weren't as satisfying as the titan berries but they were filling and tasty. She gulped it down and immediately let loose a deafening belch. Her cheeks wobbled and two stands in front of her were reduced to rubble.

Wiping the slobber from her face, she took advantage of the other disposed ponies and chomped down on their stalls as well. All the while she ripped more butt bursts that tainted the entire market and created a hazy greenish brown fog overhead. If she wasn't exposed to those berries, Fluttershy would be mortified farting in public. Now, she tool pleasure in aiming her flank at any onlookers and blowing them away with her gas. The smell didn't even bother her at all and gave her a sense of superiority. This was the smell of a pony in charge.

Before she could indulge any further on the free food, she felt a pressure building against her butthole that begged to be vented. With a devious grin.....
1511232211212.title: Nope, something else is brewing down there...

choices: Fluttershy grows an enormous set of cock and balls
151123222.content:
As the stars came out in the night sky above, Fluttershy continued searching the forest for her fix of fruit. Before today she would be terrified to roam the Everfree after dark but now she was fixated on finding her prized fruit to the point that danger was the last thing on her mind. The same went for all her critters back home. Her goal was to find more of the Titan Berry.

Her new size made it difficult to track down more food and fly but she persisted just to fill her impatient stomach even if it she had to take breaks to catch her breath. By midnight, not only had she not found any more berries, she was completely lost. Although she didn't worry about the latter part that much. "Ohhhh, its hopeless. I should probably just go home. Maybe Rainbow Dash can help me look for more fruit later. Now where's the main road?"

The pudgy pegasi couldn't see a thing in the pitch black forest. She stumbled through brushes and bumped into low hanging tree branches. Her stomach paved the ground beneath her as she tried to find any sort of light or sign of civilization. Just then, she stopped and sniffed the air. There was a familiar smell in the air that was close to the Titan Berry's aroma. It got her mouth watering and became her top priority. Beelining towards the fruity scent, she barreled through the woods nearly breaking into a gallop. Before she could, the animal lover ran straight into a tree.

She fell back onto her rotund rear and felt something plump bop on her head. When she picked it up, she couldn't see it but it had the same texture as the fruit she was looking for. Without hesitating she took a bite and her eyes widened. This wasn't the Titan Berry but its juicy flavor captivated the pony just as well. She tore into the berry and reached around for more like it. Apparently she found a tree full of them and knocked a few loose. Once she scooped up plenty off the ground, she backed up and slammed her hind quarters against the tree to get more berries. Again, they fell out and bounced off Fluttershy.

As she ate, the fruit began to have a strange effect on the pony.....

151132.content:
It was another day in Ponyville. At Sweet Apple Arces, Applejack was picking apples as always. Fluttershy was also helping her pick apples.

"Thanks for the help, sugarcube." Applejack said.
"No problem." Said Fluttershy. "It's the least I can do after last time."

Fluttershy was recalling the time she was Flutterbat.

"It wasn't your fault." Applejack said. "It was the spell. You didn't had control of yourself."
"I know. I just couldn't help myself with the apple." Fluttershy said. "Those....juicy...juicy...apples." Fluttershy said in her thoughts.
"Are you ok Fluttershy?" Applejack asked.
"Yes. I'm fine." Fluttershy said.
"Ok then. I think that's enough for today. You can go home now." AJ said.
"Alright. See you later." Fluttershy said.

Just like that, Fluttershy flew back to her cabin. She took care of some of her animals and when it was dark and late, she went to bed. Fluttershy slept normal, but had some strange thoughts.

"Apples....." Fluttershy thought. "Juicy....juicy...apples."

Those thoughts continue to go through her head cause her to wake up. As she did, her eyes turn red, her wings became bat like, and her cutie mark went from 3 butterflies to 3 bats. She was once again, Flutterbat and so did her endless hunger for apples and fruit of any source. Her stomach was now empty so she hissed and flew into the night sky to find a feast.
151132.title: Flutterbat returns.

1511321.content:
So, Flutterbat made it to Sweet Apple Arces. They didn't pick too many trees, so there was still a load of apples available. Which made a hungry Flutterbat happy.

"Apples." Said Flutterbat. "Hungry. Must...Feed."

Flutterbat flew to one of the tree. She grabbed on of the apples and suck the juice out of it like last time. When the apple became nothing but the outer skin, she decided to eat that too. But that was only one apple. She hunger for more and their was a whole orchard worth of apples left. She grabbed more apples from the tree and cotinue to do the same with each apple. As she takes all the apples from one tree, she moves on to the next tree and two the next tree. After Flutterbat was on her third tree, her belly started to fill up with the juice form the apples she ate. Her belly slowly expanded and would only grow more with each apple. After clearing out 15 trees from all their apples, Flutterbat body was getting pretty bloated. Her cheeks were bigger, she had a double chin, her flank was larger than ever stretching her cutie mark three time the normal size, and a belly could now touch the ground. She was heavier, but could still fly pretty well.

"Still hungry." Flutterbat said.

Even with all she ate, she wanted more. She continues to eat more, but a white cloth gets her attention. The white cloth was the size of a small barn.

"What's that?" Flutterbat said.

She pulls the cloth to find...........
1511321.title: Plenty of Apples to eat

15113211.content:
To Flutterbat's surprised, it was a large apple. I mean, LARGE. Bigger than the last giant apple. It was as big as a barn. AJ must have been growing this apple for a contest or something. All Flutterbat knew is that it was huge and she wanted it.

"So big. So red. Must feed." Flutterbat said.

She hisses and then louges for the apple. She sticks her fangs in the giant apple and starts to drink the apple. After a few minutes, part of the apple started to wilt. But it was a BIG apple, so it was going to take a while. More and more of the apple began to wilter and more and more Flutterbat grew. She bloated to twice the size she was from the apples she ate before. Most ponies would be full, but not Flutterbat. The only thought that goes through her head was hunger and feeding her belly. So, after a few hours, the apple was now nothing but rind. Flutterbat was now more like Blubberbat. She was now a belly the size of a barn. Flutterbat seemed please, but that could be short lived.

"Still can eat more." Flutterbat said. Rubbing her belly. "But the sun's rising."

She had the choice of eating more apples or leave and get back home.

1511322.content:
Flutterbat flew into the Everfree forest, in search of sustenance.
"Must... find... apples..." Flutterbat snarled, her mouth watering at the thought of her delicious fruit.

However, after a few hours of searching, Flutterbat landed on the ground and laid under a tree, unable to find the apples she craved so desperately.
That is, until she noticed she was sitting next to a bush full of large, ripe berries. But these berries were not like ordinary berries, they were much larger, about the size of basket balls. They glowed a deep crimson, radiating a source of light as if it were calling Flutterbat towards it.
"Well... it's not Apples, but it'll do." Flutterbat shrugged, and removed one of the berries.

She sunk her fangs into the juicy berry, and sucked it dry. The berry deflated, as Fluttershy smiled gleefully, "This is... delicious!"

The principal nodded to the custodian and he excused himself for the evening, leaving the helpless fatty alone with Celestia. Fluttershy trembled with fear and worried about what sort of punishment she would get for lodging herself in the bathroom. Maybe if she could explain herself she could get off with a lighter sentence. She watched as Celestia arose from her seat and circled around in front of her student.

"Oh Fluttershy," with a tone that Fluttershy assumed was disappointment. "If you wanted to get fatter, why didn't you ask me?"

Surely there must have beens something wrong with her hearing. Fluttershy couldn't believe that this was coming out of Celestia's mouth. That changed when the principal knelt down, cupped the immobile glutton's stomach, and rubbed it down affectionately. Her terror shifted into confusion watching her superior play with her pudge. "You....you don't mind?"

"Mind?" Celestia repeated. "I haven't had anyone to feed since Luna and I went here. Oh, those were good times. Its a shame our parents sent her to fat camp." She could hardly believe the principal used to feed the vice principal when they were younger. Although the more she tried to picture it, Luna did look cute with a belly. Rather than dwell on that image, Fluttershy cleared her throat to get Celestia's attention who was busy reminiscing and groping her oversized gut. She snapped out of it and stood back, clearing her throat.

"Oh yes, right. Well it looks like you won't be able to get home anywhere on your own. As much as I'd love to discuss your "desires", it is a school night and you need your sleep. If you'd like I could set up a makeshift bed for you here in my office or I could give you lift back to your home. I have plenty of room in my car."

Seeingthat she wasn't in trouble, Fluttershy sighed in relief and was about to take her up on the ride home when it occurred to the animal lover that her parents would flip if they found out how massive she's become. They may be pushovers but she was unable to resist if they placed her on a diet. If there enthusiastic like her principal, that would be a different story. It would be a dream come true to live with a supportive feeder. But would it be too much for her to ask? It was already pretty late, so Fluttershy couldn't keep her waiting any longer.

1521311.content:
It was like any other day in Ponyville. The sun was shining, the birds singing in a beautiful chorus, and the smell is freshly baked pastries leaked from Sugarcube Corner's every crevice. Ponies lined up in front of the counter, awaiting their cake-y goodness. Because of this, our ecstatic little pink pony baker was working twice as fast as she normally would. But this was no problem; this is Pinkie Pie we're talking about!

Flour flew into the air, and landed on the dough laid out across the table. Pinkie flattened it out, then proceeded to cut it into circular shapes. A beep echoed from the oven, signaling the end of the previous batch's cooking. The baker slid the pan out, and slid a new one in. She whipped out bags filled with icing, and sprayed multiple colors onto multiple pastries at once! The cupcakes were finished, so Pinkie loaded them onto many plates and carried them out into the lobby.

She handed every pony their orders in a rapid fashion. Ponies practically played ball with their cupcakes as Ms. Pie sealed them out. Once they were satisfied, the old customers left, and new ones took their place. Pinkie zipped back into the kitchen, just in time for the next batch of cookies and cupcakes!

This custom repeated for hours on end, until every single pony in Ponyville (minus Pinkie herself) had received a pastry. Pinkie flipped the Open sign over, officially ending the day. She wiped a single bead of sweat off her forehead, and trotted back into her kitchen.

Normally, Pinkie kept her working space clean throughout her shift, but today, it was a mess! Flour caked the walls (no pun intended) and icing covered the kitchen utensils and appliances. The baker was prepared for this as she took out various tools, including a mop, vacuum, bucket, and more. She set to work, scrubbing the kitchen's many surfaces.

The cleaning didn't take long, and the kitchen was back to it's old, sparkling self. Pinkie clapped her hooves together, feeling accomplished. But out of the corner of her eye, she spied a single, cupcake resting upon a table. Why was it there even after Pinkie Pie cleaned up Sugarcube Corner?

-

Twilight Sparkle placed her newly bought cupcake on the floorboards next to her. She stood next to it, and levitated a piece of parchment and quill up.

'Test number 1. Teleporting with a companion'

The alicorn prepped for the experiment, charging up her magic. She released her teleportation spell, feeling herself move through the wind, until she reached the opposite side of the room. She looked down next to her, and saw no cupcake. She looked over at her original spot, and also saw no cupcake. Weird.

Unknown to her, she accidentally transported the cupcake into Sugarcube Corner. Along side that, her magic bonded with the cupcake. It was now a magical cupcake, with magical properties!

Pinkie Pie inspected the cupcake that she now held in her hoof. It looked like any other pastry she every baked at her job. It's blue icing curving along the vanilla base until it reached a blunt point, where a delicious strawberry was placed. The scent it gave off seemed more powerful then she would of thought. In her gluttonous glance, her stomach groaned. She hadn't eaten all day, with her busy schedule. So Pinkie Pie tossed the cake into her mouth, swallowing it whole.
1521311.title: Accidental

An odd feeling spread throughout Pinkie Pie's body, and she gripped her stomach. It wasn't nausea, but it felt like it was. Her flesh tingled with pins and needles, and Pinkie felt really uncomfortable. Once the weird feeling vanished, it was replaced by a glorp sound that emitted from the pink pony's stomach. Her hoof, which still rested upon her stomach, felt like it was being pushed away from her gut, so Pinkie looked at herself.

Her frame was puffier an normal, accompanied by a jiggle. Her stomach rounded out and formed a potbelly, while her plot just grew outwards. Pinkie giggled, and shook her rump. The layers of fat rippled and jiggled with the movement, and the bottom of her cheeks collided with her swollen legs. She never knew being fat could be fun!

But the glorp started back up, and Pinkie Pie witnessed firsthand at her transformation. Her gut expanded with fat, pushing against her legs for territory. Pinkie's butt ballooned and towered over the earth pony. Her legs thickened and her neck felt harder to twist. Another glorp, and another growth spurt. If this kept up, Pinkie wasn't sure she could hold much more fat!

The baker waddled closer to the front doors, hoping to get outside. If somepony saw her, they could get Twilight and fix this! But it felt like fate didn't want her to because her belly pressed against the floor. She rubbed the tips of her hooves along the ground, making little progress. But..

1542221121121112222121112212112212122123.content:
Many weeks had passed. The first thing she went to accomplish was to turn Rainbow and her friends into her personal slaves. Rainbow was easy, having her will already broken by Celestia. The others would soon follow without their ringleader as Celestia had predicted. With five students obeying her every order, something in Twilight began to break away. She would begin to gain a darker attitude, one of control and of unmistakable brashness. It started with putting a small trance on anyone who crossed her. Doing something ridiculous was the norm at first. Then it turned into doing it for fun. She would force some to give her their lunch, others would give up their will. Eventually she would not only get hypnotic, but physical. Six against one was never really a fair fight. What made it worse was that none of the students could do anything to stop her. Whenever a student would complain, both Celestia and Luna would brush it off as nothing, believing all they needed was to spend some time with her. They would invite that student over to spend time with Twilight, allowing her to bring her five friends along. After one night, it would be certain they would never complain about Twilight again.

(Now)
Twilight walked through the halls with a smug grin to her face. She looked around the halls and saw two different types of faces on the students. There were the smiles from those under her control and the scared looks of those who accepted Twilight's dominance. She then looked to herself, noticing how much she had been growing. She was almost as fat as Luna, and proud of it. Turning around, she took a look to RD, Pinkie, AJ, Fluttershy, and Rarity, each wearing a dress similar to her own. She sighed as she turned back, life was good for her.

Down the road from the city of Canterlot lied a place called Camp Everfree, surrounded by large forests. There, Canterlot High's principal had decided to take a group of her students to spend a week, doing everything one would expect from a camp, including rowing boats, baking cookies, gaining super-powers, and defeating a camp counselor possessed by powerful magic.

But we're not here to tell that story. Instead, we're going to look at another strange tale...


One night, Principal Celestia had decided to take a walk in the woods due to rumors about one of the camp counselors lurking there. She figured that it might just be one of the teens playing a prank on each other, but she still felt responsible to at least check. Unfortunately, she didn't remember the part of the woods she had found herself in, and thus found herself lost.

"Oh dear..." Celestia muttered to herself, naturally feeling uneasy about being in the woods at night. "Hello? Can someone help me?"

Celestia thought she heard murmuring around her, so she thought someone had come to give her a hand.

"Yes, I'm right here! Can you lead me back to the camp?"

"Quiet..." a voice muttered near her, which followed a noise like someone squishing wet clothes on the ground. "You woke me up..."

"Sorry about that..." Celestia said. "But you see, I did get lost and would like some help..."

"We'll help you in the morning. Now let us sleep!"

"Excuse me, but I don't think it would be too much trouble to- what the!?"

Celestia reached her hand out to grab whoever it was that spoke to her, only to touch something large and wet. She pulled her hand back in disgust, and saw that it was covered in what looked like a blue slime.

"This is, ugh, awful! What is this!?" Celestia said, trying to wipe the slime off her hand.

"That's my slime, and I like it the way it is!" the voice said, clearly offended.

"Your... slime?" Celestia said, confused.

"Hey, everyone, this lady doesn't like our slime!" the voice announced, which made other voices in the dark growl angrily. This only made Celestia worry. Just what was going to happen to her?

Another day in Ponyville, and within Carousel Boutique, another sisterly spat had broken out.

"Come on, Rarity, PLEASE?!" Sweetie Belle begged for the third time as she followed her sister around the kitchen. Nearby on the stove was a tray of...something that was supposed to be edible, but once more looked like another charred mess. Rarity didn't have a clue what it used to be; maybe cookies, maybe even hot cereal, but all she knew was that she didn't want it anywhere near her mouth, a fact she made very clear, "No! Absolutely not! Sweetie Belle, I love you dearly, but as your sister, I'm afraid I cannot hold my tongue any longer! Your cooking.....needs work." Her frustration died out when she saw that look on Sweetie Belle's face, but she still managed to say what needed to be said.

When a pony somehow manages to both burn and LIQUIFY toast, that should make it clear to all that somepony needs cooking lessons. Still, Rarity did want to break to her easy, so she decided to point out another obvious fact, "Um, Sweetie Belle, you know, the mark of a truly good chef is remembering this all important rule. Before serving any dish to anypony, the chef needs to taste it first, to make sure that it's appeti-...ready to be served." That got Sweetie Belle to stop feeling down as she suddenly grew curious about the food she'd prepared. Looking over at the steaming black lumps of whatever used to be food, she used her horn to levitate one of those things off the tray and soon brought it to her mouth, " *Chomp* See? It's....BLECH!"

Rarity recoiled as she watched her sister cough it up on the floor, wiping her tongue furiously with her hooves before rushing over to the sink, magically grabbing a glass and filling it with water to chug down. Figuring she had suffered enough, Rarity once more put the truth gently, "I hated having to break this to you, Sweetie, but I'm afraid that nopony should have to eat that." Sweetie didn't respond, as she was too busy feeling down.




Later, at the Cutie Mark Crusaders Clubhouse:

"I can't believe it! How could my food taste that bad?" Sweetie Belle spoke aloud as she paced back and forth before her friends, and soon added, "All this time I thought I had a knack for cooking, but now..." Both Applebloom and Scootaloo gave each other uneasy looks, and steadily they tried to bring Sweetie out of her slump, with the latter saying, "It's not your fault, Sweetie Belle. I mean, you didn't even know what was going on." With her hoof places on her friend's shoulder, Applebloom soon did the same, "Yeah, and besides, maybe that means that now yah can learn how to cook the right way." Sweetie Belle's eyes lit up.

"That's it!" her voice cracked in that cute squeak, and she told her friends her revelation, "Applebloom, you're right! Now that I know what I was doing wrong, that means that I can make sure that it doesn't happen again! In fact, with enough practice, maybe I can learn how to make really great food! Maybe even get my Cutie Mark in Baking!" As Sweetie bounced off the walls, her friends were naturally happy for her, and Scootaloo said, "That's great. So, you gonna ask Pinkie Pie for some advice? Or Mr. and Mrs. Cake? Or Rarity?"

"Nah, I've got this in the bag now." And with that, a very overeager little filly hightailed back home, leaving her friends to once more exchange uneasy looks, and as Applebloom said, "This won't end well."




A few hours later, with Rarity off with her friends, her kitchen had become a disaster sight. There was batter and flour and all manner of gunk covering the floor, the counters, and even the drapes for some reason, and in the midst of all the mess was a very excited little filly who soon heard the oven ding, causing her to gasp, "Their ready!" She magically lifted out the try of cupcakes that actually wound up looking like cupcakes, and once placed on top of the oven, Sweetie Belle climbed up onto a chair she'd pressed up against the stove, and levitated over some frosting that she quickly began to smear all over the tops. Afterwards, she gazed upon her masterpieces, already positive that the second time would be the charm, "They look stupendous! I can't wait for Rarity to try them, I just know she'll be-....before serving any dish to anypony, the chef needs to taste it first."

And with that, she brought one of the cupcakes in for her to try, but of course, all was not right. True, in this attempt, Sweetie Belle had managed to not burn anything, but her inexperience combined with her strong desire to please her sister and anypony else left her making new mistakes. This time she wound up putting in ten times the recommended amount of butter, and so much sugar that it would give Pinkie Pie a toothache....so naturally when Sweetie Belle took her first bite, it turned out to be the most delicious thing she had ever tasted in her entire life.

A year had gone by and Scootaloo grew fatter and fatter, she eventually began to outgrow Rainbow dash's house so they had to move to a bigger one in the mountain side. Now she spends her time sitting in a massive living room, eating more junk food, And growing fatter.

She's now a colossal 1,000,000,000,000 pound jiggling blob of blubbery fat. Her face now held two big bulging cheeks that sagged beyond her shoulders along with massive drooping chin folds that reached her chest. Her hooves were near non-existent as there were cover by folds of fat. Her belly now reached out 50 feet and spread along the floor, covering it with folds upon folds of fat. Her ass now started to form many folds as well, each cheek now weighing an easy 1,000,000 pounds

15513211.content: Where does she force feed Scootaloo?
15513211.title: Applebloom

155132111.content:
"Hey Scoots, how's it goin'?" Applebloom asks the orange pegasus filly, dashing over to greet her.
"Nothing much Applebloom, just hanging out with Rainbow Dash." Scootaloo replies.
"Come on, let's go to the clubhouse, Sweetie Belle is already there and we were thinkin' of crusadin' today, that sound good?" Applebloom asks Scootloo as she leads the flightless filly to the Cutie Mark Crusaders clubhouse.
"Sure, I don't see why not. I don't have anything else to do today." Scootaloo says in response to the country filly.
"Great, let's go!" Applebloom says, practically dragging Scootaloo to the clubhouse. Scootaloo looks inside the dark clubhouse only to see no one in there. In her confusion, she asks,
"Applebloom, didn't you say Sweetie Belle was going to be here?"
"Oh, don't worry Scoots, it's okay, she'll be here in a few minutes..." Applebloom lies to the oblivious filly.
"Okay then Applebloom, if you say so..." Scootaloo says with caution in her voice.
"Yeah, she'll be here soon; and if she's not, even better..." Applebloom says as she hits Scootaloo over the head with a frying pan. After a few hours, Scootaloo wakes up...
