Carts upon carts of various fattening foods
15513222.content:
Scootaloo squirmed against the ropes in her wooden chair. She knew it was futile, but she tried. Her two nemesi had kidnapped her while she was scooting around town, and tied her up here. Why? She could only guess. But the darkness surrounding her concealed any possible imagery, giving her no clues to where she was.

The continued struggle lasted for a few more minutes, until she had no more energy left. She flapped her useless wings, feeling hopeless. She breathed in a sharp breath. The ropes were leaving painful marks upon her hooves.

"Finally, I was starting to get bored!"

Diamond Tiara's voice pierced the darkness like nails on a chalkboard. Scootaloo didn't know whether she preferred being alone in the darkness over what was about to happen. The filly inched closer to her captive, and stroked her cheeks. "Oh Celestia. Too bad these beautiful cheeks are about to be ruined!"

"Or enhanced," responded Silver Spoon, who apparently was standing behind Scoots, "depends on how you look at it."

"We will be 'enhancing' more than your cheeks, though," whispered Tiara into Scootaloo's ear. Fear consumed the poor pegasus. The captor fillies both removed themselves from Scoot's field of view, before returning with...
15513222.title: Both

1552.content: And what is it that turns her into The Great and "Plus-Sized" Trixie?
1552.title: Trixie

choices: Later That Night and a Midnight Snack
15521.content:
Trixie Lulamoon had hit better times after running into Twilight again. Despite a bit of a mishap in Manehattan, her shows earned her better profit than her time on the rock farm. She had to thank the newly crowned princess for distant help in promotion, she was no longer a laughing stock. Often she hung out with her audience after the show at the local restaurant and would indulge into more than she should. She was either distracted or the food was too good to refuse.

This resulted in her building up a figure that was described as barrel shaped, with her stomach drooping down almost to her knees, swelling out of her sides and giving her form a cylindrical look. Her neck was creased by a swelling of fat as well, which softened it and gave her a plump secondary chin, with her A hefty pair of thighs dominated her hind legs, heavy with fat and muscle from supporting her girth, and even they were dwarfed by the rotund plot she sported, each rear cheek easily as big as a bunny rabbit. Her neck was crested by a swelling of fat as well, which softened it and gave her a plump secondary chin, with her chest also having an expanse of cushioning adipose tissue to complete the overall plumpness.

Trixie, being one of the types that focused more on what was ahead than what was happening, took little to no notice of her body. Hauling her wagon to Baltimare however found herself with a few audible huffs here and there, some brushing of her thighs and belly and her strap felt a little tight. But that didn’t stop her from reaching Charm City and performing spectacular shows, despite it losing its usual liveliness at times. As usual, she treated her audience to lunch and dinner, and with Baltimarian food being good she couldn’t help but indulge herself. She was so tired from her dining and some drinking of cider, she fell asleep upon falling onto her hotel bed.
15521.title: The Great And "Plus-Sized" Trixie's Beginnings

choices: Next Morning and She's a Blob
155211.content:
The next morning…

“Hrrrgh…hmph, I could have sworn this bathtub was bigger yesterday…!” Trixie groaned.

The sky blue magician was attempting to squeeze herself into the tub, completely unaware of how during the night her body had processed her feasting into a whole new helping of fat. A good extra two hundred pounds or so of it in fact. Her flab was hanging over the sides of the ivory white bathtub like an albino muffin, preventing her from getting into it, until with an almighty pop, she managed to squeeze herself in, almost displacing the water in the tub and giving little room for more to flow in from the taps. Sighing in relief, Trixie began scrubbing and brushing her fur and mane, humming to herself as she did so in a jovial bliss. At least until her fat packed midsection released a loud, ravenous growl.

“Oh my, it seems its time for breakfast.” she smiled to herself.”

With loud, almost pained strain she pulled herself free of the tub’s embrace and stood up in it, the compaction of her fat being stopped caused it to bounce out and sag down, jiggling for several seconds. Trixie finally gazed into the bathroom mirror and froze in shock at her reflection. She was big now; her tummy, once a barrel shaped paunch almost at her knees, now sunk down past her knees, sticking out sideways like a cushion and sinking into her legs somewhat. Her chest had developed more sloping folds that gave it an almost accordion look, her cape being bit into by it like the mouth of some obese monster. Her limbs were thicker than ever, each one was covered in a layer of drooping tissue that were like sleeves upon sleeves, softened her waddling even more. Her flanks jutted out like a pair of boulders, cutie marks stretching out over them, and her plot itself had ballooned out so much they’d cause strain to her wagon should she set hoof in it. Her face also had fat
tened, with cheeks puffed out like she’d tried to eat tennis balls, and her chin now had two new siblings.

“Oh dear…did those hangouts do this to me?!” she gasped, taking in her new found plushness. “I’m… getting rather obese.”

Grrrrooowwlllll

Another growl of hunger cut off her train of thought, musing over her figure would have to wait, it was time to start the day with a big darn breakfast. Carefully stepping out of the tub, her larger frame nipping into the fairly small confines of the room and knocking some things from the shelf as her ponderous plot bumped against it, to her embarrassment. With a nervous giggle, Trixie waddled out of the bathroom and down towards reception.

The dining room was sparsely populated, no doubt since most of the guests would already be outside, which meant more room for Trixie to move without fear of knocking into anypony, all the better for her. The selection of food available was fairly wide ranging, from hay bacon to hash browns to fish sausages and more, though all of it looked rather…fried. The dessert section was also blatantly on display too, a variety of indulgent cakes and ice creams.

“Such a selection to choose from!” Trixie remarked, looking up and down the food. “I don’t know what to have…”

Grrooorrrrrrgle…

“…So I’ll just have to try everything~” she smirked, her stomach’s grumblings causing her hunger to resurface.

Parking her massive rump on top of two chairs, noting that just sitting on one would likely be a disaster, and even then her plotcheeks oozed over the sides of the two steel chairs like beanbags. Her horn glowed gold and numerous plates were levitated towards her from the serving pans, filling up the table she sat at within seconds. A greedy, confident smirk spread across her plump face as she raised the first bite to her mouth and chomped down, the greasy, sauce drizzled morsels exploding in her mouth and making her want even more. And more she had, as plate after plate was shovelled down her gullet, barely stopping to breathe before moving onto the next fare, the odd mmm or slight hiccup punctuating the sound of her chewing and lip smacking.

“So delicious~!” she purred, before realising all the food on the table had disappeared. Or more accurately, was now resting in her slightly bloated ,considering her already sizeable girth, gut, gurgling away.

“Aww, no more?” She sighed, before realising there was still the dessert section…

“…I’m really letting myself go!” she shook her head, the weight of her actions finally hitting her…as did her actual weight, as the chair began to seriously buckle underneath her.

Attempting to get up, she pushed herself backwards on the chair as best she could before standing, her doughy midsection sloshing and wobbling from the movement, eliciting a belch. She wanted to go about the day without eating too much now, but…it was so tempting. It was almost as if the dessert was calling to her, even. Beckoning her. Her mouth salivated and she couldn’t help herself when she started magiking over the cakes, pastries and pies and not even setting them on the table, instead just shoving them into her mouth with gluttonous, giddy glee, gulping down entire slices almost in one bite and not concerned at all about her stomach’s slow but noticeable swell as it filled more.

Back on the road, and Trixie was struggling to move herself and the wagon. She’d eaten everything. Literally everything in the dining room. Her belly now hung inches from the grass, it was so packed full of food, and its ache was contributing to her slow pace. By the time she reached Dodge Jct., she wasn’t able to put on a show that night due to how late it was. Still, she hung out with her fans at the restaurant per usual, although she indulged herself into more cider than food.

She could barely see afterwards, and her head was spinning. She needed a lie down. She managed to communicate to her fans that she was heading to her hotel to sleep this off, and staggered off, almost falling over several times, trying to keep her belly, which now dragged along the ground, from toppling her due to its swinging from side to side like a booze filled pendulum, The hotel owner was wise enough to help her to her room and watched as Trixie careened forwards onto her bed with a might ‘BLOOP’, almost crushing it, and immediately falling asleep, making very strange sounding snores as she fell into a dreamless slumber.
155211.title: The Great And "Plus-Sized" Trixie

1552111.content:
The morning after…

“Oooaaawww…” Trixie moaned, slowly waking up to a piercing headache, like a dozen Pinkie Pies were bouncing around her head at once. “What did I do last night…”

Nauseous and groggy to say the least, Trixie didn’t want to leave the bed’s warm embrace, as the chilly air of the new day sent shivers along her exposed body. Her stomach’s tumultuous churnings made her question if she was hungry, or about to throw up, and no amount of rubbing could soothe it. Though, her rubbings did yield something new…she felt much softer than usual. A lot softer even.

Rolling herself out of bed, Trixie yelped as the floorboards of her room groaned noisily as her hooves landed upon them, threatening to snap. Curious, she began to walk to the bathroom…or tried, as she found herself moving at the pace of a lethargic snail in a pool of glue, barely going a few inches with each step. She also found that she could barely move her neck anymore, and was getting annoyed. She resorted to using her magic to carefully take the mirror out of the bathroom and hold it in front of herself, and her jaw dropped open at what she saw.

“Oh myself…”

She was a blob. All that cider, all that food, it had added up. Her body had stopped being barrel shaped and had settled on being like a giant white boulder of fat, with a belly that not only hugged the floor and ate into her almost tree trunk sized legs, but oozed out of the gaps between her legs in all directions, even smushing into the underside of her plot cheeks, which were now so big they gently raised over her like two clouds attached to her back, covered in cellulite dimples. Each cutie mark was now so warped and stretched out upon them that they’d begun to crack, with patches of white fur showing, now doubt her marks needed to heal and adjust to her growth. Her cape had disappeared, she felt for it under one of the many rolls of neck fat accumulating but felt nothing, instead spying it on the bed, having snapped off in the middle of the night as she digested and processed the cider. Her cheeks sagged down and rested atop bulky shoulders, like medicine balls, and sh
e couldn’t even count how many chins she had now, they’d merged with her chest and general neck fat.

“I-I can’t get any bigger…!” she groaned, finding it hard to talk with her squashed up face.
1552111.title: Next Morning and She's a Blob

choices: Next Morning and She's a Mass
Later That Night and a Midnight Snack
15521111.content:
"Or can I?"

An idea was planted in her head and seamed to grow the more she thought about it. Her stomach growled loudly, contributing to the idea.

Trixie slowly made her way to the restaurant once again, noticing the feast of greasy food being prepared.

Trixie gave up any pretenses of modesty or restraint and allowed herself to descend to the primal level of gluttony her hosts exhibited, swallowing entire hay burgers, fish burgers, fried eggs, carrot dogs, anything and everything that she saw in front of her was devoured. It was almost impossible to see her stomach expand from packing away food until after the first few piles had been consumed, Trixie wordlessly moved on from one course to the other, silently eating, the only noises being her burps and hiccups and the sound of chewing and crunching. She didn’t stop until she couldn’t reach anything else.

“Oooogh…” she moaned, licking her grease covered lips. “Can’t move anymore…”

She was now immobile! The Magician was much larger than anything else in the restaurant, a gigantic blue lump resting atop her own belly, unable to reach anything else physically and resorting to using her magic to snatch any more morsels in range, cramming them into her mouth.

She Ended the day outside the restaurant, in the center of town. Trixie was so large she could be considered a landmark for the town by now, there was no way she’d fit back into the hotel, let alone move from her current position. Trixie just purred from the sensation of how full she was before passing out, her dreams weird and wonderful due to her consumption.
15521111.title: The Greater and Bountiful Trixie Part 2

155211111.content:
The morning after…

“-UUUAAARRRRRRP-” was the sound that woke the town, in place of the usual rooster.

“Well...thish ish...the mosht intereshting four daysh I’ve had in yearsh…” the deepened, bass voice of Trixie rumbled, looking down on the assembled townsponies.

Blob no longer did her justice. The magician unicorn had transcended blobbiness and achieved a corpulent nirvana not heard outside of fairytales. She wasn’t a blob, as blobs still had a sense of form to them. Trixie was more a mass. A gigantic, jiggling mass. The only parts of her that still betrayed her nature as a pony and not an oversized gelatin dessert were her head, almost engulfed into her neck fat and with cheeks larger than carts, mouth almost disappearing between them and the billowing river of chins below it, and her tail, above a plot which was the size of a small building, and pockmarked with rolls, dimples and more, the cutie marks almost completely faded due to damage from stretching. They’d heal, of course, but that would take time.

She tried to wiggle her limbs, but to no avail, as her fore and back legs had been sucked into her body, the tips of her hooves still jutting out. Her mane was limply flopped down over her side. All the massive body that was The Great and Bountiful Trixie could do, was rumble, both vocally and from her now bottomless stomach.
155211111.title: Next Morning and She's a Mass

choices: Twilight sends Trixie train tickets to Ponyville
15521112.content:
There was no denying it. Trixie had a serious eating problem. If she didn't put a stop to this soon, she'd have to cancel her tour. And while the concept of a diet disgusted her, she would have to go on one before it's too late. Yet with her fans spoiling her with praise and food that would be tricky. She needed help, and as much as it pained her to admit it, there was only one pony who could help. Well, one princess that is.

After searching her room for some paper and a quill, she scribbled down a letter as best she could while her stomach demanded it be filled immediately. It growled like a starving animal and rumbled loudly. For her sake and the hotel's she hoped the toilet would be able to handle her oversized flank. The sheer intensity of it reverberated through her form and made her flab wobble . Finally, she sent the note and caved in. Struggling to haul her massive body out of her room, she slowly made her way down to the dining room hoping that they had enough food for her this time and that Twilight would get back to her soon.

Days passed and.....
15521112.title: A Call for Help

When she got up from her fall, she noticed she was gaining weight!

15522121.content:
Trixie managed to get to her hooves, swaying as she regained her balance. Quickly, she surveyed the damage. Right in front, she noticed her cheeks were swollen, and an extra chin hung below her neck. Her legs were twice as thick as before, and between them hung a large, cellulite-dimpled belly. Behind her, she could see both her cutie marks on her beachball sized flanks.

"At least I don't have stretch marks," She muttered, laughing despite herself. She hauled her large body over to a chair, which quivered beneath her weight, and grabbed a stack of spellbooks. "Hopefully there's a counterspell, or I'll have to change my name to the Fat and Voluptuous Trixie!"

An hour later, she set the book down.

"R-Really?"

Trixie considered the pros and cons and…
1552212221221.title: She want to be her mentor

155222.content:
Trixie Lulamoon had hit better times after running into Twilight again. Despite a bit of a mishap in Manehattan, her shows earned her better profit than her time on the rock farm. She had to thank the newly crowned princess for distant help in promotion, she was no longer a laughing stock. One week a month, she’d visit Twilight to learn a few new tricks and spells. During one of her free periods, she was working on trying one.

"Not too much, not too little…"

Just as she was about to cast it, there was a knock at her wagon door which caused her to jump, a flash of light erupted from her horn and caused her to blink. She felt a little weird, but shook it off and went to the door. There was Pinkie Pie, grinning ear to ear about something as expected.

"Hi Trixie! Just dropped by to say that the Cakes are doing well with the treats for your show tomorrow night!"

"Th-Thanks Pinkie."

At that moment, Trixie’s stomach growled.

"Sounds like the perfect time to come and do some taste testing!"

"I suppose. Anything to satisfy my stomach."

With that, Trixie followed Pinkie over to Sugarcube Corner and sampled the treats. But that didn’t satisfy her stomach, so she ask for a few regular orders of chocolate cake, cherry pie and cupcakes. But that still wasn’t enough to satisfy her stomach, so went to the Hay Burger for a few meals. After all that…
155222.title: She starves more than usual

1552222.content:
All that food, however, built up a little more weight to her figure. Her belly had a slight wobble whenever she moved, and her plot had some more cushion on it. Her legs had gotten a little fat on them too, and her face had received the start of a double chin. Trixie didn’t notice, she was too busy. By the end of the day, she had perfected the spells she was working on and prepared tomorrow’s show.

However, she ended up picking up a snack or two in between meals, even a midnight snack. But that didn’t stop her from putting on a great show, even if her actions were a little slower than expected. Not long afterwards, she got that starving feeling again. She picked up a snack or two, then joined Twilight for dinner. Even after that she was still hungry, so she went to Sugarcube Corner afterwards for some more dessert. After all that…
1552222.title: …she’s satisfied, but not for long

Later That Night and a Midnight Snack
15522221.content:
Trixie Went to the Fast Food place again, this time ordering more hayburgers. Even that did satisfy her expanding stomach, so she went to Sugarcube Corner for more sweets. It was evening by the time she was finished there, so she headed back to her wagon, stopping by Sweet Apple Acres for a few apple treats.

By the time she got home, she was an overweight blue slob. Her belly hung low enough to just barely graze the floor, and had accumulated a roll or two of back fat. Her widened plot and thicker thighs had caused Trixie to change her walking style into more of a waddle. Her face had large, chubby cheeks with a full double chin and a third clearly on its way. She had definitely gained over 100 pounds from all that food. Winded out, She flopped onto her bed and fell asleep.
15522221.title: …she’s still hungry

155222211.content:
As soon as Trixie woke up, her stomach growled long and loud. She waddled over to Twilight’s castle for a big Breakfast. Although she was a little surprised by Trixie’s gain, the princess of friendship didn’t bring it to her student’s attention and led her to the dining hall. Trixie asked for more than how much Twilight asked for, which was only a few hay bacon strips and fish sausages, one scrambled egg, one doughnut and one serving of hash browns. As Twilight ate, she couldn’t help but watch as Trixie pigged out with her food, causing her figure to expand outwards. That first serving wasn’t enough, and it took another to satisfy her for a few hours. Her belly now dragged against the floor and her plot was even wider and sagging more over her hind legs.

Trixie ended up with a somewhat successful time, perfecting most of the spells she was taught. Leaving the castle for the day, he stomach growled half as long and loud as that morning. She dragged her way over to Sugarcube Corner for some cake and pies. Then she waddled back to the fast food restaurant for a big lunch, with more orders than yesterday. After all that…
155222211.title: Next Morning and She's Starving again!

1552222111.content:
Trixie’s hooves were barely able to touch the ground as she waddled back to her wagon. Every step was heavy and breathtakingly hard for her to manage. She stepped into her wagon completely out of breath and lay on the groaning floor to rest.

After about an hour, she went about practicing the spells from the day. It was dinnertime before she knew it, and she dragged her way over to the fast food place. She had even more orders than ever before and that seemed to make things wierd, but tolerable for the staff of the restaurant. She later returned to her wagon completely winded and exhausted. But she didn’t get to her bed before the floor and wheels collapsed under her massive weight.
1552222111.title: …she’s satisfied for now

choices: a new student walks into the school.
1553221.content:
It was another Monday morning at Canterlot High, but the students weren't happy about entering the school. When they went to their lockers, they had to see the disgusting, horrible decor of Canterlot High's hallways. The paint on the walls and lockers had cracks in them as if something terribly acidic ate into them. All over the floor were piles of festering remnants of eaten food and their containers. A rancid odor roamed the hallways, making anyone who smelt it sick within seconds. Truly, Canterlot High was a horribly putrid place.

Suddenly, the walls started to vibrate. The students looked up as the vibrations in the walls grew stronger; sweat running down their faces. Things only got worse when massive footsteps came from outside. The disturbance was strong enough to shake the floor.

"Oh my God! It's her!" one of the students screamed as she ran for cover.

"Quick! Run for your lives!" another one screamed before fleeing herself.

As the footsteps grew louder and closer, the entire hallway was deserted. A massive shadow loomed over the floor from the windows in the doors. Then without warning, a massive force smashed through the doors! A pair of fat feet stepped onto the destroyed doors.

"Aw, another beautiful Monday morning to cause havoc." said a massively obese girl as she stretched her arms out wide; letting her belly wobble like jell-o.

It was Sunset Shimmer; the biggest and nastiest student in Canterlot High. Her size, weight and horrific disregard towards personal hygiene and her peers made her feared by everyone. Even the principal and teacher staff dreaded whenever she reared her fat, food-stained face on the school grounds. Because of her giant weight and the terror it inspired, Sunset Shimmer proclaimed herself the true Queen of Canterlot High.

Sunset Shimmer pulled out a massive mirror from her backpack and she smiled at herself while making poses towards herself. Her weight had to be at 500 to 600 pounds with arms and legs thick enough to support every round inch of her body. Her breasts were double D size while her ass was one size bigger. Her belly alone was 2 feet round and made it impossible to see her own feet. Her flabby face was covered in food stains along with her clothes that looked two sizes too small for her.

"Yes, I am the true essence of beauty." the yellow-skinned slob said to herself proudly, "Not to mention power."

As she continued to admire herself,...
1553221.title: Sunset Shimmer: The Fat Queen of Canterlot High.

choices: She decides to torment Twilight some more.
15532211.content:
As she continued to admire herself, a voice came from behind her and said, "This place is disgusting!"

The sudden comment took Sunset by surprise and she turned around to see who made the comment. To her delight, it was Twilight Sparkle who was much smaller than the yellow-hued slob. Twilight's eyes widened in complete shock at who she was looking at.

"Sunset Shimmer?! What happened to you?!" Twilight screamed at the larger teen.

Shining Armor gave a loud yawn as sunlight peeked into the room, prompting him to wipe away a few sleepies from his eyes.

Ever since he had been married to Cadence, the white unicorn's physique had, at first unbeknownst to him, began to adapt to the constant pandering of a prince's livelihood. With all the rich, luscious meals at hoof and the day to day routine of sitting on the throne to man the crystal empire, his figure had noticeably began to bloat outward as of late; a stark contrast to the muscular, slim stallion who once commanded the royal guard. Even his wife had started to fall victim and begin to fatten up.

It was only a month after his consecration as prince that he finally stepped upon the scale and gawked at the reading: 167 pounds, which was at least twenty pounds in a month. Cadence weighed herself after assuring him it was no big deal, and was shocked to see had gained just as much.

Although at first dedicated to losing weight, and despite their best attempts at dieting and exercise, the couple actually found cuddling together with their immense bulk rather fun. Not only did they start to enjoy their newfound fat, but thought it would be even more fun to gain even more.

Despite the bewilderment of the royal staff at their rulers deciding to fatten themselves up even more, they soon found their engorged rulers more friendly and cheerful as they grew, and warmed up to their desires rather quickly. Two years later, Shining weighed almost 450 pounds, and loved every ounce of it.

Shining turned his head as far as he could, and gawked at his wife. She looked to be even taller than him and inflated to even more massive proportions. She looked to be eleven feet tall and still growing. With considerable labor, Shining slowly turned around and trudges towards her, his massive footsteps shaking various items in the room. Once he stood face-to-face with her, both shared a long, loving look as shining slowly climbed her and stand up onto his hind legs and gently wrapping his enormous legs around her still-growing neck, which pushed against his grasp.

After staring lovingly at each other snout-to-snout, Cadence wrapped her gigantic legs around him and pulled the both of them into a long passionate kiss. Shining could feel her body swell up around him during their embrace, sinking him deeper into her soft chest. Seeing as her head was now larger than his, her lips covered a larger portion of his face. It was the best kiss he'd ever shared with her.

Like with Shining, Cadence's growth began to die down until it stopped altogether. Slowly pulling away, Shining looked into her beautiful, mauve eyes and slowly leaned forward to give her neck (now boasting an array of chins) a generous nuzzle as she rested her chin on his head, giving out a long, content sigh.

"I'm so lucky…" Shining gently whispered.

"Thank you…" Cadence lovingly replied.

Finally, Shining slowly broke the embrace and backed up several feet so he could see her in her entirety. She had to be almost fourteen feet tall, only a few more feet from the ceiling. Her hooves still touched the ground, but almost comically bunched up her incredibly bloated, blimp-like legs, both preceding a gargantuan stomach that stood out several feet from each side.

"You look amazing…"

"Aw, thank you!" She giggled. Her soft voice was a massive contradiction to her unbelievable size.

Looking to his side, Shining cracked somewhat a mischievous smile as he caught sight of the bottle of pills on the night table, which he levitated to his reach.

"Want to go for round 2?"
155332112112212.title: They gain right then and there.

1553321121122122.content:
"…Nah, Let's save it."

"Sure, but I get to be the bigger one alright?"

"Hm-hm, sure!" She chuckled.

Shining slowly trudged towards the double doors of their bedroom, his sides generously rubbing at the doorframe as he walked through. They did give some resistance to his movement, but he'd managed to pop his blob-like bulk through the door.

Cadence, however, wasn't so lucky.

She'd managed to worm her head and forelegs through the door, her obese body puffing through the door in huge folds as she struggled to pull her way through. It was when she was halfway through that she stopped to catch her breath.

"I…I think I'm stuck!" She huffed as she tried again to move forward.

"Here, I'll help!" Shining announced as he proceeded to...
1553321121122122.title: "Nah, let's save the rest for later."

choices: "Fatten me up more! I'll just break the doorframe!"
15533211211221222.content:
Shining lit up his horn and vanished in a flash, returning to their bedroom. He was met with the sight of his wife's gargantuan rear end practically sprouting from the wall, cracking around her.

"I'M SORRY HONEY!" He hollered at the wall as he approached the blocked doorframe. Straining his blobby forelegs above his head, he practically hugged her globular right butt cheek a mighty push, his legs and face submerging themselves in the pink, cushiony mass. Her left leg pushed against his belly as she too tried to move forward, but with no avail.

"IT'S NO USE!" He hollered as he continued to push, only to slowly collapse and plop backwards on his butt.

"WAIT A MINUTE…" Cadence called back.
15533211211221222.title: Push.

155332112112212221.content:
A pale blue aura surrounded Shining and his wife's ass before vanishing the wall in a huge burst of magic, the two of them falling two feet before practically splashing against the crystalline floor of the throne room.

"Woah!" Cadence uttered in amazement. "I never meant to come here! I only wanted to teleport a few feet!"

"Really?"

"Yeah…I'm not even that good at teleportation!" Nonetheless, Cadence gave a shrug as she trudged towards the throne, Shining waddling in tow.

Both looked down at the rather diminutive thrones, seeming small even after being tailored for their girth. Shining cast a spell to levitate it to the side and seated himself on the floor, his gut sticking out like a giant white globe. Cadence did the same, sell towering five feet over shining while seated.

"He's gonna be in for a surprise, isn't he?" Shining mused as he gently elbowed Cadence, who responded with a giggle. She levitated a bell on a table nearby and gave it a vigorous ring.

"Day court has now begun!"


A few minutes later the massive doors creaked open, and an obese yellow crystal mare popped through with a belly big enough to rub against the floor. The rulers were surprised at how heavy she was; she had to be at least as large as they were this morning.

She entered with a smile, which slowly faded into a look of absolute shock at the towering blobs of fat on the other end of the room, stopping dead in her tracks with a hoof still raised.

"Um…Hello!" Cadence chirped with a nervous smile.

"Y-Your majesties…what…what happened?"

"We've let ourselves go, we guess…" Shining joked. "But not to worry! We're doing just fine."

"H-How did you get so big?"

"Weight gain supplements!" Cadence grinned.

"Is…Is anything really bad going on?"

"Nope!"

"…nobody's in danger of anything, right now?"

"Nope! We've never been better, in fact!"

"Oh…Alright, then!" The mare cleared her throat as she pulled out a small parchment and read from her notes.

She didn't stay much longer. After asking for a tax extension, she said her goodbyes (and struggled to bow) before waddling off. The other ponies were all naturally flabbergasted at their now-titanic rulers, but more often then not were happy for their rulers, and even expressed fondness for their sizes. One Stallion remarked that Cadence looked "unbelievable", and one mare even asked Shining for a hug, which he gladly obliged.

Something that the both noticed, however, was that each of the ponies they spoke with seemed fairly overweight. Most were obese, and even the thinnest of them all still bore a large potbelly.

To say the day wasn't boring was an understatement.

"Thank you for your time, your majesties…" An enormous orange stallion inquired as he turned to leave.

"Um…Excuse me, sir?" Cadence asked.

"Yes, your highness?"

"I just wanted to know…" Cadence's face drooped as she was left with no idea how to politely ask about his weight. "I just couldn't help but notice that, well…"

"Hm?"

"It's just that…most of the ponies we've encountered today have seemed to begin gaining weight recently, and we were just wondering if there was something strange going on we didn't notice."

"Oh, that?" The stallion gave a proud smile. "We've actually started to find strong honor in being under your rule, and started to take interest in fattening up ourselves!"

"Really?" Shining could't help but laugh.

"Yeah! You two are just such wonderful rulers and are always so kind to everypony, we'd thought it'd be fun to follow in your footsteps!"

"Aw, thank you!" Cadence giggled.

With his business done, the stallion walked off and left the two alone for the night.

"Well, I can honestly say that today's day court was the most interesting yet!" Shining exclaimed.

"I'll say…so what now?"

"Hmm…" Shining rubbed at his blobby belly. "In light of today, I don't see what's wrong with getting little bigger…"

"Why not?' Cadence agreed. The two rulers rolled back onto their legs and trotted off, en route for...
155332112112212221.title: "I'll just teleport!"

choices: Shining stops growing just in time.
1553321121122122212.content:
"Curse you, Cadence!" Shining uttered with a look of betrayal. "…I should've know you'd betray me!"

"You're right, Shining. You should have." Cadence replied with a smug tone. "…and considering how long we'd been going at it, you may as well have surrendered long ago."

"But…we'd ruled together so long!…I loved you!"

"That's what you get for thinking the best in ponies…but soon enough, none of that will matter!"

"You can't do this, Cadence! I…" His eyes flashed with determination. "I won't let you!"

"Maybe not by stepping out of the way…which I'd personally recommend."

"You won't get away with this, Cadence! I'm brother of Celestia's personal student, former leader of the Royal guard!"

"Oh, really?" Cadence slowly backed up so she could stand on her hind legs, standing at twenty feet tall with a belly that stuck out almost just as much.

"…bring it."

Glaring forward, Shining stood as well and lunged towards Cadence, holding his hooves up in a fighting stance. Cadence charged as well, grasping at his hooves until Shining slammed into her stomach. The two pitted strength at each other, never breaking eye contact as the two grappled, pushing against the others strength to stay up.

Their strength seemed matched at first, but shining's rear legs slowly started to buckle as he looked up at Cadence, who stared down at him with the same smug grin as sweat began forming on his face.

Finally, Shining's strength gave way as he was flown onto his back, Cadence flying forward and engulfing almost his entire body beneath her gargantuan bulk.

"Had enough, Shining?" She teased as his head stuck out from beneath her.

"I…can't...lose…" Shining's horn glowed as a small fold on his neck fat opened up and the weight gain pills floated out. Before he could open the bottle, Cadence yanked it out of his grasp, the last glimmer of hope in his eyes vanishing.

"Sorry honey…you already have." She mocked as she tossed two of the pills into her mouth.

"no…" Shining could immediately feel Cadence's innards begin to churn over his belly, crushing down on him as her body began to thicken out on top of him. Her belly began to press against his chin as it creeped forward in all directions, pushing his head back against the floor. He watched her face the entire time, whose cheeks became more bloated as more chins began seeping from beneath her head.

Losing all hope, Shining's mane pressed against the ground as her stomach finally crept over his nostrils and bathed him in darkness.

To anyone else, Cadence was alone in the room. Six feet taller than before, Her belly was a monolithic mass that stood out at least ten feet from each side, upon which her head rested within heavily stuffed cheeks and a "neck" composed of four massive chins. Each of her legs had to be five six feet at the thighs alone, aside from her hindlegs, which rose into a gargantuan pony butt that was over twenty feet across and bathed anyone facing it in shadow.

"Oh, how the mighty have fallen…" Another stray gurgle caught her attention, traveling up her throat in the form of a grotesque belch.

"*UUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRPPPPPP….* 'scuse me. And now that Shining has fallen…" But she was interrupted as Shining's left hoof poked out from her underside and knocked on the ground three times. Using her magic, Cadence lifted the from of her belly beneath which Shining's sweaty head poked out and gasped for breath.

"You alright, dear?" She inquired.

"Yeah…just have to catch my breath."

"Wanna stop?"

"Nah, let's continue."

Shining took a deep breath which he held as he went back under her, Cadence resuming her malicious expression.

"…and now that Shining has fallen, ALL OF THE CRYSTAL EMPIRE SHALL BE MINE!!!" She laughed evilly as imaginary thunder roared behind her.

"So, what to do with…" But another growl interrupted her, one which didn't belong to her.

"Wait…What's…" But she gasped in shock as she could feel her slowly begin to rise. Soon enough, Shining Armor's head rose from beneath her as he was growing as well, at a faster rate than Cadence had.

"How…HOW ARE YOU DOING THIS?" She dramatically yelled.

"Harmony always triumphs, Cadence!" His belly began to seep out from beneath her, his legs poking out as well as they stretched. Every bit of him was inflating with fat, his legs growing several feet in diameter and his face getting wider and wider as his cheeks grew to the size of basketballs.

"STOP THIS! YOU'RE RUINING EVERYTHING!!!"

"You would've lost anyway, Cadence!" By that point, Shining's body had grown so large that his entire underside covered the floor, his back traveling along the wall behind him as he continued to grow. "True strength comes from honor and integrity, not from-"

"TOO BIG!!!" Cadence screamed, genuine fear in her voice. Realizing she wasn't acting, and that he was about to fill the whole room, Shining armor's pupils shrunk in horror.

"NONONONONO NO!"

Cadence's eyes clenched shut as Shining's belly continued to press her into the ceiling, which began to crack against her back...
1553321121122122212.title: Their Bedroom

15533211211221222122.content:
Sure enough, the floor to the room above began to crack and was eventually blew apart as a pink mountain of fat blasted through. Cadence got stuck halfway through before Shining finally stopped growing.

"Oh, no!" She moaned in terror as she saw the damage she'd caused. As she turned her neck as far as it'd go, she gave a startled eep! as she noticed a green crystal earth pony in an armchair with a book on his lap, staring back at her in pure horror.

"Oh my goodness, are you alright?"

"I…what…but…" He stammered.

"CADENCE!? ARE YOU ALRIGHT?" Shining's voice called out from below.

"I'M FINE!" She called back before turning back to the stallion. "Listen, I'm so sorry about all this! I promise every cent over this comes out of my pocket, no yours!"

"I…well…okay…"

Beneath, Shining had only a few square feet of space around his head.

"IS EVERYPONY OKAY UP THERE?"

"NOPONY'S HURT! JUST THE FLOOR IS DAMAGED!"

"ALRIGHT…the heck am I gonna do now?" As if in reply to his question, and to his utmost horror, the floor around his rear end began to bow under his weight, causing an audible cracking sound.

"NO!" Ignorant to his claims, his behemoth flank burst through the floor into the room below, him screaming all the way as he plunged through another two floors. Finally he'd reached the ground level, the impact sending a massive jiggle through his blobiness.

"Ugh…" Shining groaned as he now sat on his haunches, the room cramped around his thirty-foot physique. Looking up, he saw the dissected remains of three other floors, the very topmost being Cadence's balloon-like legs, which flailed about as her muffled screams came from above.

"…This was a horrible idea…" But his eyes widened in horror as he feels something squirm beneath his left buttock. "OH NO!!!"

Mustering all his strength, he lifted his butt cheek enough so that he could use his magic to yank out the shivering unicorn mare beneath.

"OH SWEET CELESTIA, ARE YOU ALRIGHT!??!?"

"I-I-I-I should…m-m-m-mayb-b-be I…" The mare merely laid on the ground in the fetal position, her eyes the size of dinner plates. Shining was about to speak until a massive crack came from above, prompting him to look up.

Before he could even flinch, he was met with the sight of Cadence's rear plunging straight at him before engulfing his face and knocking him out cold...
15533211211221222122.title: She breaks through the ceiling.

choices: …too big to fit into the castle.
155332112112212221221.content:
Crazy as it sounds, the impact had the royal couple out for the rest of the day. The two obese rulers woke up the next morning with a little bit of a headache and soon took in their surroundings. They had landed in the throne room of all places and were laying on their rather large stomachs. The both of them took up half the room’s width each, and their plots were starting to squish against the thrones. It was clear that they were now almost too large for the castle and would have to find more room if they wanted to grow more.

In a flash of magic, the massive royal couple had teleported themselves out in front of the castle. It was a bit of a surprise for the chunky crystal ponies, but they soon understood the reasons and began to join their corpulent rulers in breakfast. Both Shining and Cadance had to use their magic to bring the food to their mouths due to their hooves being harder to move at their current size. That increased with every mouthful of food. By the time they were finished, they were…
155332112112212221221.title: The next day...

choices: "I can just use magic to move us around!"
"We can just stay here for a while."
1553321121122122212211.content:
Their feast lasted for three hours straight, plowing through enough food to give two meals to the entire country. The citizens joined in the feast as well, but their appetites were far outmatched by the monstrous gluttony of their giant rulers, and were stuffed long before the two had finished. Each bite from the feast fattened the ponies up very quickly, the citizens leaving the feast now seven feet tall by average. But as they waddled off, Shining and Cadance continued to relentlessly stuff themselves, growing larger by the minute.

The citizens watched in fascination as their rulers expanded like giant furry balloons. Taller and taller they became, expanding towards the sky as their stomachs smothered more of the ground beneath them. They became so large that by the time their feast was finished, there was barely any room left in the square for them to grow.

It was just as they were finishing the feast that they felt to bloated to continue. Shining shoved a forkful of food the size of a car into his maw, swallowing it whole with a satisfied moan. With the feast obliterated he was now fifty feet tall. His head had grown larger than a van, his cheeks coming in close, but above all his stomach had inflated to unfathomably huge proportions. He was at least ninety feet wide, and , and over a hundred long from the tip of his nose to his gargantuan butt cheeks.

He looked down at the ground below him and tried to reach over his monster-sized gut, but the tips of his hooves only barely reached the ground, his limbs even then fattened too wide to walk easily.

"Having some trouble, dear?" Cadance had grown about ten feet taller than Shining, but even fatter. He smiled at his wife facing him and nuzzled him under her chin, who laid her forelegs on him and kissed him on the forehead.

"Yeah, not gonna be able to walk for a while…much less fit inside."

"Well, that's nothing to worry about."
1553321121122122212211.title: …too big to fit into the castle.

choices: the summit for aunt celestia and aunt luna!"
spend an entire month with twiley!"
1553321122.content: "We'll eat first, then go to the train station." shining said, happily, "The train station?" Cadence inquired to her fat, jovial husband. "Did you forget already, honey? today's the day we go to...
1553321122.title: The train station, for a trip out of country.

15533211222.content:
"Oh yeah!" Cadence giggled.

The two continued waddling slowly down the hallway towards their private dining hall. An orange pegasus greeted them at the door.

"Breakfast, your majesties?"

Shining chuckled. "Indeed, Flash. Mind opening the door?"

"Of course, sir." He responded as he pushed the extra-wide double doors open for his rulers to trudge through.

The doors swung open to reveal a smorgasbord of foodstuffs, from flowers to muffins to several small cakes. In other words, a light breakfast.

As the two Rubenesque royals sat down to eat, Cadence spoke. "Shining, honey, when was the last time we visited her, anyway?"

"Around two years! *munch* With us *chew* ruling the *crunch* Crystal Empire and her duties as princess, we haven't had any time to visit!"

Cadence chomped on a muffin, swallowing it whole before speaking. "*gulp* Honey, could you pass the strawberry cake?"

"Of course, dearest."

Over the next ten or so minutes, the two managed to work their way through the entire buffet, their bellies swelling slightly as they stuffed themselves to the brim. With their meal done, the two patted their bellies with a contented sigh. A rumble shook Shining Armor, causing his eyes bulge for a second, before opening his mouth wide to release a warm, satisfied
*BUURRPP!*
"'Scuse me..." He mumbled, slumping back down.

Cadence's horn glowed as a deep gurgle welled up inside of her, deciding to outdo her mannerless husband.
*BRAAAAARROOPPPP!!*

Shining's nose wrinkled up at the smell of semi-digested food assaulting it. "Eugh, Cadence! Why!"

She giggled in response. "Oh Shiny, you should be used to it by now!"

"Yeah, but..." Suddenly, Shining's eyes shot open. For a moment, Cadence thought he was about to try for an even bigger burp, but when he opened his mouth, he shouted "The time! We'll be late for the train!"

Cadence nearly tripped as she shot out of her seat, grabbed Shining Armor by the foreleg, and raced out of the room as fast as her legs could carry her. Flash Sentry followed behind, easily keeping pace with the two.

"Flash!" Cadence gasped, "I need you to go on ahead and tell them to hold the train!"

The guard saluted. "Of course, your highness!" and flew off.


The Royal Train Station was a brutalist nightmare constructed during the reign of King Sombra. All concrete and sharp corners, it sacrified aesthetics and ergonomics to create one of the more imposing structures in the city, and created a stark contrast to the gleaming crystal train that sat on the main track. This was far from the minds of the two sweaty, out of breath ponies who waddled onto the platform half an hour late. The crew of the Royal Train was half way through a game of Appleoosa Hold 'Em when they arrived, but quickly set to work readying the train for the journey ahead, and their loyal guard Flash Sentry helped them into their carriage.


As the train chugged slowly out of the station, picking up speed as it went along, Shining Armor clenched his teeth and moaned.

"Oh, I don't feel so good."

"What is it, Shiny?" Asked Cadence, gently rubbing his full stomach with her own flabby hoof.

"We *urp* shouldn't have done all that running right after eating..." He groaned.

"What do you mea-ohhh" Cadence gasped as an uncomfortable tremor ran through her belly. She doubled over, feeling a strange gurgling movement in her lower gut.

Flash spoke up hesitantly. "Y-your highnesses, th-the bathroom is just in the next car if you-"

Cadence's eyes widened. "Too late!"


The windows of the Royal Carriage, and indeed all along the Royal Train, were designed to be unopenable while the train is moving. This measure was meant to protect the passengers from the cold as it traveled across the icy tundra surrounding the Crystal Empire. If one followed along outside, one would see Flash Sentry desperately struggle to open a window, then bash himself against it in an attempt to break it, before a greenish-brown haze obscured the inside of the car.
He would never speak of what had happened in the car, and whenever questioned about it, would get a far away look in his eyes, shuddering as he mumbled about 'How much green could fit in one brown package'.


After three hours, the Royal Train screeched into Ponyville Station, drawing the attention of the numerous ponies waiting there. As they crowded around to see who was aboard, the main door of the carriage opened. The ensuing blast of air unleashed a horrific cloud of stink upon the poor ponies of the platform, many of whom ran for their lives, believing it to be some sort of biological attack.

Out of the smog staggered a green-faced Flash Sentry, who greedily sucked in a breath of fresh air before speaking to the empty station.
"Announcing Princess Cadence and Prince Shining Armor!"
He stepped to the side, leaning against the main building as he gasped for clean lungfuls of air.

Through the small train door squeezed Shining Armor, his white coat slick and clean as ever, and his facial expression almost euphoric in nature. With a little jiggling and a push from his wife, he managed to get his gargantuan plot through the exit. Cadence followed suit, finding it no easier to fit through and needing a magical tug from her husband to clear her slightly wider belly through the door.
As soon as they stepped off the train, the entire thing seemed to raise up a foot and a half, before the doors slammed shut and the entire thing sped off with a squeal of grinding metal.
The two blobish ponies, plus their semi-conscious guard, were left alone on the bare platform.

Looking around, Shining inquired, "Cady, how come nopony's here?"

"Didn't you tell Twilight we were coming?" Cadence asked in response.

Shining's expression dropped. "No, I thought you did!"

A flapping sound rang out, causing the two to look up. "It doesn't matter, here she is now!" Cadence squealed, belly quaking in excitement.

A purple alicorn glided down from the sky, striking a graceful pose as she landed in front of the royal couple.

"Twiley!" Shining Armor shouted in delight.
15533211222.title: spend an entire month with Twiley!"

choices: Shining shows her what success REALLY smells like!
Shining tries, once again, to explain the situation.
155332112221.content:
Silence reigned between the fat and the fit on the platform, broken only by Flash Sentry's occasional gasp, but nopony payed any attention to him since he's a terrible character anyway. Finally, Twilight spoke.

"Big brother, Cadence! What have you done to yourselves?!"

Shining Armor was taken aback by this, but quickly recovered. "Hello to you too, LSBFF!" He cried, trying to throw his meaty arms around his sister. Twilight dodged out of the way, sending Shining stumbling to the ground.

"Twilight!" Cadence snapped, "Calm down!"

"Cadence, I- No, you're right," Twilight said, taking a deep breath, "I should be calm and cool and collected about this. Since you're so big, I can only assume you came here for help losing weight. Unfortunately, I don't know any spells to instantly remove weight. I do, however, know a really great exercise regimen that could help!"

"Really, Twily, we're happy like this-" Cadence started, but Twilight was on a roll.

"It really helped me when I was worried about gaining weight, but look at me now!" Twilight paused to smack her well-toned flank, "As petite as Rarity and quick as Rainbow Dash! I'm not sure how difficult it'll be for such big ponies, but we'll find out! C'mon, to the library!"

Twilight happily trotted off, Shining and Cadence hesitating before trudging ponderously after her. Flash Sentry, completely forgotten, followed close behind.

==============

"Now Cadence, I want you to go out and buy everything on this list," Twilight said as soon the plump ponies stepped inside. In the time it took her and Shining to reach the library, Twilight had already set up exercise mats, gymnastics equipment, A WORKOUT SCHEDULE! This was too much, and Cadence was going to take a stand!

"Uh, Twilight, we're actually-" She once again tried to explain, but Twilight shooed her out the door with not a single word. She took a look at the list and gasped in horror. It required she visit Sweet Apple Acres, Carrot Top's Carrot Tops, Peachy Keen's Peachery, Lord Doomslayer De'athface Murderking's yoghurt shack... Not a bakery or all you can eat restaurant anywhere to be seen!

"Aargh!"
She heard Shining scream from inside, but, knowing the futility of any rescue attempt, she simply sighed and began walking slowly towards the market. As she wandered off, an idea came to her. An awful idea. Princess Cadence had a wonderful, awful-
*FRRT!*
'Nope, just gas,' She thought.

========

Inside, Shining Armor's ponderous plot had been encased in a pair of black spandex shorts. They were at least two sizes too small, and crushed his balls to the point that he was worried about the prospect of having kids. The sheer size of his rear end was highlighted by the inches of flesh that squeezed around the edges. The fabric seemed taut and ready to break with even the slightest movement, but somehow they remained intact as Twilight led him in pre-exercise stretches.

He again tried to explain why he was so big, but Twilight was having none of it. "Twily, this isn't necessary. Me and Cadence-"

She probably would've put a comforting hoof on his shoulder if she wasn't so much stretching her wings out with her hooves. "I know, you probably forgot yourselves and ate a bit too much. Happens to the best of us. Why, just a few weeks ago Princess Celestia was saying to me..."

Shining zoned her out and focused instead on trying to touch his rear hooves over his belly. After 30 utterly wasted seconds, Twilight moved on to the next move, and the next, and the next, all of which involved Shining's fat getting in the way of him stretching, and by the end of it he was already tired.

The first proper exercise, stomach crunches, was hampered by the loss of muscle definition caused by his laid-back lifestyle.
The second, pushups, was honestly quite easy, as Shining's belly was simply too big for him to lift with just his forelegs.
Finally, as they began the final exercise, Shining couldn't help but wonder where Cadence was, and if she was taking so long to try and avoid Twilight's overzealous exercise routine.

===============

"An' so that's how Ah saved all o' reality!"
"Teehee, Applejack, you are a card!" Cadence giggled, just finishing off her third apple pie.
Applejack grabbed the empty plate from the table. "Thanks Princess Cadence, ma'am! Wouldja like s'more apple fritters?"
"Sure!"

Just off to the side, Flash Sentry was being ignored. His continued attempts at conversation were stymied by the bulwark of pony perfection known as Big Macintosh.
"This sort of thing happen often?"
"Eeyup."

==================

Shining's ass jiggled up and down as he jogged in place. Sweat poured down his face, his cheeks turned beet red from exertion, and he was fairly certain he was developing a rash in his personal zone. His legs ached, and the flab of his thighs smacked rhythmically against each other. The sight of him reminded Twilight vaguely of a picture Fluttershy had once shown her of a beached whale.

After just a quarter of an hour, Shining Armor had reached his limit. Having been largely inactive for the past couple of years, he wasn't used to any stretch of physical activity. Twilight, however, was just fine, and looked at him with pity as he slumped down like a sack of potatoes. A pony-shaped sack of potatoes. A very fat, tired pony-shaped sack of potatoes breathing heavily and wearing sweat-stained spandex bike shorts. So actually nothing like a sack of potatoes, but we'll use that analogy anyway.

"Wow, I'm sweaty," Shining said in between gasps.

Twilight, still chipper, giggled. "Oh Shiny, that's just the smell of success! We'll pick this up at the same time tomorrow, so what do you want to do in the meantime?"
155332112221.title: Twilight is shocked!

choices: Shining gets to work on her ass.

A world known as…The Twilight Zone.

…..

Many miles above the skies of Equestria, a stray mass of planetary debris diverged from its straight path throughout space, angling itself toward the planet's point of gravity. As it entered the atmosphere, wisps of flame swirled around it, the heat also bringing out a faint yet bright green aura from within its minerals. More of the rock eroded away as its speed made the air chew it away, but unlike many other rocks en route for the planet it would't disappear; not enough to leave an impact.

Deep in the town of ponyville, in what would soon become an epicenter stood a two story home, its owner sleeping in the corner room on top. As the morning rose and sunlight peeked in through the window, the unicorn mare squirmed in bed, rising with a yawn.

"…time for another day!" Lyra smiled happily, jumping out bed and trotting to the bathroom. After a quick shower and brushing her mane, she trotted out with a clean coat and a freshly combed mane, ready to embrace the day.

"…I think this calls for a musical number!" She announced. Leaping back onto her bed, she unveiled the blinds and threw open the window, the crisp air outside hitting her fur.

"Ahem!" She coughed, clearing her throat. She filled her lungs with air, the beginning notes to a song playing in her head before she began to sing.

"It's another great day in po~nyvi~lle! It's a wonderful day in th- GAK!!!"

Her song was cut short by a green meteor the size of a golfball flaming through the air and zoning right into her mouth, the impact tossing her from the bed and into the wall behind her. The hit left her dazed on the floor, her eyes wonky till she shook her head and regained her composure.

"What…What was that?" She asked aloud, the rest of the room unaffected. She got back onto her hooves and cracked her neck, then looked around for the meteor.

"It has to be somewhere. It couldn't have just disappeared!"

She stood on her hind legs and held onto the edge of the cabinet, scanning the top with her eyes. It was then that a faint gurgling ran through her stomach, but it wasn't from hunger. It went on for a few seconds, and she paid no heed as her stomach began to bulge out a few more inches, but she noticed something was wrong as she felt the fur on her belly press against the drawers.

She got back on all fours and pressed a hoof into her stomach, which bore more of a paunch.

"…The hay? I didn't weigh this much before now!" But another rumble ran through as she began to fatten up again, her belly pushing out a few more inches. Her legs and face also gained a noticeable amount of flab, but most of all she even gained another inch in height.

She stood there in shock for a few moments, her hoof still pressed into her belly. As what happened registered in her mind she ran (with more difficulty) to the body mirror, and was met with the sight of her pudgified frame.

"This…this can't be happening…" But to add insult to injury her stomach rumbled again as she gained in an even bigger spurt, her stomach expanding so large that it touched the ground. Her legs widened by a few more inches, stretching so that she was a few inches taller than before.

She brought both hooves to her chubbier face, assessing their softness.

Lyra trudged through the streets of Ponyville as fast as her newfound weight would allow, struggling to get to her friend's house. Near anypony she passed by double-took at her bloated physique, surprised considering the once slim and slender pony she now replaced. To make matters more difficult she felt her stomach rumble numerous times as she ran, becoming fatter and taller eat time. By the time she reached Bluesworthy's block she reduced to a crawl's pace and stood five feet tall, fattened up so much that her belly stuck out three feet from either side.

It was hard for her to trot on the walkway to Blues' front door, given that she was much wider than the stoop to the door. The sides of her belly toppled over the guardrails, but she paid no heed as she knocked on the door.

"Who is it?" A friendly voice from inside called.

"Lyra? Hold on, I'll be right there!" His voice was uncharacteristically concerned, given the fear in Lyra's voice. Upon opening the door, the blue earth pony gasped in shock as he laid eyes on Lyra's gigantic proportions.

"Lyra? By Celestia, what's happened to you?!"

"Can I come in? I need help!"

"What? Well...S-Sure, come on in!"

"Thanks…" Lyra trudged forward, but was unable to pull the entire way through as her gigantic belly got caught in the doorframe. "…a little help here?"

"Sure, here!" Bluesworthy grabbed both of Lyra's forelegs and pulled back with all his might, Lyra's body slowly pushing through. Outside she pushed against the ground with her hind legs, the doorframe warping into the house.

It was just as the doorframe started to crack that Lyra was through up to her flanks, which were just barely her widest point. She got stuck pretty snugly for a few seconds, but with a loud POP managed to come loose, and half near trampled Bluesworthy in the process.

"Lyra, what's happened to you? Is this some sort of Allergic reaction?!"

"I don't know! I just remember getting up this morning and then something from out of nowhere flew through the air and hit me in the mouth, and I think I swallowed whatever it was and now I'm growing!"

"Woah…slow down, what happened, again?"

But she couldn't repeat herself as her stomach let out another rumble, one loud enough the Bluesworth could actually see her belly quiver before it once again started to swell, pushing against her balloon-like legs as it covered much more of the ground beneath her. Lyra shot up another foot, now substantially taller than her friend who used to dwarf her. Her legs blew up so much that her calves were over two feet wide, and her flanks were so huge that her cutie mark was larger than a grown mare.

"T-T-T-T-This…this is a dream." Bluesworthy stammered, absolutely stunned. "This is a dream. If a close my eyes and open them again, I'll wake up."

"Bluesy, listen!"

But he didn't pay heed as he clenched his eyes shut for a few seconds, only to open them and see his insanely fat friend again. He tried again with little success.

"But…But how?"

"This project would revolutionise the sick and elderly creatures," Princess Twilight represented her invention to the Committee of Technology Development.

Her project was golems that would provide necessary needs to the unfortunate. They would aid them with everything from bathing to moving around. They were programmed to tackle any problem they will encounter. She created a spell to give them some kind of learning artificial intelligent. If they encounter any problem that they don't have a protocol for, they would like for the closest source of information such as books or specialist.

"It looks promising," the head of the committee was looking through the documents, "However, there are still one more task before we could approve it. As this is extremely different from others from before, this task should considerable take a lot longer."

"I've heard about it," Twilight pulled out another document, "As I was studying the law, it stated that something like my invention should be tested by a subject for a year without any outside influence. I have the subject and the base of operation."

The committee looked at the new document and saw a zebra named Zecora. She would be placed somewhere far away from any civilisation. A frozen wasteland that was considerable far from the Crystal Empire. Nopony would accidentally stumble into it.

After reading the document, the head asked a question, "Is Zecora being compensated for being alone for a year?"

"Affirmative. Zecora had agreed with the payment she was given. She would be paid as well as she live there rent-free with free use of all facilities within that base. The golems would leave the base to order anything that the base doesn't have."

The committee talked to each other before making a final decision, "The subject, Zecora, would be allow to participate in the golems project. If we find that the end result is unsatisfactory, we would stop all support with your idea until you fix all the issues,"

"I understand. I will commence the golems project immediately."



"This is your place you would be staying for a year Zecora," Princess Twilight showcase the base.

The base is built inside a huge mountain so it does not stand out. The whole mountain is like hollow out still have the basement dug out. The base felt like a bunker for thousands of ponies for emergency. This place have everything from a movie theatre to a plantation farm. It must cost a fortune. Having the latest technology with hundreds of golems patrolling every part of the base.

"I know this is much but I want the best result as much as possible. This whole place is for you for a year. Just do what you usually do but you can not leave the base or contact anyone. The golems would help you with anything you need," she hoofed her a remote with a button, "This is for emergency. Press this and I would come and get you. Only use this when the golems couldn't even solve the crisis."

Zecora was left alone at the new base. She brought all her belongings with her. She was amazed how this place was functioning. She quickly settled in the new place. Everything was going fine within a couple of hours until something weird come up. All the golems captured her and tied her down in the cafeteria room.

"You are severely underweight. Immediate action need to take place. See report for proof," a golem handed her a sheet with her details on it.

The sheet about her was scribbled on. Her pictures were drown with a moustache and a beard. Random doodles were around the border. The most shocking part is that her healthy weight is scribbled out and replace with ∞ (infinity). The other details were left alone.

"This is not right! Let me call Princess Twilight!" Zecora reached for the button.

Thank goodness his magic was still strong, with a snap of his eagle talons he began conjuring more food for himself, thus beginning the second day of his gluttony. Every cake, pie and whatever that slid down his gullet added pound after pound to his expanding body. All this made his weight skyrocket. His cheeks grew puffier and he gained yet another chin. His eagle claw and lion paw beefed up much more and so did his reptilian and goat legs. Rolls upon rolls continued developing on his back and his flabby torso began to merge with his belly, which grew to the point where its protrusion was a good normal height of a draconquis. But it was his backside that was taking a lot more plush weight, ending up sagging greatly over his legs as he reached the last of his haul. Overstuffed and tired, he fell asleep into a food coma slightly wondering what to do tomorrow.
15533222222121221211.title: Continue Conjuring

155332222221212212112.content:
The next morning and Discord found himself putting more effort into getting up. He quickly summoned his large mirror with his magic, and starred at his reflection. He now sat at twenty four feet high and wide, and fourth five feet long. Another chin supported his head which now had puffy cheeks that were beginning to sag. His arms were beginning to merge with his sides and his legs were nowhere to be seen in the position he was in. His back, while having developed more folds, had begun to get rounder, and his torso had merged with his massive belly. His backside covered his legs and feet greatly, and his tail was half its size wide.

It was clear that physical movement was out of the question. Thank goodness his magic was still strong, for today he was curious about one of the spells he read a few days ago. Not to mention he felt a little lazy, his bigger body being a contribution to that.

"That ‘Weight gain in a instant’ spell should work nicely."

He snapped his eagle talons and soon a low rumble emitted from his fat packed stomach as he lifted his lion paw onto it. In seconds, the draconquis let out a rather massive belch, which echoed and reverberated throughout the cave he was hiding in.

"BBBUUURRRPPP!!!!!!"

As he did so, he felt his belly begin to push out against his paw. His body took up another twelve feet of cave space, more rolls and folds developing all over him. His back bulged rounder and his hight increased. At the end of the wave, he now sat at thirty six feet in height and width, and ninety feet in length. His head was now resting upon four necks with two large cheeks sagging down. His feet, paw and talon were sucked into his arms and legs, turning into pillow buttons. His roll heavy torso had now merged with his massive belly, and he had many more back rolls. His backside wasn’t far behind, now almost as high as he was before putting on weight, and his tail was beginning to droop, now about half as thick as his backside was. It all felt amazing, as though he was sitting on a massive, warm waterbed.

He gave a long, euphoric sigh as a warm smile spanned his face, his chin relaxing on of his massive neck.

"This feels so good."
155332222221212212112.title: Try A Spell

1553322222212122121121.content:
He soon felt the need to experience that feeling again.

"I think I’ll do that again, had a nice feeling to it."

Another snap of his eagle talons and a rumble and belch later, his form began to expand once again. This time it was longer than the first one, and packed on more pounds in the process. At the end of that wave, he not only found it impossible to physically move but also felt his face starting to feel squashed. It also appeared that his hiding place was starting to get too small for him. He now sat sixty feet high and wide, and a hundred and forty four feet long. His cheeks were now beyond cart size and his head was starting to get sucked in by his seven necks. His torso and belly were taking up most of the space, both heavy with thick, segmented rolls. Even his back was fold heavy, having rounded out through the night. His backside, now starting to get covered by his belly, was starting to get dimpled as it got bigger, with a tail that was not far behind in thickness, but also almost touching the floor of the cave.

"Feels… So… Good…"

Feeling so much comfort in his own body was beginning to make him drowsy. After managing yet another snap from his talon, he soon fell asleep.
1553322222212122121121.title: Try Another Spell

15533222222121221211211.content:
When Discord woke up the next morning, he’d burst out of the caverns and into the castle, rubble scattering in all directions. He was now ninety six feet tall and wide, and a hundred and eighty feet long. His cheeks were now like two large boulders and his head was even more sucked into his thick, multiplying necks. His torso and belly jutted out under and onto the castle floor, rolls and crevices a plenty. His back was even rounder, with many rolls. His backside was covered even more by his belly, heavy in dimples and had a tail jutting out half as thick and touching the ground.

“‘Gain… by day’ is… working!” He managed to say, his massive cheeks and partially squashed face making it hard to talk.
15533222222121221211211.title: The Next Morning…

15533222222121221212.content:
The next morning and Discord found himself putting some effort into getting up. He quickly summoned a large mirror with his magic, and starred at his reflection. His belly was now resting atop his reptilian and goat shins which were much thicker, both them and his eagle and lion arms were covered in a layer of drooping tissue that were like sleeves upon sleeves. His chest had developed more sloping folds that gave it an almost accordion look. His flanks jutted out like a pair of boulders and his backside itself had ballooned out so much it would have crushed his throne if he still had it and sat on it now. His face also had fatted more, with cheeks puffed out like he’d tried to eat tennis balls, and his chin now had two new siblings. Even his reptilian tail was lower than usual and looked a lot wider than yesterday.

It was clear that putting on weight would slow down his physical movement. Thank goodness his magic was still strong, but today he was curious if magic could make him bigger. He snapped his eagle talons and soon a low rumble emitted from his fat packed stomach as he lifted his lion paw onto it. In seconds, the draconquis let out a rather massive belch, which echoed and reverberated throughout the cavern he was hiding in.

"BBBUUURRRPPP!!!!!!"

As he did so, he felt his belly begin to push out against his paw. His form expanded a good foot from his body, a large belly took form and developed into segmented rolls, the draconquis developed two more chins, all of which flopped violently as they bulged out from his neck. His tail was trying to keep up with his inflating rear end, which he was sitting on at that moment, causing him to gain altitude. His legs were most likely the reason he sat down, finding it hard to hold up his expanding belly despite inflating and bulging with layers of flab. After about a minute of unrelated expansion, Discord’s gaining began to slowly die down until it stopped altogether. Although somewhat disappointed, he was still amazed by how huge he was. Sitting at a whopping twelve feet tall, he looked to be about several feet wider and longer. Each of his legs and arms looked about to be several hundreds of pounds each, almost like his size this morning. He lifted one and gave his own body a generous smack, sending a large jiggle rippling throughout his entire body. It felt amazing; as though he was sitting on a massive, warm waterbed.

He gave a long, euphoric sigh as a warm smile spanned his face, his chin relaxing on of his massive neck.

"This feels so good."

15533222222211212.content:
See, even though Celestia banished her sister TO THE MOON, she couldn't quite seal her into it. Left wandering the moon's surface, Nightmare Moon was left hungry...and with nothing to do and nothing to eat but moon rocks, she dug in. She ended up quite liking the taste of moon rock, and just kept eating. Over time, her resentment faded as she gorged and she forgot why she had been jealous of her sister in the first place. As he resentment faded, her body swelled with adipose, and Nightmare Moon faded away, to be replaced by Luna. Now back to normal, she doubled her efforts on devouring the moon, as it was the only thing that she enjoyed doing and could do. Her weight rose, and as she grew blobby, she dug down with her eating, and ate the moon from the inside out.
770 years after her banishment, Luna finished the last little grain of the moon. The very thing she used to raise up every night, that had once been her prison, was now seas of fat on her brilliantly blobby bloated body. She was massive. Had she been under the effects of gravity, she wouldnt even have been classfied as blob, as blobs had at least some retainment of a pony form. The only things that signified Luna had one been a Alicorn where the bumps that signified where her overswollen limbs had sunk into her body with her royal horseshoes still adoring her hooves, the lumpy mounds that had used to be her wings, her mane and tail with every strand flowing freely, her head and horn buried within the folds of her face, and her massively overstretched cutie mark slowly fixing itself. Her enormity brought contentment, she was unable to do anything besides floating in orbit anyway. She was like this for 330 years more......untill......
