15533222222222222111.content:
Miss Harshwhinny, official Equestria Games Inspector, former Mare's Gymnastics Champion, was grumpy. It wasn't just her regular grumpiness, either. She wasn't having a very good day. She sat slumped in her armchair, a cup of coffee clutched in one hand, the morning paper in the other, and wondered how it all went so wrong.

Her alarm went off at 5 AM, as usual, and she prepared for her morning workout. 500 deadlifts with 200-lb weights kept her muscles toned even as she approached middle age. Though a pot belly had long since overtaken her six pack, and her tight pectorals were hidden beneath a pair of plump, juicy breasts, she liked to stay in peak physical condition. Satisfied with her work, she stepped into the bathroom and turned the knob on the shower... Only for a loud groan to emanate from the pipes. She'd need a plumber to fix this, and until then, the best she could do was to soak up as much sweat as possible with a towel and hope for the best.

When she was dry, she headed for the deodorant, hoping to disguise the lingering scent.... And was greeted by an empty tube. The speed stick was done. She tossed it in the trash with a grumble, and headed off to get dressed.

She was thoroughly annoyed at this point, but knew nothing else could possibly happen to spoil her day. So when she flung open the closet and found it empty, she nearly screamed in fury. The laundry hamper was full. All she had left was an old outfit from her athletic days, about 100 pounds ago. Given the choice between smelling like a sewer or possible indecent exposure, she chose the latter. After all, she only needed to wear it long enough to get to the laundromat and back. But first, she had to get the newspaper.

Something so simple, nothing could go wrong. So when she bent over to grab the paper, winking saucily at the stud next door, she didn't scream as a horrible fart attack wracked her backside, sending the flab jiggling. She'd forgotten to take her indigestion pills, and was paying the price.

And now here she was, dressed like a slutty sports star, smelling like unwashed gym socks. She sighed, eying the nearby wall phone. She really needed to get a cell phone one of these days. Banishing such idle, unprofessional thoughts, she decided to...

155332222222222222211.content:
Sapphire Shores was on stage with her backup dancers practicing for her next show. She and her crew were rehearsing the dance moves as she shook her flank all over the stage while her backup dancers were ready to collapse. They hadn't been dancing for long but Sapphire was making their rehearsal unbearable. She was making the stage shake with every step she took and making the air unbreatheable. Recently Sapphire had undergone a rather...drastic change. For the past few weeks she had gained a large amount of weight.

PFFFFFT!

The ponies behind her gagged and one nearly fainted from the smell she expelled from her butt. Sapphire didn't mind and just kept singing and letting out a cheer. In addition to her increase in mass she had gotten rather gassy. Sapphire didn't seem to mind either change since the paparazzi made her more famous in the tabloids. After she spotted a story about a five pound weight gain regarding herself in the tabloids she realized that more ponies were talking about her and she decided to take advantage of this by getting fatter and showing it off for all of Equestria to see. So far her concert attendance had sky rocketed and she was known throughout the land. It did come with a price though.

RRRRRRIP!

The music stopped and she looked down to see her latest outfit was torn down the middle.

"Darn it. Everyone take five while I change again." Sapphire told everyone, the back up dancers galloping out to get some fresh air. Sapphire sighed at how wimpy her coworkers were. She trotted back to her dressing room and got undressed. Before putting on another outfit she looked at herself in the mirror and admired her pudgy form. By now her belly was taut, plump, and just a few inches from dragging against the ground. Her limbs were much thicker, her crotchboobs were noticeably fuller, and her plot was jiggly and as big as her head. The one thing she loved about her fattened body was that she could shake her flank all across the stage for her fans to admire. Her clothing budgets had increased since she wore tight outfits to show off her increasing assets but it was worth it. She would have stayed in her dressing room to admire herself even more but she had a schedule to keep. It was time for her to...

155332222222222222212121.content:
Twilight awoke with a long, strained yawn, slowly opening her eyes to the sunlight streaming in. She looked outside the window to see the bright, warm spring morning outside, the sound of residents chatting about faintly audible from inside.

Normally, she'd leap out with a chipper smile, but today…she just wanted to sleep. Strange, considering all the work she laid out for herself.

"Maybe I can sleep in a bit…" she groggily confessed. "After all…it's only…" but her eyes went wide when she noticed the time on her alarm clock.

"11:00 AM!??!" She uttered in shock, not realizing how loud she was. "I…I've never slept past 10 in my life!"

Ashamed at her laziness, she immediately rolled out of her bed and trotted towards the bathroom. As she opened the door and looked in the mirror, she was met with another surprise.

First off, she was rather out of breath for the short distance she walked. As she looked at herself in the mirror, she gasped as she observed her physique, which of as late had seemed to plump up slightly. Her belly hung down and stood from her sides by a few more inches, and her face and neck seemed to have an extra paunch to them. As she turned her side towards the mirror, she blushed as she saw that her rear end had gained quite a bit of plush to it.

"Oh no…I can't believe I've let myself go!" She groaned, somewhat ashamed.

Somewhat downtrodden, she trudged down the steps to the library, mentally planning her diet for the next few weeks. As she approached the library's podium, she noticed a small note taped to it written in quill ink.

Twilight-

Went to help Rarity. Be back at noon.

-Spike

Realizing she'd be alone for about an hour, she decided to...
155332222222222222212121.title: Chubby

1553322222222222222121212.content:
Carefully levitating her saddle bag around her side (faintly distraught by how tight it now was) she threw open the door and headed into town.

At first, Twilight only looked ahead with a taut face, fearful of any eye contact she could make with anypony. Any faint murmur she heard sent a trickle of fear into her spine, scared that ponies around her noticed her enlarged stature.

However, as she crossed the market square, her stomach let out a steady gurgle. With a look of trepidation, she let out a sigh.

"I guess I have skipped breakfast, after all." Glancing around, she noticed a small bakery stall nearby.

As she approached the stall, she was surprised by the mare running the stall. Not by who the mare was, but by her rather heavy frame. Twilight saw her near every day here, and although rather chubby, her belly was now just barely touching the ground and caged in by her fattened legs. She could even see both cutie marks over her engorged flanks.

"…How can I help you, miss?" The pony asked despondently.

"Oh, uh…" Twilight stammered, taken out of her daze. "I'll take two bagels, please."

The mare blankly handed her two bagels and took her payment.

"…Have a nice day." She said in a contradictory tone.

"Thanks…" Twilight lazily replied as she walked off, still surprised.

As she navigated town, she began to observe the other ponies in town, munching on her bagel…and was surprised by what she saw.

Most of the ponies, like her, seemed to have gained some mass overnight. Many didn't seem to notice, their fat quivering as they obliviously walked about. Many other ponies, however, bore a look of confusion or fear as they chatted with each other, probably over their spontaneous weight gain. She counted only about one thin pony per block.

With a look of confusion, she turned the corner that would head her to...
1553322222222222222121212.title: Go run an errand around town.

choices: Twilight and Pinkie grow incredibly hungry!
15533222222222222221212121.content:
As Twilight reached Sugarcube Corner, she was confused at first sight of how inactive the bakery seemed to be. Sure enough, the place was completely deserted, with a large sign taped to the front doors.

CLOSED FOR FAMILY-RELATED REASONS.


WE APOLOGIZE FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE.


"Okay, this can't all be a coincidence!" Twilight insisted to herself as she stood on her hind legs to peer into the empty bakery over the swinging doors.

"Hello?" She called into the darkness. "Mr. and Mrs. Cake? Anypony in there?" When there was no response, Twilight started to turn and head back, but stopped as she heard a noise from inside. Curious, she slowly creaked the doors open. She couldn't tell what it was, but she heard it coming from the kitchen.

"Hello? Anypony here?" Twilight called again as she approached the kitchen door. However, as she opened the door, he look of curiosity turned to one of absolute shock as she too in what lay behind.

It was Pinkie, but she looked more like a gigantic pink water balloon than the energetic pony she once was. She stood on her hind legs as she wolfed down a massive pile of cupcakes, her massive stomach quivered with her movements and flattened most of the treats in front of her as her overinflated forelegs shoved large hoof-fuls of cupcakes into her waiting muzzle, which rested atop a massive collar of fat around her neck.

To top it all off, she looked as if she gained at least a foot in height, a sign only of extreme obesity in ponies.

"P…PINKIE?!!?" Pinkie's ear flicked at Twilight's stammering and she finally turned away from the treats to glance at Twilight. At the sight of her friend, her fat face grew a wide smile.

"Hiya, Twilight! What're you up to?" She asked in her usual chipper tone.

"W…WHAT'S GOING ON HERE!!??"

"Oh, Mr. and Mrs. Cake just went to the hospital to check up on something about allergies and left me in charge."

Twilight could barely comprehend Pinkie's obliviousness.

"I…but…Pinkie, have you…I'm sorry, but do you see how big you've gotten?" Pinkie's smile finally faded as she gave Twilight a slightly ashamed look.

"I did notice that I'd gotten a bit chubby this morning…Is it that noticeable?"

For the first time in many years, Twilight was left without any words.

"Just…Just follow me!" Twilight headed towards the nearby bathroom with Pinkie slowly following behind. When Twilight opened the door, Pinkie couldn't fit through the door, but was still able to see her reflection and gave a horrified gasp.

"WHAT HAPPENED TO ME?"

"I don't know, but I think something else is going on with everypony else, too! It seems like many other ponies in town are gaining weight as well!" At the mentioning, Pinkie's eyes widened.

"That must be what happened to Mr. and Mrs. Cake! They thought they were having allergic reactions and…" But Pinkie was cut off as both of their stomachs gave a very loud gurgling noise...
15533222222222222221212121.title: Sugarcube Corner

How does the bossy, prideful siren leader fatten up?

Especially since the sirens no longer hunger for or can even absorb negativity; as their gems were destroyed. She loved the stuff and could always rely on a good human squabble to indulge a little, even when it wasn't necessary. While Aria Blaze and Sonata Dusk are a little bit indifferent to their change in lifestyle - despite them missing their phonetic powers - they both realize that their change in diet to only human food does not effect their appetites for nourishment. Adagio was always the greedier one of the three; absorbing more negativity than the other two. It was a big reason why they let her be the leader, as she gained more power from the feedings. However, Sonata and Aria always felt a little resentful towards her for that. When Adagio starts gaining a little weight; getting lazier and more hopelessly dependent on food - Aria and Sonata find it amusing; seeing it as karmic justice. They decide to intentionally enable her as their own little revenge scheme. Things get a little out of hand. A little interesting as well.....

2)Some other way

1553322222222222222222111.title: My idea

1553322222222222222222112.content:
"Aw man, all the ice cream is gone again.", whined the blue skinned siren, Sonata Dusk.

She was currently browsing the spacious freezer. The fridge was pretty big overall, actually. Six feet tall. Made of stainless steel as well. With an ice maker attachment. Pretty expensive too. Everything from the kitchen to the bedrooms at Dazzling HQ was bought with no real concern for cost. Ever since those days long ago, when they used to 'trick' pirates from across the many seas and continents out of their treasures, they had enough gold and relics to buy what they needed for a long time. Including more ways to steal more money from the stupid humans as the years went on. Their last heist was about twenty years ago. The sirens pretty much never had to worry about money for an estimated eighty years or so, at this point.

However, the freezer was a bit too spacious. As in, there was more empty space than anything else. And, Sonata's beloved ice cream was nowhere to be found.

She loved ice cream. She loved it ever since she first tasted it eight hundred and twelve years ago. It took a little over a hundred and fifty or so for the sirens to realize that they could ingest human delights just fine. Even get a little bit of nourishment from them. Gods knew that they needed it when living in a world with essentially 'diet negativity'. Every now and then, she would treat herself to some human cuisine.

Well, except nowadays. Now, she and her siren sisters needed it to survive everyday. And, Sonata was perfectly fine with that.

"Where did it all go? It's only been like, a week since we got those five big cartons.", she asked herself with a contemplative grimace on her face. Her brain racking to solve the mystery.

"Sigh...Where do you think, dufus?", asked a gruff, disgruntled voice from behind.

Sonata closed the freezer and turned with the same dumb smile she always greeted her sisters with.

"Oh hey, Aria! So, you know where the ice cream went?"

Aria Blaze just rubbed her forehead with her palm for a few seconds and sighed. She stared at Sonata for a moment.

"You do remember that this happened last week too, right?", she asked.

"Hmmm....OH! That's right! Like, the whole fridge was nearly empty by the end of last week! And, the week before that one too! And, the week before that. And, the week before that. And, the week before that-"

"Aaaannnd? Where did most of that food go?", Aria asked impatiently.

"Hmmmm....Oh....Yeah...That's right."

Sonata covered her face and giggled a little. Then she frowned slightly. Looking down and twiddling her fingers.

Aria sighed once more. "We better check up on her. The last carton of ice cream was here just an hour ago. And, when she takes the ice cream, you know what that means."

"Yeah..."

Despite what they knew was wrong with their sister, Aria and Sonata couldn't help but still slightly grin mischievously at the thought of it. They still couldn't get over their amusement over their discovery a little over a month ago. However, they still had a bit of concern. Especially when they were starting to get worried about food in the house, in general.

They walked out of the kitchen and through the foyer of their small mansion. It was the middle of the night, and they were in their pajamas. They walked up staircase, and through the east hall where Adagio Dazzle's bedroom resided. Sonata touched her ear to the bedroom door.

"I hear something. Yep. She's in there."

Without even considering Adagio's privacy, Aria turned the knob. It wasn't locked.

15533222222222222222222222222.title: Next Please.

155332222222222222222222222221.title: Let's see how big a king can get!

1553322222222222222222222222211.content:
Twilight Sparkle and the others had been unsuccessful. At last, everything was now under King Sombra's rule, even Equestria! The Royal Sisters, the element wielders, even the entire Royal Guard couldn't stop him now! Even Shinning Armor and Princess Cadance surrendered to his control! With everypony under his magical influence, he felt like a god.

He was, of course, a pony in physical form, and the more godly he felt, the more he realized he was rather small for a god. The king had to get bigger somehow. But how? At that moment, his stomach let out a long, loud, deep growl. And right then and there, the dark overlord had the best idea he ever came up for himself. One that a common pony would find horrendous.

After a flash of his dark magic, the king of shadows made his way to the dining hall. When he got there, he was met with a sight that made him devilishly grin. The entire table was filled with all kinds of food, from oatburgers, hayfries and chicken, to pies, cake and ice cream. His servant slaves had worked rather quickly to whip up the great feast that was before him. Excellent! He would overshadow everything and everypony in no time.

As he sat him at the head of the table, a familiar face entered the room. His lovely and very talented wife, Queen Twilight Sparkle, was magically notified of her husband's latest desires and was willing to make sure he achieved them. After her surrender to his control, and because he'd been impressed by her skills in dark magic, they got married with the corrupted Celestia as their archbishop. Who said a kingdom couldn't be complete without a Queen by his side? "Would my handsome king like some help with his din-din?" she asked smoothly. "I wouldn't have it any other way, my queen." he rattled with glee.

The two monarchs took it in turns to stuff the king's face with food. They started with the fast food and royal poultry in order to keep with tradition. The pizza, burgers and fries were gobbled up with ease, sliding down the dark ruler's gullet towards his hungry belly. The king was more predatory to the other courses, like a manticore would pounce and gnaw its prey. He did leave some time for his wife to stuff him, her methods often acting like a mother feeding her youngest son.

The deserts came next, starting with long lines of cookies of differing kinds flying off the platters and into the hungry lord's maw. Sombra send sugar and peanut butter down his throat, followed by his wife sending chocolate chip and raisin. Those were followed by various flavors of cupcakes floating over to his mouth. Slices of pie and cake were magically cut and sent into his stomach, breaking at points to graze the ice cream straight from the bowls. Soda was also occasionally guzzled down, his wife floating over the bowls and bottles.

All the while, changes occurred to his royal body. His slender belly protruded outwards, out sizing his royal robe. His cheeks began to puff out and his bare neck started turning into many smaller ones, it was a good thing he'd taken his armor off before sitting down at the table. His legs began to round out and he began to develop rolls on his back. But it was his plot that would become the second largest part of his soon-to-be-obese body as it took up more and more of his seat.

By the time the entire table was cleared of the feast, the dark lord's figure had changed quite a lot. The king's belly hung a few inches from the floor when he'd gotten back on all fours. He now sported three necks and puffy cheeks that didn't seem to ruin his helmet-shaped crown. Pudge had definitely piled on his shoulders and legs, his thighs were wider by comparison and he had certainly built up some back rolls. His royal plot had also thickened and, like almost everything else chubby, started to sag with dark crystal cutie marks now five times their original size. The once slender overlord had become a fat hunk of stallion in one night.

King Sombra waddled with his wife towards the royal bedchamber. His near tree trunk legs sagging over his shoes a little and his swaying belly brushing against his legs and thighs. They reached the room and crawled into bed, the king's obese body sounded off creaks and groans as he dragged himself to the upper center. Queen Twilight found her husband to be quite a pillow and cuddled herself close to the monarch's stomach. Both rulers snuggled up close to each other and were soon fast asleep.
1553322222222222222222222222211.title: Alternate Universe

15533222222222222222222222222111.content:
The king awoke the next morning to find his wife had literally vanished from his side. Knowing that his control ensured eternal loyalty, he safely assumed that she'd gone to get breakfast going and on the table. He hoped it was a big one, a growling stomach fueled that hope. He slithered off the groaning full size bed and back onto all four on the floor. Swaying belly brushing against his legs and thighs again, he made his way to the dining hall.

What the obese monarch found as soon as he got there was about what he hoped. Though half as much as last nights dinner, it was still a big breakfast. Hay bacon, eggs, pancakes with maple syrup, sausages, hash browns and waffles were scattered across his half of the table. His wife awaited him next to his chair, eager to assist him in the morning binge. The overlord waddled his way to the table and sat down, his larger rear oozed over the sides of the crystal chair like beanbags.

The first thing Sombra treated himself to was a long string of sausages, the little logs of greasy meat magically flew through the air like a flying serpent into his hungry maw. His wife followed shortly after with a stack of flapjacks drenched in syrup, each pancake was shoved in whole. This was followed by stream of hash browns and hay bacon, done as though he was a target at a water park. Twilight then treated him to the eggs, some of the scrambled one had hay mixed in. Then the both of them sent waffles down his gullet, all of which were drenched in butter and syrup.

The bloated ruler later looked upon his slaves in a much more portly state. His belly was now dragging against the ground and sticking out a little between his legs. He gained another neck and a few back rolls. His thighs and legs were a little thicker too, squishing a bit more to his shin-long shoes. But his plot was the more attractive sight, slightly bigger than last night. It distracted a few mares for a short time until the corrupted guards whipped them back to work. Satisfied, the overweight sovereign waddled away from his slaves.
15533222222222222222222222222111.title: The Next Morning…

155332222222222222222222222221111.content:
The day went by with minor hitches, such as a light lunch and a few petitioners in need of a little "convincing". Starving beyond belief, Sombra wobbled his way into the dining hall in need of food. His purple smoking green and red eyes sparkled wide upon viewing the sight before him. The table was once again covered in a massive feast, full of fast food, pizza, deserts of all kinds, bread, butter and greasy poultry. It was a sight to behold for the hungry emperor, and his wife was there to help him all the way.

Sombra's plot cheeks sagged a little more than that morning over the sides of the crystal chair as he sat down. Twilight ensured his comfort before taunting him to a slice of pizza. From there, it was like last night, a mixture of fast food, buttered bread and poultry, followed by all those deserts. Each monarch took it in turns to feed the hungry sovereign, though Twilight was obviously the more playful of the two. The both of them had quite a lot of fun, the queen watching her hubby growing in size and weight and the king chomping at every bite and gulping every drop.

By the time the table was cleared, the overlord appeared bigger and heavier. On all fours, his belly was sticking out his sides and dragging even more against the floor. His cheeks were slightly puffier and he had a few more necks for his head to rest upon. His shoulders were bigger and sagging over his tree trunk forelegs, he gained more back rolls and his thighs had the same state shoulders. But his plot was the big attention grabber, literally. It sagged some more over his thunder thighs and tree trunk hind legs, and had cutie marks that had increased three more times in size. His robe now had a hard time trying to cover his obese body.

As he and Twilight headed to the royal bedchambers to retire for the day, the king could feel his fat swaying and wobbling to every movement, making him feel like a gluttonous jello pony. A few servant slaves turned their heads to watch their overweight emperor waddle by. The queen let her husband clamber up onto the bigger and reenforced bed, which gave off several creaks and groans as the bloated and seductive ruler got upon it. Twilight then settled herself on her king's back, finding it to work like a secondary mattress. In a matter of minutes, the high royal couple felt comfy and feel asleep.
155332222222222222222222222221111.title: Later That Evening...

1553322222222222222222222222211111.content:
The next morning and the monarch found himself putting a lot more effort into getting up and out of bed. The king sized mattress groaned as the massive emperor slithered off of it and wobbled over to the dressing mirror. There, the two tyrants found the effects of the feast last night had finally kicked in. The dark ruler was a blob. All that food had finally added up. Overnight, his body had turned from boiler shaped into a giant grey boulder of fat, with a belly that is not only hugged the floor and ate into his almost tree trunk sized legs, but oozed out of the gaps between his legs in all directions, even smushing into the underside of his plot cheeks, which were now so big they gently raised over him like two storm clouds attached to his back, covered in cellulite dimples. Each cutie mark was now ten times their original size on flanks that were sagging over his near tree trunk thighs and hind legs. Even his silver boots had cracked and were on the verge of shattering from the pressure asserted onto them by his possibly near-ton weight. His cheeks sagged down and rested atop bulky shoulders, like medicine balls, and they couldn't even count how many chins he had now, they'd merged with his chest and general neck fat.

"My hubby king's sure to become a god real soon." Twilight mused to herself. King Sombra going to need more space to ensure that, lots more space. "How about we have breakfast outside for a change, honey?" The queen suggested. "Not a bad idea, my talented little crystal." Sombra hissed with delight. Never mind the change in location, he just wanted the food.

A loud growl that caused the overlord to wobble was all the queen needed to dash off to send the kitchens to work preparing a breakfast bigger than yesterday. Sombra slowly dragged his immense body along with the speed of a slug, crystal floor almost cracking under the strain as he had to pause every few seconds to breathe, and then wriggle himself through the door. His plot required the most squirming effort but, in half an hour, he made his way outside to a special dining area his wife had set up, noticing the feast of breakfast foods being laid out. There was triple the amount of yesterday's breakfast, causing his tongue to dangle out. The queen was awaiting him, with a reenforced seat for him to rest upon.

The monarch gave up all pretenses of modesty or restraint and allowed himself to descend to the prime level of gluttony he'd been waiting for, swallowing entire pancakes, waffles eggs, sausages, anything and everything that he saw in front of him was devoured. It was almost impossible to see his stomach expand from packing away food until after the first few piles had been consumed, Sombra wordlessly moved on from one course to the other, silently eating even as he felt his body expanding and squishing against the table, the only noises being his burps and hiccups and the sound of chewing and crunching. He didn't stop, even when he couldn't reach anything else. His wife took care of that, sending the rest of the feast cramming into his mouth.

The rest of the day was spent outside. Many ponies cooked the king's lunch and dinner. The queen made sure each feast filled the whole table, which they set back up every time it was knocked over. By the end of the day, the overlord was completely immobile, so large that he could be considered a landmark for all ponykind. A giant gray lump resting atop his own belly, having to use dark magic, at his turn, to snatch any more morsels in range when unable to move. There was no way he'd fit back into the castle, let alone move from his current position. Sombra purred from the sensation of how full he was before passing out, his dreams weird and wonderful due to his wife consumption. His wife levitated herself onto her hubby's back, purred at how soft it was, and feel asleep soon afterward.
1553322222222222222222222222211111.title: The Next Morning…

15533222222222222222222222222111111.content:
A loud, long belch awoke the empire the next morning. The emperor moaned in pleasure, sounding deeper and more bass, and watched his slaves assemble before him. Blob no longer did him justice. The dark lord had transcended blobbiness and achieved a corpulent nirvana not heard outside of fairy tales. He wasn't a blob, as blobs still had a sense of form to them. Sombra was more a mass. A gigantic, jiggling mass. The only parts of her that still betrayed his nature as a pony and not an oversized gelatin dessert were his head, almost engulfed into his neck fat and with cheeks larger than carts, mouth almost disappearing between them and the billowing river of chins below it, and his tail, above a plot which was the size of a small building, and pockmarked with rolls, dimples and more, the cutie marks almost the size of the throne room due to stretching. His limbs still retained some level of function and were able to move in their 'sleeves' of fat. All the godly body that was King Sombra could do, was rumble, both vocally and from his now bottomless stomach.

GRROOORRRRLLLLL…

Sombra's stomach roared so fiercely that his whole body jiggled, sent an earthquake across the empire. When the shaking stopped, his queen ordered the slaves to work, feeding the god the days meals to make him bigger and bigger.
15533222222222222222222222222111111.title: The Next Morning…

155332222222222222222222222221111111.content:
This went on for days on end, the dark overlord's body soon reaching out further than the empire, covering Equestria and then the world. It had taken a month, but at last he'd done it! Sombra was not only the king of Equestria, but the god of the world. His queen was beside him all the way, having leaped onto his ever expanding neck as he began to cover everything. Their dark magic would leave them immortal and breathing for generations, with everypony cowering underneath them.

And nopony would dare to try and change things.
155332222222222222222222222221111111.title: The Days Pass...

155332222222222222222222222222112.title: ...a side character?

choices: Go about Shining's day at work.
Skip some time when Shining's much larger...
15533222222222222222222222222211221.content:
C'mon, please don't do this to me...

Shining tucked his shirt into his pants, struggling to fit his fingers through past his abdomen. For a brief moment of relief his shirt managed to conceal his stomach, but looking up at the bathroom mirror his hopes fell as it only made it look worse. Now his shirt gripped more of his belly, extenuating a small, but still rather noticeable roundness beneath.

He took a few steps away from the mirror to see himself in full, his movements causing his shirt to slip out and expose some soft, white-furred paunch beneath. As of late his stomach his stomach bulged out a few inches further than since his coronation, and beneath his jeans he could see his legs starting to fill in the sleeves. Even his face was starting to pudge up, his cheeks puffier and softer to the touch.

For years Shinign Armor had been a stallion of top performance. He'd exercised almost every day and ate a boot camp diet over his years of training for the royal guard, and even out of duty still managed to keep up his athletic lifestyle with decent devotion. Expectedly he'd been the eye of many mares around town, leading him to a young Princess Cadance, who would eventually become his wife and co-ruler of the Crystal Empire. Shining adored his new lifestyle, but as years had passed of sitting in thrones, getting little exercise outside of signing papers, shaking hands, or reading to orphans, he'd started to slack in his upkeep. The rich, luscious meals of royalty certainly didn't help.

His sedentary divergence had since been nagging on his mind, but he'd managed to brush it under the carpet. But now he'd realized how noticeable it was becoming.

How the hay am I gonna do abut this? Shining dwelled. I can't get the time to exercise with the kingdom on my back!

His thoughts were interrupted by a staccato of soft raps against the door. "Shining? Are you decent, sweetie!"

"Huh? Uh...sure, Cadance, it's safe!"

Cadence opened the door and stepped into the bathroom clad in a light blue bathrobe, her candy-colored mane dangling past her waist without its smooth curls. Even right out of bed Cadance was a shining sight for sore eyes. "Morning, dear. How'd you sleep?"

"Eh, just fine. You?"

"Never better!" She spoke with a very cheerful grin, picking up a brush from the sink top and running it through her hair, smoothing out the kinks in her bedmane.

"...Cadance?"

"Yes, Shining?"

"I know this is gonna sound strange from me, but..." Shining stood stiffly, feeling awkward at sounding self-conscious. "...you think I look like I've been putting on weight?"

For a brief moment Cadance paused, but seemed to shake him off. "Not that I've noticed, no."

"You sure? It's just..." Shining pondered an easy way to explain until he looked down at his stomach, which he gently shook to show it bore a visible jiggle.

"Hmm..." Cadance raised a thoughtful eyebrow, but switched out for a comforting smile. "Don't worry about it, dear. A little chicken fat's nothing to get worried over!"

"Really? You sure everypony else'll be as friendly?"

"Like I said, nothing to worry about. Besides, it'll give you a little character!"

It didn't answer his question, but his wife's encouragement was still uplifting. "...eh, I guess you're right."

"Just keep a stiff upper lip! Everypony'll respect you even more!" Cadance boasted hopefully. "But right now, how does some breakfast sound?"

.....


"Aren't you gonna have breakfast with me, Cadance?"

"Well, I've actually got a few errands to run, so not today, sadly."

Cadance stood next to Shining as he sat in his seat at the end of the dining hall's table, a large placemat laid out for him. From the far end of the room a stout unicorn mare in a chef's outfit wheeling in a cart with a large plate covered by a metal dome. Once she was near enough she floated the plate in front of him and lifted the dome away to reveal a tall, wide stack of pancakes drizzled with thick maple syrup, a hefty, steaming pile of scrambled eggs, slices of toast covered in peanut butter and jelly, several slices of cooked hay bacon, a thick, golden hashbrown, and a tall glass of chocolate milk.

"Uh...honey?" Shining asked, awkward yet tempted by his breakfast. "...isn't this a lot of food?"

"Anything for my hubby!" She chirped, giving his stomach a gentle pat. "Eat up!"

Shining cautiously forked off a bite of pancakes, which he took a moment to observe the forkful before he shrugged and popped it in his mouth, The instant the flavor hit his taste buds he stretched a satisfied smile, humming in delight. "Mmmmmmm..."

"Now, you just have your breakfast while I attend to a few matters." Cadance instructed as she and the chef turned away and headed for the doors out. But when they'd reached the doors ad turned out of sight the two stood at the edge of the doorframe and watched Shining eat, who showed far less relent than before.

"...so, how big you want him to be, again?"

"Shh..." Cadance calmly hushed.
15533222222222222222222222222211221.title: I'm so sorry I keep churning this crappy premise.

choices: ...start some high energy exercise and dieting!
...search for a spell to take the easy way out!
155332222222222222222222222222112212.content:
"Hrrk...come on!" Shining grunted, his hands clamped around both ends of his belt as he used all his might to try and force the ends to meet around his vast waistline. Having to reach over his hefty stomach certainly didn't help, which was pretty bloated from having just lose control of himself with a five-course dinner.

His porky cheeks were flushed bright red with his breath held, but a loud SNAP! behind his back melted all determination in his face as the belt's halves slid free of the loops on his pants. "Aw, dang it..."

Sighing glumly, he tossed the belt' remains into the trash can and turned to look at himself in the mirror, observing how much he'd fattened himself up since his talk with Cadance four weeks ago. Any slimness or definition his body had ever shown was now lost beneath big loads of round, doughy blubber that drastically ballooned his figure and limbs. His shirt could only reach halfway down his bulbous, white-furred gut, which formed a generous amount of his body's width and hung low over his legs, which in themselves had become wide enough that the rubbed against each other as he stood. It was clear he'd passed the boundaries of "hefty" and stepped foot in grade-A fattiness.

He reached beneath his gut and gently lifted it, letting it drop back down and watched as it briefly wobbled from the disturbance. His eyes were downtrodden as he started to accept the stallion he'd let himself become, but then shimmered with a sharp glint as a feeling of determination flared within his heart.

"I let all this crap in my body, I can get it out!" He swore valiantly.

He waddled out of the bathroom and headed towards his dresser, yanking one of the drawers open and tossing several shirts and pants out until he'd found a baggy yellow T-shirt and some black, stretchy gym shorts.

Slipping the shirt on, it was still only big enough that it could only reach his naval, and even as stretchy as the shorts were they still wrapped around his big bubble butt in a tight grip, but it was better than nothing.

Shining trotted out of the bedroom and walked down the hall to...
155332222222222222222222222222112212.title: Skip some time when Shining's much larger...

choices: Come on, what do you think'll happen?
1553322222222222222222222222221122122.content:
Shining's nostrils were hit with the musky scent of paper and glue as he walked into the library, the floors running through the hundreds of shelves worth of books filled with silence. Nopony else was in plain sight from the front desk save for a white crystal pony with a deep blue mane, whose humming sliced through the quiet as she turned the page of a book she was reading.

"Excuse me, miss?" Shining said nervously as he approached the desk. The mare smiled politely as she looked up from her book, but gasped politely upon noticing who she was meeting.

"My goodness, hello, your majesty! What brings you here?"

"Well...it's actually a pretty important matter. You have to be absolutely private about it, alright?"

"Private? Hmm...Sure, but what's this about?"

Shining opened his mouth to speak, but didn't bother saying anything as he sighed and patted his half-exposed gut.

"...oh." She blushed, only now noticing Shining's weight. "You want me to help find you a diet, or..."

"Is there a spell that can make me lose weight?"

"Ah. Well..." She wheeled her chair to an open book on the desk, thumbing into one of the letters and flipping through till a page caught her interest, running her finger along the lines as she read.

"How does Slim Trim's Guide to Weight Loss through Magic and Mental Reasoning?"

"Yeah, that's perfect!" He said optimistically. "Is it in?"

"I think so. In fact, I can do a little research and help you out with a spell that can help you."

"Alright, lead the way!"

The librarian beckoned Shining to follow her, leading him through the maze of bookshelves till they finally reached a door in the far wall of the library, which lead to a staircase with stone walls that lead down to darkness.

After listening for a short while to make sure their footsteps were gone, Cadance peeked out from behind one of the flowerpots at the front door and peered in to make sure the library was empty. With a mischievous giggle, she shut the doors and placed back the "CLOSED ON WEEKENDS" sign on the doorknob.

.....


Akin to the library above, the walls of the room consisted entirely of bookshelves, but more slovenly arranges with papers stuffed between the books and strewn about on the desk as the librarian read from the light of an old oil lamp.

"You think you can do it?" Shining asked.

"It looks kind of tricky...but I think I'll do it."

"What should I do right now?"

"Just stand still, and I'll cast the spell in your stomach. Don't panic, alright?"

Shining gulped, but nodded vigorously as he stood stiffly in the center of the room. Taking a deep breath, the librarian carefully lowered her head so that her horn pointed towards Shining's belly. Shutting her eyes, she charged up her horn and shot a beam of light into his stonmach that embedded its energy within, coursing through his body...

1553322222222222222222222222221131.content:
"Rggh...come on!!!" Mandible groaned loudly, throwing his hands up in frustration as he paced around the chamber. Thorax cringed at his voice, throwing her whittling off course. "What's taking him so long? That nimrod's been gone for four hours!"

"Would you pipe down?!" Thorax snapped, struggling to keep the knife steady against the wood. "Your pacing around the room is driving me crazy!"

Mandible growled as he pulled up a chair and sat at the same table, planting his head into his palms. "He probably went and got drunk again! I swear, if that moron gets fired for whatever, I'm gonna pack his bags for him!"

"Shhh!" Thorax angrily hushed, her resolve visible receding as she struggled to concentrate.

"The hell's so hard and important about all this crap, anyway? It's a damn feather!"

As the door burst open, a nick of wood chipped off of Thorax' block, whose head slammed into the table as she let out a loud, anguished groan. In the door was Proboscis, whose right eye was swollen and purple, the rest of his face covered in bruises and his front tooth chipped. He walked in with a limp, an exasperated look on his face as his hand clutched a gray feather.

"...Proboscis?" Mandible asked, surprised by the shape he was in. "Geez, what happened, man?"

"Just take it!" The changeling spat, tossing the feather into Mandibles face and limping for the other door, not saying another word.

Thorax got up from her seat and picked the feather off the ground, examining it.

"Well, uh...guess it's time to see the queen!"

.....


The throne room was enormous, spanning almost a hundred feet into the air. The only sources of light inside were thin, transparent green windows shining green circles onto certain areas of the chamber, along with a hole in the ceiling that shone pure sunlight onto the throne itself.

In it sat Chrysalis, clad in thick, black and green armor. She had an impatient look on her face as she looked down at a small pedestal with a black goblet resting on top, filled with a reddish-purple liquid.

"Well, it's about time you'd shown up!" She chided as the two changelings approached the throne. "What took so long?"

"My apologies, milady, but it seems there was some delay on Proboscis' end!" Mandible bowed.

"But he did find the feather, right?"

"Yes, my queen. Right here!" Thorax held the feather at arm's length for the queen to see.

"Well, what're we waiting for? Finish the potion!"

Thorax dropped the feather into the chalice, the liquid bubbling with a faint white vapor as the feather dissolved inside. When the bubbling stopped, the potion turned to a bright pink.

"Yes...it's all coming together..." Chrysalis smiled slyly as she floated the chalice to her hand, swishing the potion inside to observe its consistency. Bringing the potion to her lips, she slowly gulped it all down in long sips, smiling as it hit her tongue with a rich, sweet flavor.

Once the glass was empty, she sighed blissfully and rubbed her abdomen as the potion immediately started to take effect. The holes that bore through her arms and legs began to shrink till they were completely filled, her skinny arms gaining a healthy, thick amount of mass. Her crooked horn straightened out and grew several inches longer and stronger, her wings flaring out and shining with a crystalline glow.

Beneath her chest plate she could feel her breasts expand and press against the material, grunting at the ensuing tightness. Standing up from the throne the other two changelings could see that her hips were beginning into grow against her outfit as well. With her body's enhancement she also began growing taller, inch by inch stretching the armor, which let out a soft cracking noise as it struggled to keep intact around her.

Chrysalis hummed in delight as the change took place, but her growth started to waver until it slowed to a stop, now several inches above ten feet in height. She looked impressed as she ran her hands along her body, observing the appealing texture and quality it obtained.

"Milady, how do you feel?" Mandible asked, struggling to contain his admiration for her body.

"My...it feels outstanding!" She whistled boastfully, a sly grin stretching across her muzzle. "I've never felt so alive in hundreds of years!"

"If you don't mind me asking, you're highness...what was it you'd just drank?"

"A love potion. However, I'd drank both halves!"

"Both halves?"

"Well, when one of those pathetic ponies is so desperate to fall in love with another, they ask another to share a love potion with them so that the two will immediately fall in love. However, by drinking both halves with my ability to absorb love, I can now indefinitely feed off my own love!"

She walked to a vanity mirror perched near the throne, looking over her shoulder and admiring herself from the back. "And I CERTAINLY love..."

But Chrysalis went silent and put a hand on her stomach, her smile slowly drooping.

"Milady, are you alright?" Mandible asked worriedly.

"I...I feel..."

But she didn't need to answer as beneath her armor Mandible could see her stomach growing bigger and rounder, the cracking sound from her armor as her girth began to meet the armor's breaking point. Finally with a loud snap! her stomach burst through the armor, billowing out over her knees and snapping the belt of her garment apart. Her legs were beginning to expand as well, the seams busting apart along her legs and allowing her black, shiny skin to bulge through.

"W-W-WHAT'S HAPPENING?" Chrysalis wailed, pressing her hands into her swelling belly in a futile attempt to keep it control, but by then it's growth made it halfway down her calves, and her breasts had started to grow so that it was a hard reach. She cringed in pain as her chest plate was stretched tight around her bust, her biceps fattening up and tightening the armholes.

Mandible and Thorax stood in awestruck astonishment as Chrysalis grew even bigger, puffing upwards a few more feat. With loud snaps numerous segments of her armor were torn apart and slid of her body onto the ground, every limb and part of her swelling up as though she were a balloon.

"STOP STOP STOP STOP STOP STOP STOP!!!!!" Chrysalis wailed the entire time, struggling to keep her body concealed. It was a decent while until her growth finally sputtered to a stop, but the damage by this point was irreversible.

She stood at ten feet tall, but unlike before now skirted hundreds upon thousands of pound worth of fat, showing off an extreme amount of black skin uncovered by her armor. Biggest of all about her was her monstrously swollen belly, which bloated out onto the ground seven feet away from her back like a pudding-filled weather balloon, making a decent perch for her monolithic mammaries. Her thighs dug into the sides of her gut, each wide enough that they could each crush an armchair into nothing.

"M-M-M-M-M-M-Milady, wh...are y-y-you alright?" Mandible stammered.

Chrysalis didn't immediately answer as, with a curious look, she pressed her hands into her midsection and stroked them around her gut as far as they could reach till they held onto her breasts, testing their feeling. Too Mandible's surprise, she cracked a small grin.

"To be honest, I'm feeling..."

She went over to the burner and turned it off, grabbing the beaker and pouring it into another beaker containing something else, the resulting mixture turning purple.
